
----------------顺序化第1话--- 被史莱姆舔 ----------------

Chapter 1 "Emissary of Sunlight"=第 1 章  “阳光的使者”
Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 1 Emissary of Sunlight?=要游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 1 章  阳光的使者 吗？
West Mountain Village=西山村
...bestowed with holy powers from God, the knight marched into the evil wizard's castle to punish him for tormenting the people.=...接受阳神赋予圣力的骑士，走进坏魔法师的城堡，惩其折磨民众之罪。
Inside the castle lived a giant bird that turned people into stone. Nevertheless, the knight used the large sword gifted to him by God and defeated the bird.=虽然城堡里住着一只能把人变成石头的魔物，骑士还是成功用神赐予他的巨剑消灭了它。
When the knight reached the top of the castle, the evil wizard appeared along with an ominous light. The wizard spoke...=当骑士到达城堡顶部时，在那里，邪恶的魔法师出现了，伴随着不祥的光芒。他说...
"Servant of God! Holy Knight! You must be a fool to come challenging me! I will defeat you and take over your body!"=“神的使徒！圣之骑士！你欲克余，愚不可及！余将反而击败你，接管你那具身躯！”
But the knight was unfazed by the evil wizard's words. Before he finished talking, the knight cut the wizard in half with his sword!=骑士大人并没有被邪恶魔法师的话吓到。魔法师还没说完，骑士就用剑把他劈成了两半！
"Ghaaaah! Ooooh nooo! I am defeated!"=“嘎啊啊啊！！被打败啦！”
Waaah...!=哇...！
The knight is amazing, Miria! He must be really strong if he defeated that bad wizard!=好厉害啊姐姐，他打败了那么坏的魔法师，骑士，真强壮呵！
Haha, I think so too...=嗯哼，是啊...
The knight defeated the evil wizard, but suddenly, he heard the wizard's voice.=骑士打败了坏魔法师。但突然，他又听到了已被打倒的魔法师之声。
"How unfair! You attacked me while I was speaking!"=“我说话的时候你还攻击我！太卑鄙了！”
"But you won't beat me that easily. In exchange for my life, I will summon a great, powerful dragon from the World of Darkness and use him to crush you!"=“我可没这么容易就被打败。我以生命为代价，从黑暗世界召唤强大之巨龙，\n让它来打败你！”
Darkness surrounded the area and a dragon even bigger than the castle appeared in front of the knight. The dragon opened his mouth and tried to swallow the knight.=黑暗包围了这片区域，骑士面前出现的，是一条比城堡还要大的龙。\n龙张开嘴试图吞下骑士...
Whaaaat!? What's gonna happen to the knight!? That big dragon sounds really scary...=哇！？那么大的龙，骑士会怎么样！？
Heehee... However, the knight had God's holy power on his side.=嘿嘿... 然而，骑士拥有神圣力量啊。
He collected that power in his sword, made it shine bright like the sun, and pierced it into the dragon.=骑士将太阳般的力量汇于剑中，刺向了恶龙。
The holy power struck the dragon. Its light was unbearable for the creature who lived in darkness.=常居于黑暗世界中的恶龙，无法抵挡这种攻击。
The dragon gave up on swallowing the knight and left to return to the World of Darkness.=龙放弃了吞下骑士的念头，回到了原本的黑暗世界。
And so, thanks to the brave act of the holy knight sent from heaven, the wicked wizard was defeated, the evil dragon was sent back to the World of Darkness, and everyone was saved.=然后，多亏了被阳神派来的勇敢圣骑士，邪恶魔法师被击败，恶龙被送回黑暗的世界，\n人们得救了。
The end...=终...
Wow...!=哇...！
Did you like that, Ricca? Or do you prefer stories about pretty princesses instead?=怎么样，有趣吗? 还是说莉卡更喜欢有关公主的童话故事呢？
Uh-uh! That was really cool, Miria! I liked it!=嗯嗯！真的很有趣，蜜莉雅姐姐！
You did? Heehee, I'm glad.=这样吗？嘿嘿，那就好。
Yeah... But I feel sorry for the dragon... He got stabbed right after getting summoned...=嗯... 但那龙，刚被召唤就被刺伤了... 好可怜...
You're such a kind girl, Ricca... You care about all creatures, don't you?=啊啦，莉卡可真善良... 会关心各种生物，真好啊。
Yeah...! Oh... But I'm a little scared of slimes... I tried to be friends with one, but then it got all big and wiggly...=嗯...哦...但史莱姆我还是会怕的... 我试着和其中一个好好相处，但后来它变得好大，还蠕动...
Heehee... I don't mind you being a little rambunctious, but stay away from monsters, okay?=呵呵... 你有点任性倒没什么，但还是离魔物远点，好吗？
Yeah...=嗯...
Hey, Miria...?=呐，姐姐...?
Umm... What happened to the knight after he beat the bad wizard and dragon?=嗯... 骑士在打败了坏魔法师和龙之后怎么样了？
Huh? Well...=嗯？这个嘛...
I'm sure he went back to his hometown, was loved by all the people he saved, and lived happily ever after.=骑士一定是回到了家乡，被拯救的所有人爱戴着，从此过着幸福的生活。
Huh...=嗯...
That's why I want you to help people when you grow up, so you can be loved by everyone too!=所以啊，我希望你长大后也能爱人们，接受他人的爱！
Okay...!=嗯...！
One day you're going to have a happy family...and be surrounded by your cute kids, just like Mom and Dad... Heehee, now go to sleep...=总有一天你就会像爸爸妈妈一样有个幸福的家庭...和你可爱的孩子们在一起...\n嘿嘿，现在去睡觉吧...
Good night, Ricca.=晚安，莉卡。
Good night...Miria...=晚安...姐姐...
............=............
Zzz... Zzz...=呼呼...嗯呼...
???=???
......=......
<size%3D66%>...ake...up...</size>=<size%3D66%>...起床了...</size>
Nnh... Hmmm...?=嗯...呵唔...？
<size%3D75%>...cca...wa...up...</size>=<size%3D75%>...莉卡...起床了...</size>
Nnngh... Ugh... Mmmnn...=嗯...呃...嗯呣呣...
<size%3D87.5%>Wake up, Ricca.</size>=<size%3D87.5%>醒醒啊莉卡。</size>
Nnmm... Hmm... Nnnngh!=嗯...嗯... 呃呃嗯！
Heehee, good morning, Ricca.=嘿嘿，早上好，莉卡。
Oh... Morning, Miria...=哦... 早安，姐姐...
Morning, Ricca... Although, it's already noon, you know? You slept in again.=早安，莉卡... 现在已经中午了哟？又睡懒觉了啊。
Huh? It's that late...? Mmmn, but I wanna sleep more... Oww... Why didn't you wake me up earlier...?=嗯？已经这个时间了...？嗯，还是好困啊... 哦唔... 怎么不早点叫醒我...？
I tried to several times this morning, but you just didn't wake up.=我叫了好几次，但你完全不见醒。
Huh...? Are you serious...? You know I'm not a morning person... You need to yell louder...=诶...？姐姐真的嘛...？你知道我不是会早起的那种人... 你要是不大声叫我...
Heehee, lunch will be ready soon, so get dressed and come over to the kitchen.=呵呵，马上午餐就准备好了，穿好衣服到厨房来吧。
Hmm... Okaaay...=嗯... 知道了...
(<indent%3D0.4em>*Yawn* I slept too much again...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>*打哈欠* 今天可真是睡饱了...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>I think I had a dream last night, too... Maybe because Miria came to wake me up over and over...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>话说，我昨晚做了个梦... 也许是因为姐姐叫了我很多次...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>I stayed up late last night reading this "Strange Creatures Encyclopedia" I borrowed from the general store. I thought it would have cute critters in it, but it was mostly monsters. Still, it was so interesting I couldn't put it down...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我昨晚熬夜看了这本从杂货店借的《奇异生物百科全书》。本以为里面会有可爱的小动物，不过大部分都是魔物。但是，真的很有趣，我爱不释手...)
Ricca, hurry up and come over here.=莉卡，快点过来。
Okay! I gotta change first, so hold on a sec.=好！我得先换衣服，再等一下，姐姐。
(<indent%3D0.4em>I need to go to the mountains again today. I better get dressed fast.)=(<indent%3D0.4em>今天又要去山上。得快点穿衣服了。)
===========切换动作场景===无声=======
Dressed and ready! Better head to the kitchen.=准备好就去厨房用餐吧。
============切换剧情无声========================
You're going to the mountains in the afternoon, right?=你下午要去山上是吗？
Yup. The merchant asked me to get him some herbs.=是嘞。老板让我给他采些草药。
I see... In that case, I'll ask you to get some for me, too. I was thinking of serving them with the meals at the dining hall.=嗯啊...  那样的话，我也想请你帮忙采一些。我想在餐厅里为他们做做菜。
Alright. How much do you need?=行。你要多少？
I just want to try it out for now, so...can I ask you to get a little bit of a few different kinds of herbs?=我想尝试点新东西...能请你采集一些稀有的植物吗？
Sure. I'll try to get as many kinds as I can.=当然。我尽量多搞一些。
Great, thank you, Ricca. Oh, but...=太好了，谢谢你莉卡。不过...
Don't go too deep into the mountains, okay? I've heard that monsters are getting restless around here lately...=不要去到深山处，好吗？听说最近周围的魔物越来越不安...
...Miria, this again?=...姐姐, 又说这个？
I'm just worried, Ricca. I was talking with a customer, and he said that the town you and I went to some time ago got taken over by monsters. I heard the forest settlement at the foot of this mountain got attacked by goblins, too.=我只是在担心莉卡你啊。我之前和一位顾客聊天，他说咱俩前段时间去的那个城镇被魔物占领了。山脚下的森林定居点也遭到了哥布林的袭击。
Wasn't that town really far away, though? And we only went there when we were young. The forest settlement didn't suffer much, either. You're worrying too much.=但是那个小镇不是离这很远吗？我们只有小时候去过。森林定居点也没有受到太大影响。\n你担心过度了。
Besides, we have Donny patrolling the outskirts of this village, and the only monsters we see on the mountain road are the occasional slime. It's the same as it ever was.=此外，我们有多尼在村庄的郊外巡逻，在山路上偶尔出现的唯一魔物不过只是史莱姆。\n和以前一样。
But...=但是...
It's okay, I'm not a kid anymore. You worry too much!=没关系，我不再是小孩子了。你担心过头了！
...I do not. Besides, you still act like a child...=...我才没有。你其实表现得还像个小毛孩子...
Remember that time we played hide-and-seek and you didn't come back home?=还记得玩捉迷藏的时候，你没回家那件事儿吗？
I thought something had happened to you and got so worried...=我还以为你出了什么事...
I searched for you in and out of the village, but then you just popped out of the church!=我在村子里到处找你，最后你却从教堂底下偷摸溜了出来！
I told you that God would be offended if you fooled around in his holy place, but you forgot about my warning...=我讲过，如果在阳神的圣所乱玩，阳神会不悦的，你完全忘了...
We rarely get earthquakes around here, but after that incident, the ground shook and some parts of the underground tomb collapsed, you know? I bet it was God showing us how mad he was at you.=我们这里很少有地震，但那事之后地面震动，地下墓穴有部分坍塌。阳神貌似在向你发怒。
Urk... That was a long time ago, and I already apologized for that. How many times are you going to bring that up? It's getting annoying.=唔... 那是很久以前的事了，我已经道过歉了。你要搬出来多少次？好烦啊。
Oh, do I really talk about it that often? Speaking of which, where were you hiding all that time? I thought I searched the church inside and out... Or were you...=我经常翻旧帐么？话说回来，你之前一直躲在哪里？我把教堂里里外外都找遍了...你...
Phew, thanks for the food, Miria. Time to do the dishes...=呼，多谢款待，姐姐。我该洗碗了...
...I'll take care of them. You go on ahead, but make sure you get back home early.=...我来吧，你先出发，但一定要早点回家。
What do you want for dinner tonight?=你今晚想吃什么？
Anything that doesn't have raw tomatoes in it.=任何不含生番茄的食物。
Alright... But that's what I mean when I say you're still like a child. You won't make a good wife if you don't stop being a picky eater!=好吧...我就说你还不成熟。如果不改掉挑食的赖毛病，你怎么能成为一个好妻子！
A good wife...? Whatever... Alright, I'm off, Miria!=好妻子...？无所谓啦，我走啦，姐姐！
See you later... Careful not to trip on the mountain path! And if you see any monsters, come back home right away!=再见... 小心别在山路上绊倒！你看到魔物就马上回家！
Heehee, I know, I know!=嘿嘿，我知道，我知道！
===========切换无声============
The sun feels amazing! Today's weather is perfect!=阳光超级棒！天气好好！
No one can blame me for sleeping in past noon on a day like this, right? Heehee!=这样的好天气，没人能怪我睡这么久吧？嘿嘿！
Anyway, what's with Miria? She seemed really worried...=呃，姐姐怎么了？忧心忡忡的...
Well, I guess she's always like that.=好吧... 她一直都是这样。
I'm glad she's always looking after me and all, but I wish Miria would find herself a husband soon.=我很感激她一直在照顾我和大家，但我希望姐姐她早点找个丈夫。
She keeps asking me if there are any boys I like and telling me that a girl's true happiness is in having a family, but she should be telling herself that.=她一直问我有没有喜欢的男孩，还告诉我女孩真正的幸福在于成家...但她应该多想想自己。
Maybe she hasn't gotten married so she can keep taking care of me...=也许她还未嫁人是为了可以继续照顾我...
No, I don't think so. I know she said she wanted to get married too... And I'm not a kid anymore, either. She doesn't have to baby me.=不，不会的。她说她也想结婚... 我也不再是孩子了。她不必照顾我啊。
Oh, hello there, Ricca.=你好，莉卡。
Hello, ma'am.=你好，太太。
Are you out to pick wild plants again?=你又要去采药草了吗？
Yup! Your husband and my sister asked me to gather some herbs.=是的！你丈夫和我姐姐让我采些草药。
Oh, I think he mentioned something about that. Anyway, be careful. It looks like there's been more monster activity lately...=哦，他提到过。无论如何都要小心。最近有更多的魔物活动...
Heehee, Miria told me the same thing. She's such a worrywart...=嘿嘿，姐姐也这么说。她真是忧心忡忡...
That's because you're very important to her. *Chuckle* You are her precious little sister, so of course she's going to worry.=那是因为你对她很重要吧，*笑* 你是她的宝贝妹妹，她当然会担心。
Heehee... Thanks! But, to be honest, I think she should stop looking after me so much. She could easily find a husband for herself if she tried...=嘿嘿...谢谢！但是，说实话，我觉得她不应该过分照顾我。她想找个丈夫还不容易？\n只要她试一试的话...
I agree, Miria is a beautiful lady, just like you.=对对，蜜莉雅是美女，就像你一样。
She gets so many opportunities to talk to travelers at the dining hall. If she just wore flashier clothing instead of the plain dress she always wears, she could get all the men she wanted...=她在餐厅，有很多与旅行者交谈的机会。如果她穿更华丽的衣裳，而不是一直穿朴素布衣，\n哪个男人不动心啊...
Flashier clothes...?=更华丽的衣裳...？
Yes, yes... If I were pretty like Miria...=对，对... 我要是长得像蜜莉雅一样漂亮...
I would wear a blouse that showed my cleavage, and a frilly short skirt that exposed my thighs and just barely hid my panties...=我会穿露乳沟的女装衬衫，露大腿的褶边短裙，几乎只遮住内裤...
And then every time I served a customer, I would use a sweet flirty voice. I bet I could've gotten a richer husband if I was her. <size%3D75%>Agh... Curse my rotten luck...</size>=然后每次我为顾客服务时，都用甜甜的调情音。肯定能钓个更富有的丈夫。 \n<size%3D75%>哎...我这辈子的坏运气啊...</size>
Umm...ma'am!? What's wrong!?=嗯...太太！？怎么了！？
Oh? It's nothing. I'm just saying, I think Miria could find a nice man if she dressed in sexier clothes. Heeheehee.=哦没什么。我只是说，我想蜜莉雅如果穿着更性感的衣服，就能找到好男人。嘿嘿。
Sexier, huh... Ahaha... I-I guess so. I think she would look better in cuter clothes too, but she always dresses really drab...=更性感，嗯...啊哈... 我，我想也是。她穿更可爱的衣服也会好看，但她的穿着总是很单调...
Absolutely. She didn't always dress so plainly, you know. When Miria first moved to this village with your parents, she was fashionable just like girls her age ought to be.=肯定的。她之前可不这样。蜜莉雅和你父母刚搬到这个村子时，她穿得和同龄女孩一样美。
Oh, really? I've only seen her dress like how she does now...=真的吗？我只见过她现在的样子...
No wonder, this was around the time you were born.=难怪，那会儿你才刚出生呢。
By the way, I heard from my husband that Miria's been looking a bit down these days. Is she alright?=对了，我丈夫告诉我蜜莉雅这几天有点沮丧。她还好吗？
Oh, he said that? I didn't notice anything strange about her...=他说了这话？我没注意到她有什么奇怪的地方啊...
Oh, is that so? My husband must have misunderstood something then. Sorry to worry you.=是这样吗？我丈夫一定是误解了什么。抱歉让你担心了哈。
*Chuckle* Well, I'll let you get back to your errand. Don't make your sister worry too much, alright?=*笑* 好了，你继续做你的事情吧。别让你姐姐太担心嗷。
Yes, ma'am!=好嘞，太太！
Oh, it's Polon.=哦，是小狗泼隆。
Heehee! Woof, woof!=嘿嘿！汪，汪！
Woof, woof! *Whine*=汪，汪！
I'm gonna go to the mountains! Heehee! Woof!=我要去山上！嘿嘿！汪！
Woof!=汪！
Hey, it's Ricca. Hi there. You sure do get along with Polon.=是莉卡啊，你好。你和泼隆处的挺好啊。
Hi, Donny.=你好多尼。
You're going to the mountains again? Be careful of the monsters. They've gotten a lot more active lately...=你又要去山上了？小心魔物。他们最近更活跃了...
Ahaha... Not you too. The lady from the general store and my sister told me the same thing.=啊哈... 连你也这么说。杂货店的太太和我姐姐也告诉了我同样的事。
I bet. Miria can get pretty wound up worrying for you, but I don't think I can blame her. You can get a bit high-spirited sometimes.=蜜莉雅会过分担心你，但我不怪她。你有时会兴奋过头办傻事。
But she's right. It's been about three years since I was deployed to this village, but the monsters have gradually increased in number, and they're getting a little more violent.=但她做的对。我被派到这个村子已经三年了，不过魔物逐渐数量增加，而且更加暴力。
Really? All I see are the occasional slimes squirming around, so I didn't think anything had changed.=真的？我只看到偶尔蠕动的史莱姆，我觉得什么都没变啊。
It's something I learned from regularly making rounds and writing records. You shouldn't underestimate slimes, either.=我从常年的巡视和记录中学到了：\n不应该低估史莱姆。
Slimes may be slower compared to other animals, but they sneak up to their prey in search of bodily fluids. Back when I was at the capital, I heard stories about elderly folks and children falling victim to them.=与其他动物相比，可能史莱姆的速度较慢，但它们会偷偷靠近猎物寻找体液。\n我在王都的时候，听过老人和儿童受害的故事。
Small children? Oh, that's awful... Actually, I think I remember getting chased by one when I was small, too. It stings if you touch their bodies...=儿童？太糟糕了...其实吧，我还记得我小的时候被史莱姆追过。触碰它们就会感到刺痛...
If enough slimes surround you, even an adult can become paralyzed and get eaten by them. So you better be careful, Ricca. I don't want to see Miria cry because something happened to you.=如果大量的史莱姆在周围，即使是成年人也会瘫痪，被吃掉。所以莉卡你最好小心点，\n我不想看到蜜莉雅因为你出了事而流泪。
Heehee... Don't worry, I'll be careful.=嘿嘿...别担心，我会小心的。
Okay, I'll see you later!=好的，回头见！
See you! Be careful not to trip! And come right back if you see a monster, alright?=再见！小心别绊倒了！你看到魔物马上回来嗷！
Ahaha, alright!=啊哈哈，好！
General Store Lady=百货商店女主人
Soldier Donnie=士兵多尼
Let's see, I'm pretty sure the hill in this direction has a bunch of different herbs...=我觉得山的这侧会有些许奇珍草药...
Eek!=哎呀！
Uh, ugh... Hey, what are these green squirmy things...?=呃，呃... 啊，这些绿色蠕动的东西是什么...？
Slimes...? There weren't this many when I was last here..=史莱姆...？我上次来的时候才没有这么多呢...
Ugh, they're so slimy... I can't stand these things. Welp, I guess I'm not getting any herbs today.=呃，它们太粘了...真受不了啊。嗯，看来今天没法采集草药了。
Mister merchant is going to be disappointed in me...=老板会对我失望的...

Huh!? Wh-What makes you say... Did the merchant's wife tell you...?=噫噫！？你，你为什么这么说... 老板的妻子告诉你的吗...？
I heard her talking loud and clear. She was practically shouting in front of the house. I know full well I dress plainly, but men who are attracted to flashy girls usually aren't any good.=我听见她说的话了，真是洪亮而清晰的嗓门啊。她就差在房子前面大喊大叫了。我很清楚我穿得很朴素，但被花哨女孩吸引的男人通常都不是好人。
I-I see... Ahaha...=我，我明白了... 啊哈哈...
*Sigh* I appreciate you worrying about me, but don't you have anyone you're interested in?=*唉*，我很感激你为我担心，不过你没有感兴趣的对象吗？
Your friend Olivia from the blacksmith family married a man from the royal capital when she was around your age, so I don't think you're too young for marriage.=你的朋友奥莉薇娅，铁匠家族出身，在你这么大的时候嫁给了一个王都男人。\n所以我觉得你现在结婚也不早了。
Well... I don't really have any boys I like... I mean, Donny is about the only young man in this village who's single...=嗷呜...我真的没有喜欢的男孩... 多尼是这个村子里唯一单身的年轻男性啊...
There are no other girls around my age either. Olivia was the only one.=也没有别的女孩和我同龄。仅有奥莉薇娅一个。
I guess so... Olivia was so eager to move to the city, she spent so much time talking to travelers and trying to find a husband. It made sense though. She lost her family to the flux...=是啊...奥莉薇娅非常渴望搬到城里，所以她花了很多时间在和与旅行者交谈，想找个丈夫。\n不过这也很合理。她在疫情中失去了家人...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Right... Around the time I was born, a lot of elderly people and small children died during an epidemic...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>对了... 大概在我出生的时候，很多老年人和小孩死于一场瘟疫...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>My parents apparently died from it, too...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我的父母显然也死于此...)
Hey, Ricca. Have you ever thought about leaving this village? I recently had a customer from the eastern port town saying they were looking for new help to hire.=哎，莉卡你有没有想过要离开村子？最近有位来自东部港口城镇的客户说，\n他们在找新的助手呢。
I have some money saved up, so if you want to, we could get you a place to live in the port town. Or maybe a young lady like you would prefer the capital?=我存了些钱，如果你想的话，我可以在港口城市给你找个地方住。还是说你这样的年轻女孩更喜欢去王都么？
Hmm, the port town, huh... That's near the ocean, right? I'm not good at swimming, though... The capital has too many people, too. I got dizzy in those crowds when we went to visit Olivia for her wedding.=嗯，港口小镇，呵... 就在海边对吗？不过我不擅长游泳...王都的人也太多了。\n我们去参观奥莉薇娅的婚礼那阵子，我在人群里挤得头很晕啊。
I see... Then how about the town in the west? I heard they have a very fine church there.=我懂了... 那西边的城镇呢？那里有很美的教堂。
Isn't that town in the neighboring kingdom? I'm not interested in that place, either.=那不是隔壁王国的城镇吗？我对那里也不感兴趣。
Hey, Miria... Why are you trying to get me to move...? Oh... Am I...a burden to you?=哎，姐姐...你为什么想要让我搬走...？ 哦...难道我是...你的负担吗？
Urk, *Sniff*... You want me out of the house... Don't you...?=呜呜，*抽泣*... 你想让我走... 是吗...？
I cost too much money to feed. That's why you hate me... Whaaaaaah!=供养我花的钱太多。所以你讨厌我了... 哇啊啊啊啊！
That's not true... I don't hate you... But if you keep living in the village, every day will be just like any other day. We'll both end up as old ladies before we know it.=胡说... 我才没有讨厌你呢... 但是如果你继续住在村子里，每天都会是一成不变。不知不觉，我们都会变成老太太啦。
Ahaha! You're exaggerating. Besides, I wouldn't mind that.=啊哈哈！你太夸张了。更何况我不介意的。
I would. Our parents in heaven will be sad if both of us die single...=我会介意的。如果我们两个都形单影只地死去，我们在天的父母会伤心啊...
I don't want you to go through the loneliness I had to.=我不想再让你经历我所经历的孤独。
Are you talking about that again? Wouldn't you be lonely if I left you and started living on my own, Miria?=你又来了？如果我离开你独自生活，姐姐你就不会再孤独了吗？
Well... I might... But if it means you'll have a happy family of your own, I can put up with it.=呃... 我可能会吧... 但如果这样你能有幸福的家庭，我可以忍受嘛。
You say that, but I doubt it. Heehee! And I'm already plenty happy right now!=你是这么说的，但我持怀疑态度。 嘻嘻！而且我现在已经很开心了。
Helping out at the shop is fun, and I don't get bored of playing with Polon and the forest animals. I'm even getting a little fatter from all the delicious meals I eat...=在商店帮忙很有意思，我并不会厌倦和泼隆和森林里的动物嬉戏。\n何况我吃过这么多好吃的，变得有点儿胖了...
I guess the only thing I want is for my sister to stop being a worrywart and give me more independence.=我唯一想做的就是不再让我姐姐忧心忡忡，让我独立一些。
Geez...=天哪...
One week after Ricca got rid of the slimes in the mountains...=莉卡摆脱山上的史莱姆一周后...
I'm sorry to trouble you. The customers really like the herbs served with our dishes...=抱歉又要麻烦你。顾客们真的很喜欢菜里的植物...
Okay, so you want me to get the same kinds as last time?=你想让我采和上次同一种的植物吗？
That would be great... Um, Ricca, the mountains have...=很好... 嗯，莉卡，山上有...
I know, I know. I'll be careful not to trip, and I'll come back right away if I see any monsters.=我知道，我知道。我会小心不要绊倒，如果我看到任何魔物，会马上回来。
Okay... As long as you understand... But I'm worried. A girl like you shouldn't be running around like a tomboy in patched clothes...=好哦... 你明白就好... 我很担心你。女孩不应该像个穿着补丁衣服的假小子，到处乱跑...
(<indent%3D0.4em>T-Tomboy...? Did she find out about how I beat up those smiles the other day...!?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>假，假小子...? 她是不是知道了我那天殴打史莱姆...!)
Urk... Geez, Miria! You're so persistent! Anyway, are you working at the dining hall again in the afternoon today?=额...天啊，姐姐！别喋喋不休的！对了，你今天下午还在餐厅工作吗？
Oh, actually, I'm not. I have today off, so I'm thinking of cleaning the church until evening.=呃，其实我今天休息，所以我想打扫一天教堂。
Okay... What about dinner?=哦哦... 那晚餐吃啥？
I'll have some bean soup and bread ready with a side of tomato salad.=豆子汤和面包，外加番茄沙拉。
Hmm... Soup, bread, and tomato salad... Huh!? What!? Tomato salad!?=嗯...汤、面包和番茄沙拉... 呵！？什么！？番茄沙拉！？
The merchant's wife gave me a bunch yesterday. We need to eat them before they spoil.=老板的妻子昨天给了我些柿子。要在变质之前吃掉啊。
Couldn't you put them in the soup? You know I don't like raw tomatoes...=你能不把它们放进汤里吗？你明明晓得我不喜欢生西红柿的...
I do, but you shouldn't be a picky eater. I've already prepared the beans, so give the raw tomatoes a try, okay? You might find out you actually like them.=是能放，但你不应该挑食。我已经准备好豆子了，所以试试生西红柿，好吗？\n你可能会很喜欢。
No way... *Sniff*... I think tomato soup would be better... Tomatoes have slimy stuff around their seeds... Urk... *Sniff*=番茄汤...*抽泣*... 不可能喜欢... 番茄的种子周围有黏黏的东西啊... 呃...*抽泣*
*Sigh* Fake crying isn't going to work on me. It's about time you stopped being a picky eater.=*唉*，装哭对我没用。你不该再挑食了啊。
Whaaat? Well, fine! If you're not going to make tomato soup, I'm not going to talk to you anymore.=啥啥？好吧，行啊！你要是不做番茄汤，我就不跟你说话了。
You're acting like a child again...=你又像个孩子了...
Hmph! I hate my no-soup sister...! I'm not talking to you!=哼！我可不喜欢不做汤的姐姐...！不跟你说话了！
Ah... Ricca...=啊... 莉卡...
Be careful...=小心...

Tomato salad for dinner, huh... No, I'm sure Miria will make soup instead.=晚餐吃番茄沙拉，嗯... 不会的，姐姐会做别的汤。
Maybe saying I wasn't going to talk to her was a little childish... I'll apologize when I get home...=要挟不跟她说话也许太孩子气了... 我回家后会道歉的...
Alright... This should be enough herbs for Miria.=好了... 这些应该足够了。

Hmm... I'll worry Miria if I come back home late. I don't want her to nag at me either... I better head back soon.=嗯... 如果我回家晚了，姐姐会担心的。我不想听她唠叨... 最好快点回去。
But thank goodness I didn't see any slimes today. Anyway, I should start heading home.=谢天谢地，今天没有史莱姆。不管怎样，我该回家了。

She's pretty too... What's this on her back? Wings...? She looks like those fairies I saw in my book.=而且也很漂亮... 她背上是什么？翅膀...？她长得和我在书中看到的妖精一样欸。

I-I mean, I think my breasts are pretty big, too... I'm sure they'll grow more! I'm Miria's sister, after all!=我，我觉得吧，我的胸也很大... 我相信它们会长大的！我毕竟是蜜莉雅的妹妹！
If I just eat more, they'll get bigger in no time... Hey, what am I even talking about? Hehehe...=如果我多吃点，很快就会变大... 嗨，我在说什么？呵呵...

A brooch and a doll... I wonder if someone dropped them. But people from the village rarely come this way...=胸针和娃娃... 是不是有人掉的。但是村里的人很少走这条路...
Well, if a traveler dropped this, I bet he'll stop by the village, so it's fine if I take these back with me for now, right?=好吧，如果旅行者丢了这个，估计他会在村子附近停下，我现在把这些带回去也没关系吧？
Hmm... This fairy doll is cute, but a little too risque... It would be kinda awkward to use her as an ornament in the house...=呃...这个妖精娃娃好可爱，但有伤风化啊... 把她当成家里的装饰品会有点羞耻...
After I make up with Miria, I'll ask her to teach me how to make a little dress for her.=我和姐姐和好后，我好让她教教我怎么做一件小裙子。
A lot of strange things have been happening lately... A bunch of slimes appeared, magical letters written in light came out of nowhere, and now I find a brooch and a doll...=最近发生了很多奇怪的事情... 一堆史莱姆冒了出来，光柱写下的魔法浮空文字\n不知从哪里冒了出来，现在又发现了胸针和娃娃...

Maybe it has something to do with how the monsters are getting restless... No, probably just a coincidence.=也许这与魔物们变得不安有关系... 嗨，也可能只是巧合罢。
Maybe I'm turning into a worrywart like Miria... Heehee, "Ricca, you be careful in the mountains..." Teehee...=可能我变得和姐姐一样爱担心了... 嘿嘿，“莉卡，你在山里要小心...” 嘻嘻...

What do I do!? If I leave her here, she might get eaten by an animal or a slime...=我该怎么办！？如果我把她留在这里，她可能会被动物或史莱姆吃掉...
I think I'll take her back to the village for now. Miria might know what to...=我现在要带她回村子去。姐姐可能知道该怎么做...

=========动作============================
<b>Pause the game</b>\r\n Keyboard:Escape Key Controller:12 Button\r\n You can click the pause button in the top right corner of the screen to pause as well.=<b>暂停游戏</b>\r\n 键盘：Esc键 手柄：12按钮\n 您也可以单击屏幕右上角的暂停按钮。
Slimes!? When did they get here...?=史莱姆！？它们什么时候到这儿的...？
Were they attacking the village!? Is that why I didn't see them in the mountains...?=它们在攻击村子吗！？怪不得我在山上没看到它们...？
D-Did these slimes do all this...?=史莱姆们，把村子搞得一塌糊涂...？
No, even I was able to beat them easily. The whole village would've been able to take them on...=不，就连我也能轻松打败他们。整个村子都能对付他们...
<b>Special attack「Throw Magic Stone」</b>\r\n Keyboard:C Key<line-height%3D100%>\r\n Controller:2 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nThrow a Magic Stone that you've picked up.<line-height%3D100%>\r\nYou will lose a Magic Stone with each throw.=<b>特殊攻击「投掷魔石」</b>\r\n 键盘：C键<line-height%3D100%>/手柄：2按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n 扔出捡到的魔法石。<line-height%3D100%>每次投掷损失一块魔法石。
The buildings are on fire... This... This isn't the work of slimes...=房子烧起来了...这...这不会是史莱姆做的...
Isn't that fallen person over there... It's the merchant...! What's that thing next to him...?=那边那个倒下的人是... 老板...！他旁边的那些玩意儿是啥...？
Green skin...? That must be...a goblin...! Those are monsters who attack villages and kill humans...and do terrible things to women...=绿色皮肤...？一定是...哥布林...！那些魔物攻击村庄，杀死人类...还会对女人做可怕的事...
But I thought Donny said there weren't any goblins around this area... Why...?=但我记得多尼说这附近没有哥布林... 为什么？

I should leave the village... I can try to get to the house from the other side by traveling along the mountain cliff...=我应该离开村子... 我可以试着沿着山崖走，从另一边回到家...
Captain! I saw a human woman around here!=队长！我在这附近看到一个人类女人！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Uh oh...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>完犊子...)
There are still women here!? Let's split and find her!=这里还有女人！？我们分头去找吧！

I-In that case... I'm gonna get home and then run to the mountain cliff...! I can take on one monster...!=如果那样的话... 我要回家，然后跑向山崖...！我可以对付一个魔物...！
<b>Weak and strong attacks</b>\r\n Attacking while standing still will allow you to unleash quick weak attacks\r\n and attacking while moving will allow you to unleash strong attacks.\r\n Strong attacks are slow and tend to leave you vulnerable\r\n so be sure to watch your enemy's movements closely before using them.=<b>弱攻击和强攻击</b>\r\n 站着不动时进行攻击以发动快速的弱攻击\n 移动时进行攻击以发动强攻击。\n 强攻击很缓慢，往往会让你有所破绽\n 所以在使用前，一定要仔细观察敌人的行动。
Haa... Haa... I beat him...=哈... 哈... 我打败他了...
Hurry... I need to get home!=快点... 我得回家了！
<b>Life Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting red heart crystals\r\n will restore your HP.=<b>生命结晶</b>\r\n 收集心型水晶\n 将回复你的HP。
<b>Game over</b>\r\n When Ricca is defeated by a monster,\r\n the remaining number of Continues will decrease.\r\n You can see how many continues you have from the pause menu.\r\n (It's the number next to the sword icon in the top-right)\r\n When your remaining number of continues hits 0,\r\n it'll be game over and you'll be returned to the stage select menu.=<b>游戏失败</b>\r\n 莉卡被魔物打败时，继续重试的次数将减少。\n 可以从暂停菜单中查看\n (右上角剑图标旁边的数字)\n 当你剩余的继续次数达到0时，\n 再次游戏失败后，你将返回选择关卡界面。
Wait... Could Miria be... No, no way...=等下...  姐姐会不会... 不，不可能...
I'm here... Miria...?=我来了... 姐姐...？

It must have resurrected after we beat it at the village. We should have made sure it was dead.=它肯定是复活了。之前应该补个刀的。

Chapter 5    The Revived Stone Giant=第 5 章    复活的石傀儡
We're so close to reaching the forest at the foot of the mountain, too... Ouch... Ack... It didn't hurt this much earlier...=我们也快到山脚下的森林了... 哎哟... 啧... 之前可没这么疼...
Your body is strengthened with holy power during battle and suppresses pain so you can focus on fighting. Is this the spot the beetle horn hit you?=你的身体在战斗中会被神圣力量强化，并可以抑制疼痛，这样你可以专注于战斗。这是甲虫的角击中你的地方吗？
Eek! Th-That's it. Ouch... Hnnngh... Owww... Huff... Huff... Be gentle with it...=哎呀！就，就是那块。哎哟... 嗯... 哦... 呼... 呼... 温柔一点...
Oh, sorry.=哦，对不起。
Ugh... Will you stop slapping it?=呃... 你能不能别拍了？
*Sigh* How does it look? It's not bleeding and it doesn't hurt as long as I don't move it, so it's not too bad, right?=*唉* 看起来怎么样？只要我不动就不会流血，也不会痛。不算太糟，对吧？
Well, from the looks of it... Your bone isn't badly broken, but it might have a fracture. You should rest until it heals.=从表面上看... 你的骨头没有严重损伤，但可能骨折了。你应该休息到痊愈。
Don't worry, you just have to wait for the holy knight healing powers to kick in.=别担心，只需要等待圣骑士的治疗能力发挥作用。
A fracture in my bone...!? It's that bad!? No wonder it hurt... How long do I have to wait?=我骨折了...！？这么糟糕！？难怪疼呢... 我要等多久？
If you focus your magic on your injury, it should take about half a day. If we want to be safe, though, we should rest for a whole day.=如果你把你的魔法集中在你的伤上，需要大约半天的时间。如果我们想安全些，\n就该休息一整天。
That long? I just recovered from running a moment ago, too... I need to go save Miria...=太久了吧？我已经刚从跑动中恢复过来了... 我得去救姐姐...
If you were a normal human, this would take you months to recover from. I know you're in a hurry, but we can't go forward if you can't fight monsters. Don't leave your guard down next time.=如果你是正常人类，需要几个月的时间来恢复。我知道你赶时间，但如果你不能和魔物战斗，我们就不能前进。下次不要放松警惕。
Shortly after resuming their travels...=在重新继续旅行后不久...
Oww... That hell beetle came out of nowhere and hit my leg... I managed to beat it, but...=哦呜呜... 那只地狱甲虫不知从哪儿冒出来，砸了我的腿，我设法打败了它，但是...
You had your guard down. I know you're worried about your sister, but that's what you get for being impatient. Now show me where you got hurt.=你放松了警惕。我知道你很担心你姐姐，但这就是没耐心的下场。告诉我你哪里受伤了。
Ngh... Okay... I understand...=嗯... 可以... 我理解...
...I'm sorry...Miria...=...我很抱歉...姐姐...
Fine, fine. Just give me a sec.=得，得了。等我一下。
We have Magic Stones... I prefer to use these for creating equipment and strengthening abilities, but...=有魔法石... 我其实更喜欢用这些来创造装备和增强能力，但是...
Here's a Life Crystal. Just sprinkle the recovery magic inside this thing over your injury and it'll heal in the blink of an eye.=这是一个生命结晶。只要在你的伤口上用上恢复魔法，就会在眨眼间愈合。
Wow... Did you make that crystal out of Magic Stones?=哇！那水晶是你用魔法石做的吗？
Yes. You can use Magic Stones to strengthen your holy knight abilities and make other useful crystals for battle.=对。你可以使用魔法石来加强你的圣骑士能力，并为战斗制造其他有用的水晶。
I thought you humans knew about this too.=我以为你们人类知道呢。
Now that you mention it, I think I saw something about that in a book at the general store. The mayor told me about it a long time ago, too.=既然你提到了，我想起来我在杂货店的一本书中看过这些。村长很久以前也告诉过我这件事。
Hehe... So that's why the travelers that visit my village buy Magic Stones. They were using them to make crystals like this.=呵呵... 来我们村的游客会买魔法石，原来是要用来制作这样的晶体。
Most likely. Converting Magic Stones into other crystals takes a couple of steps, but anyone can do it once they get the hang of it. I'll teach you too.=很有可能。将魔法石转化为其他水晶需要几个步骤，但任何人只要掌握了窍门就可以做到。我也会教你的。
Oh, really? I'd love to know.=哦，真的吗？我很想了解一下。
Heheh, I'm fine with teaching you, but making useful crystals takes a lot of Magic Stones. That'll mean fewer stones for strengthening abilities and creating equipment, so you better keep your priorities in mind.=呵呵，我很乐意教，但制作有用的水晶需要很多魔法石。同时用于增强能力和创造装备的话魔法石就会不足，所以你最好晓得哪个更优先。
There's a sword stuck in the ground... Huh? This sword looks a lot like the magic sword that I throw...=有一把剑插在地里... 呵？这把剑看起来很像我扔的魔法剑...
Eeep...! My brooch gem... It feels hot...=哎呀...! 我的胸针宝石... 感觉好热...
This is... It's the remnants of the legendary holy knight's power! The power from your brooch is resonating with it.=这是... 这是传奇圣骑士的力量残余！胸针的力量和它产生了共鸣。
Legendary holy knight...? You mean the knight from the fairy tale?=传奇圣骑士...？你是说童话里的骑士吗？
Yes, your predecessor must have fought monsters on these grounds, too.=是啊，你的前辈肯定也在这里和魔物打过仗。
That reminds me - try touching this magic sword. It'll give you the memories that dwell in it and you'll learn a new skill.=提醒我了，试试触摸这把魔法剑。它会传递给你一项新技能的记忆。
A new skill? So I'll learn new magic, like Sword Throw?=一项新技能？那我能学习新的魔法，像掷剑那种?
Exactly. See how some of your skills are gray? Typically, it would take a person years of training to learn those skills, but you'll be able to use them right away once you gain the memories of them from swords like these.=完全正确。看到你的一些技能是灰色的了吗?通常情况下，以个人需要经过多年的训练才能学会这些技能，\n但一旦你从这些剑中获得了这些技能记忆，就可以马上使用它们。
Hmm... That sounds kinda complicated and weird...but I get it. If I touch a sword that's sticking out from the ground, I can learn a new skill.=嗯... 好复杂好奇怪... 但我懂了。只要我碰到伸出地面的剑，我就能学到一项新技能啊。

————————————————————————————————————————【NOVEL】第五话-Miria的秘密开始————————————————————————————
Nnnnh... Haaa... Urk...=嗯... 哈... 呜...
When the goblins appeared, I staggered up the bell tower in horror and rang the bell over and over.=当哥布林出现时，我惊恐地摇摇晃晃爬上钟楼，一次又一次地敲钟。
Yet no one came to save me. I tried to fight back by throwing whatever I could grab at them, but I was still captured.=然而没有人来救我。我试图向他们扔手边所有能用来反击的东西，但我还是被抓住了。
After I was taken out of the church, they tied my hands and feet. I was loaded onto a cart and I road the bumpy mountain path for hours.=我被带出教堂后，他们捆住了我的手脚。我被装上一辆手推车，在崎岖的山路上走了几个小时。
I twisted my body in an attempt to escape whenever the goblins turned their backs on me. My struggle left my hair a mess and my body exhausted.=每当哥布林们背对着我时，我就扭着身子试图逃跑。我挣扎得头发凌乱，身体疲惫不堪。
Aye! I'm back, fellas!=是！我回来了，伙计们！
Khehehe! Captain! How did your mission go!?=呵呵！队长！你的任务进展如何！？
I found the human that Master Archlich told us about. I ordered the golem to capture it, but I'm not sure if that will work.=我找到了阿奎雷奇说的那个人。我命令石傀儡捕捉她，但不确定有没有用。
I see... Then did you capture this woman by mistake? What should we do with her?=哦哦... 那你是不是抓错了这个女人？我们该拿她怎么办？
The green demi-humans snicker as they look at me...=绿色半人看着我窃笑...
All the other people from the village who were caught by the goblins were killed, but I was kept alive. They seemed to have mistaken me for someone.=村里其他所有被哥布林抓到的人都被杀了，但我还活着。他们好像把我错当成什么人了。
But now that they realize they have the wrong person, I'm probably going to be killed, too...=但现在他们意识到找错人了，我可能会被杀掉...
Khehehehe, I've never seen a woman with such a hot body... Can we have a go at her?=呵呵呵，我从没见过有这么性感的身体的女人... 我们能拿她的身体试试吗？
No, take her to the fortress. She's probably related to the human we're looking for, so she might come in handy...=不，带她去要塞。她可能和我们要找的人有关系，所以可能会派上用场...
(<indent%3D0.4em>What...? Related...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>什么...？有关系...？)
My parents died of the flux, and my other relatives live in a town far away. The only other family I had in my village was...=父母患病去世，其他亲戚住在很远的城镇。我在村里的唯一亲属就是...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Oh, Ricca... She must be safe... Thank goodness... But why...? Why are they looking for her...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>哦，莉卡... 她一定很安全... 谢天谢地... 但为什么...？他们为什么要找她...？)
She's just a girl living in a mountain village. What could the goblins ever want her for?=她只是一个住在山村的女孩。哥布林要她干什么？
Did they mistake her for another person? Or...=他们把她错当成另一个人了吗？或者...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Is this because...I prayed to God...at the church? Is this a test...? No... A punishment? Why...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>是因为... 我在教堂...向阳神祈祷？这是测试吗...？不... 是天罚？但是为什么...？)
Although my heart was still filled with uneasiness, I felt relieved to know my sister was safe, and that the goblins would not kill me.=虽然我的心仍然充满了不安，但当我得知妹妹很安全，哥布林不会杀我时，还是松了一口气。
However, weakened by fatigue and fear, I was close to losing consciousness.=然而，由于疲劳和恐惧，我几乎失去了知觉。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... Ah... Uugh... Ricc...a...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>呜... 啊... 啊...Ricc...a ...)
As my gaze naturally lowered from drowsiness, I saw the necklace I obtained from the merchant via Ricca.=我的目光从睡意中自然地垂下，我看到了我通过莉卡从商人那里得到的项链。
In my fading consciousness, I recalled the day we were given that bewitching pendant with the colorful gem.=在我渐渐淡出的意识中，我回忆起有一天，我们得到了那件带有彩色宝石的迷人吊坠。
Haa... Aaahnn... Ah... Nooo...=哈... 啊嗯... 啊... 不...
Bwahaha, it's been a while since you made a move on me, Miss Miria. You're not doing this just because I gave you that necklace, right?=卟哈哈，你已经有一段时间没有对我采取行动了，Miria小姐。你不会是因为我给了你那条项链就这么做吧？
I was at the village's general store in the middle of the night, lingerie, my body penetrated by a middle-aged man with a nasty laugh.=三更半夜时，我在村里的百货商店，穿着贴身内衣裤，身体被一个发出下流笑声的中年男人插入。
Ah... Nnnh, yes... Because of the monsters, fewer travelers visit the village now... Aaah...=啊...嗯，是... 由于有魔物，现在来这个村子旅游的人越来越少了... 啊...
When I was Ricca's age, I was sick of all the men looking at my breasts and butt.=我像Ricca这么大的时候，我讨厌任何男人盯着我的胸部和屁股看。
I started selling my alluring body to travelers and merchants visiting the village five or six years ago.=五六年前，我开始向来村子的游客和商人卖春。
Ricca was growing and needed more food, as well as items to care for her appearance as a young woman. Money started to become tight.=莉卡正在长身体，需要更多食物，还有让她作为女生正常成长的物品。手头变得很紧张。
I work as a waitress and cook in the daytime at the dining hall, handing out letters to customers who might be interested in me, when serving with their meals. At night, I invite them over to the church.=我白天在餐厅做服务员和厨师，在用餐时给可能对我感兴趣的顾客递信。我邀请他们晚上去到教堂。
This evening job is kept secret from Ricca, of course.=这个晚上的工作当然是对莉卡保密的。
Nnn, haah... Because there are fewer travelers... I haven't been able to earn much money... Aaah... I can only rely...nnnh...on you...=嗯，哈... 因为旅行者少了... 我没能挣到多少钱... 啊... 我只能靠... 嗯... 你...
I avoid travelers who visit often so as not to make regular customers, and since no one comes to the church in the middle of the night, I doubt the villagers know about my evening work.=我避开经常来的游客，这样就不会形成常客，而且因为没有人半夜来教堂，我怀疑村民们不知道我晚上的工作。
Either that or they avoid me out of fear, still believing in that rumor, over ten years after my parents' deaths... They think that my family brought the flux into this village.=要么就是他们因为害怕而躲着我，在我父母去世十多年后，他们仍然相信那个谣言...他们认为是我的家人把病带进了这个村子。
They all avoid us, except for this man fucking me...=他们都躲着我，除了那个和我上床的男人...
I see, my shop's struggling from the drop in business, too... Huff, huff... It's been a while since I last fucked you, but your pussy's still as good as ever!=我知道了，我的商店也在因为生意不好而难以维持... 呼，呼... 已经有一段时间没跟你上床了，你的小穴还是一如既往的好！
Aah, Aaaah... Thank you...very much... Aah...=啊，啊... 非常... 感谢... 啊...
I stay respectful and thank the general store's owner. With so few travelers visiting the village these days, I have to be careful not to offend the few good customers I have.=我很尊重并感谢杂货店的老板。这些天来村子里旅游的人太少了，我必须小心，不能冒犯到我仅有的几个好客户。
Huff, huff... But I thought you quit doing this job? That's what you told me a month ago when I asked you for your service.=呼，呼... 但我以为你不干了呢，一个月前，我请求你的服务时，你就这么告诉我。
Ricca's a big girl now. Huff, huff... And I give her extra pay, so I doubt you two are struggling to get by.=莉卡现在是个大女孩了。呼，呼... 我给了她额外的薪水，所以我怀疑你们两个不会很难过日子。
Nnn... I... Ah... Appreciate that... Ah, nnnh... But... Haa, aah... I want to...send her to the capital as soon as possible...=嗯... 我... 啊... 感谢... 你，嗯... 但是... 哈，啊... 我想... 尽快送她去王都...
This village is nothing compared to the town we used to live in before moving.=这个村子和我们搬家前住过的那个镇子相比简直是一文不值。
A girl at her age should go out into a bustling town to learn instead of being stuck in a boring village.=像她这样年纪的女孩应该到一个繁华的小镇里去学习，而不是被拘束在一个无聊的村子里。
And just like Olivia from the blacksmith's family, she might get a chance to meet rich men in the city.=就像铁匠家里的奥莉薇娅，她可能有机会在城里遇到有钱人。
Aaah... Nnn... Ah, haaa... But she's being stubborn about going to the city...=啊... 嗯... 啊，哈... 但她固执地不愿去城里...
Nnn... So I thought I'd go with her... I'm worried about letting her live on her own, too...=嗯... 所以我想我得和她一起去... 也担心她能否独立...
I understand how shameless it is to use this body my parents gave me to have sex with men in exchange for money.=我明白用父母给予我的身体和男人做爱来换取金钱是多么可耻。
But my greatest wish is to make Ricca happy.=但我最大的愿望就是莉卡能幸福。

I can feel a massive flow of magic energy from inside that cave... That demon woman's magic is coming from deep in there, too...=我感受到那个洞穴里面的巨大魔法能量流动... 那二个恶魔女人的魔法也来自洞穴深处...

Nnngh... I'm okay. I feel a little feverish, but I can handle it. I can still fight.=嗯嗯...我没事。我很好。我有点发热，但我能应付。我还能战斗。

Is that a cart for carrying stone? It's not too rusted... It might still move.=那是运石头的车吗？没有锈得太厉害...可能还能移动。

Those bugs emit electricity. If you attack them while they're discharging, you're going to get electrocuted.=这些虫子会发电。小心，在它们放电的时候攻击它们很危险。
Electricity... You mean lightning power? I might go numb if I touch them...=电...你的意思是雷电的力量？如果我触碰到，我可能会被电麻...
Exactly. If you do get electrocuted, you'll lose your ability to move for a moment.=没错。如果你真的触电了，你会暂时失去移动能力。
It must be like the magic Miria used... Her lightning made my head flash and my whole body feel like it was on fire. It hurt so much...=这一定跟姐姐用的魔法一样...她的闪电让我的脑袋一麻，我整个身体就像着火了一样。太疼了...
There you go whining again... It's true that she uses strong lightning magic, but you're protected by divine power. You should be able to endure it.=你又在发牢骚了...她确实用了强大的闪电魔法，但你有神力保护应该能忍受住。

That's a roper. They use their long tentacles to capture approaching prey. You better get out of their grasp as fast as you can if you get caught by them. Otherwise, they'll eat you up.=那是一个套索触手。它们用长长的触手捕捉接近的猎物。如果你被抓住了，你最好尽快逃离它的控制。\n否则，它们会吃掉你。注意下。

You know, Ricca... I've very happy that you came to see me. I thought I would have to go pick you up myself. You're still a spoiled child, I see... *Giggle*=你知道的，莉卡...我很高兴你来看我。我还以为我得亲自去接你。\n你依旧是个被宠坏的孩子，我明白了... *笑*

But when I look back at it now, I don't know why it bothered me so much. When I turned into a monster, I realized that all I ever wanted was to see you become happy with a nice family of your own...=但是，我现在回头看时，我不知道什么在困扰着我。当我变成一个魔物，我才意识到，\n我所想要的一切只是看到你幸福地拥有一个家庭...

I knew everyone was judging us, so I wanted to be the best sister I could be to the child my parents left behind. I sacrificed everything, and put up with every difficult, annoying, painful thing life threw at me!=我知道每个人都在谈论我们，所以我想成为我父母留下的孩子中最好的姐姐。我牺牲了一切，忍受着生活抛给我的一切困难、烦恼、痛苦的事情!
And as I spent my life living like that, I lost myself... I forgot what I even liked or wanted!=当我这样过日子的时候，我迷失了...忘了我到底喜欢什么，想要什么了!

Archlich took all my magic...and the brooch made from Iris' precious friends broke... *Sniff* Besides, my own strength isn't enough to defeat Archlich...=魔力被阿奎雷奇全部夺走了... 伊莉丝同族们的重要的胸针也坏掉了... 咕嘶... 而且仅凭我的力量，也无法打败阿奎雷奇...
No...=不...
You haven't lost the power to fight... As long as you still have the will to fight, that brooch, that contains the hopes of all the fairies, will continue to grant you power.=你还没有，丧失战斗的力量... 只要你尚未放弃反抗的意志，那聚集着妖精们希望的胸针便会继续给予你力量。
And even more importantly, you have people who will lend you their strength to defeat that great evil...!=而且，更重要的是，你已有为了打倒邪恶而借助力量之人...！

Now, rise. Don't give up... I'm sure that you, who have already overcome so many cruel trials, will be able to...=撒，站起来，不要放弃... 已经跨越无数苦难的你一定能...

Am I still dreaming inside the church...?=教堂里看到的梦，还在继续吗......

(<indent%3D0.4em>Miria...told me to help people... If I do, everyone will love me...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>姐姐也...说了要我拯救大家... 这样的话，大家也会爱着我...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>If I give up here...no one's going to praise me even if we see each other in heaven...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>既然如此，如果在这里放弃的话...即使在天堂遇到大家和姐姐，他们也不会夸我吧...)
Everyone else is still fighting... I have to go back... I have to help them...!=大家还在，战斗着... 不回去的话... 我，要拯救大家！
I'm so glad you accepted...=你能燃起斗志真是太好了...
After losing those close to her, that girl subjected herself to rigorous training from dawn to dusk, distancing herself from the other fairies.=自从重要之人死亡之后，那孩子整天进行着严格的修行，自觉和妖精的同伴们保持着距离。
You managed to open her heart, and with her, made it all the way here.=能和那样的她搞好关系，携手走到这里了。
Thank you so much for being friends with Iris...=谢谢你，能喜欢上伊莉丝...
If you had just been killed in that cave along with your sister, you wouldn't have had to endure such pain... You probably would have been happy drowning in pleasure... Mwahahaha!=如果你能在洞穴里和你姐姐一起被我杀掉的话，就不需要像现在这么痛苦... 不对，不如说如此沉溺在快感中幸福着吧... 呼哈哈哈哈！

Ugh... Nngh... Ah...=呜... 咳呜......啊啊......
I've sucked out all of your magic. Do you plan to throw your life away, using that husk of yours to try and transform into a knight?=你的魔力已经被我吸空了。用这干涸的身体，变成骑士，是不要命了吗？
Do you truly believe there is still hope? How unsightly... You must be nearing the end of your life... Now, face oblivion!=是觉得还有微弱的希望吗，真可悲... 不过是须臾的生命而已...... 消失吧！
Ugh, aaaugh... I won't let you...!=呜，呜呜... 休想...！
Kyaaaaaah!=呀啊啊啊啊啊！
Ah... I...ris... Uuugh...!=啊... 伊... ...莉丝... 呜呜...！
Little gnat...! How irritating...!=小虫子，真碍眼...
St...op......that!=快...停...下！
That's...enough...! Ugh, nngh... Huff... Huff... How dare you hurt Iris...!=到此为止...了...！呜，咳... 哈啊...哈啊... 竟敢把伊莉丝...！
Such determination... Even though I took your magic... Mwahahaha! You're still going to get up...?!=居然如此执着... 明明魔力已经被夺走了... 呼哈哈哈哈，居然还能站起来啊...！
Huff... Huff... Ugh... Nnngh...=哈啊...哈啊... 呜...咳...
Oho, I see that bauble of yours is disrupting the dark magic gathering at the gate... I guess your God isn't completely resourceless...=吼，胸针居然在掠夺着聚集在大门的暗之魔力吗... 看来你的神也不是无谋的啊...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... Nnngha... My body feels hot... What is this sensation...!? This isn't the holy knight powers... Ah... I feel sick...! My curse...feels like it's burning...!)=(<indent%3D0.4em>呜... 咳... 身体好热...这感觉，是什么...！？...并非圣骑士的力量... 啊... 好难受...！身体的诅咒... 好热...！)
Even if a servant of the light absorbs dark magic that is foreign to her body, the best she can do is stand... What do you expect to fight me with...?=阳光的使者吸收进不熟悉的黑暗力量的话，即使站起来都很费劲了吗... 甚至连一把剑都召唤不出来...
Nnnghaaa... Haa... Nngh!=嗯哈啊... 哈啊... 咳...！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Is the brooch broken...after all...!? No... I trust in God... I still trust in Iris' friends...!)=(<indent%3D0.4em>果然，胸针是... 坏掉了吗...！？不...我要相信神明大人... 相信伊莉丝的同族们...！)
Lowly girl... How fitting to see you crawling on the floor, dribbling lewd fluids from your crotch!=下贱的小娘们啊，还是下面流着爱液，趴在地上的样子才更适合你！
Ngh...?! What is this torrent of magic...?!=奴哦...！怎么回事，这股魔力的奔流...！
Huh...? This light... Huff... Huff... It's Claret... It's the crystal ball...!=欸... 这个光...哈啊...哈啊... 柯蕾露酱的...水晶球...！？
Ricca... Can you hear me...?=莉卡小姐... 能听到吗...？
Ricca...! The soldiers and I are currently sending you our magic energy through the crystal ball...=莉卡小姐...！我现在，正通过水晶球把我和士兵们的魔力传送过去...
You are...? B-But aren't you surrounded by monsters right now...!?=柯蕾露酱你们... 不，不是被魔物包围了吗...！？
Yes... The whole place is crawling with monsters. We can't hang on for much longer... That's why we're entrusting you with our strength...!=对... 这里到处都是魔物。肯定已经没救了呢... 所以，我们的力量就交付给莉卡小姐...！
It may be nothing...compared to the strength you have...but if it can help you defeat Archlich in any way...=虽然对莉卡小姐来说...可能并不会起到什么大作用... 但我们也能为打倒阿奎雷奇出一份力......
Ah... Ricca... My precious friend... My big...sister...=啊啊... 莉卡...小姐...... 我的朋友... .........姐...姐...

Archlich, the lightning that you gave me to capture Ricca... It seems to work quite well against you, too.=阿奎雷奇，我这从你那获得的抓捕莉卡用的雷电... ...看来对你很有效呢
Grrrrrrrr....!=咕咕咕咕咕咕咕...
As far as I can tell...the necromancers of the castle...the goblins in the fortress... none of them wanted to follow you...=据我所知... 城里的死灵术士... 塔里的哥布林们... 都丝毫不仰慕你...

Hear me, monsters! Let us have our revenge upon that man!=魔物们啊！对这男人的仇也是时候该报了！
Stop...!=快停下...！
The Drain Crystals around us are turning into Magic Stones...! I know! By using the magic stored inside them, we can fix the brooch...!=周围的导能水晶都变成魔法石了...！对了，如果有那么多魔力进来的话胸针就能...
Ugh... Aah... Aaaaaaaagh...!=呜...啊啊... 啊啊啊啊啊啊啊...！

Miss Fairy, it's alright... I'm sure that she can do it. Let's believe in Ricca...!=妖精小姐，没事的... 那孩子的话肯定能承受的住的。相信莉卡吧...！
Huff, huff... I can feel it... The monsters' magic...and their feelings...are flowing through my body...!=哈啊，哈啊... 我感觉到了...... 流入体内的... 除了魔力还有魔物的想法...！
So many emotions... Hatred...fear...pain...and sadness... They're targeted not just at Archlich and God...but at humans, too...=这份感情... 是对阿奎雷奇和神明大人... 对人类们的憎恶... 恐惧... 疼痛... 悲伤......
I understand... I know these feelings too...=每一份感情，我都明白... 我都能明白啊...
Release them... Let it all out inside me...!=这些全部... 我都...体会过......！
The holy knight's brooch... A magic tool that uses the wearer's magic to gather the light energy drifting in this world...=圣骑士的胸针... 是能以使用者的魔力为燃料，收集世界上浮游的光之力量的魔道具...
A Drain Crystal of hope...imbued with the feelings of my friends...=是能激起同伴们的想法的... 希望的导能水晶...
The magic from the humans sent through the crystal ball replenished her, supplying holy power to the brooch...=通过水晶球送来的人类们的魔力，补充着那孩子被吸空的魔力，通过胸针转化成神圣之力了...
On top of that, the curse seal allowed her to take in the magic of countless monsters...which regulates the dark powers from the gate! She's now more powerful than ever!=然后，是通过咒印流入的无数魔物的魔力... 那魔力控制着从大门中吸收的黑暗之力，再给予那孩子更强的力量！
My body...feels light... I don't have a scratch or stain on me... What is this form...?=身体...好轻... 污秽和疼痛都消失了... 这副模样是...
Her body's so strong, her powers have taken the form of wings... Her great sword can shatter anyone that comes in her way...=被强烈到能化作翅膀显现的力量强化的肉体... 能击碎一切的无敌的大剑...
You can win...! With the strength you have now, you can defeat that necromancer...!=能赢...！现在的你，一定可以打败那个死灵术士...！
Everyone lent me their power...! I won't let it go to waste...!=大家都...借给了我力量...！我绝不会让它白费...！
Ngh...! No matter how much power you usurp, a failure like you can never hope to defeat me!=咕奴... 不管你得到了多少力量，像你这种... 丢圣骑士人的家伙是无法打败我的！
Hmph!!!=呼！！！
He still had that much power left...? No matter...!=居然还隐藏着那种程度的力量... 但是！
Miss Fairy, Ricca... I'll fight too. Let's punish this monster together!=妖精小姐，莉卡... 我也要战斗。让我们一起来惩罚那个怪物吧！

Hmph, you sluts... You're just like that whore who once betrayed me... Why do you all try to stand in my way!?=呼，你这淫乱的东西... 都快赶得上曾经背叛我的那个臭婆娘了，为什么你们要挡在我的面前！
Miria...! Yeah!=姐姐... 嗯！
There's no way a woman can defeat me...! You bitches of God, I'll taint your pathetic bodies completely and make you submit to me! Mwahahaha...!=我才不会输给女人...！神的母狗们，我要玷污你们的每一寸肌肤，让你们跪倒在我的面前！呼ー哈 哈 哈 哈 哈...！
What a petty man... No wonder the monsters abandoned you...=小气的男人... 所以才会被魔物抛弃啊...
This is the end of your evil reign. Just as you were defeated by the knight in the fairy tale, I'm going to cut you in two with this sword!=......我会在这里消灭你。就像传说的骑士大人做的那样，用这把剑将你一刀两断！
Urghhh...! I won't end up like in that story again...! I won't leave behind a legacy of losing to a little girl like you!=唔咕咕咕...！如果我会被再次写进故事里的话... 那一定不可能是被你这样的小娘们打败的传说！
The legend this world needs is the tale of me, and the hero I defeated... This world...doesn't need a story about a worthless girl!=对这个世界所必要的传说，是我和被我击败的勇者的故事... 有损名声的小娘们的故事什么的... 这个世界不需要！

It is not! We weren't defeated! A little fatigued, yes, but we're alive!=才不是呢～！才没被干掉呢～！虽然有点困难，但还是活下来了哦！
We thought we were done for when the monsters surrounded us...but then the village guardian dragon came to save us!=被魔物包围的时候，都觉得已经没救了... 但大地守护者那个龙，来救我们啦！

*Sigh* I cut off all the sources of magic that were powering the gate... Now we just wait for it to close on its own...=哈啊... 通往大门的魔力供給已经全部切断了... 之后只要等它自己关闭就行了呢...
Hopefully, the efforts of the previous holy knight will be repaid now... Perhaps she left the remnants of those memories we found across the land, hoping someone would avenge her...=这下前代的圣骑士也能瞑目了呢... 难道说各地的记忆残渣，也是死去的圣骑士的灵魂，想要报仇而残留下来的吗...
But did he...really die...?=他真的...... 死了吗...？
Archlich is a necromancer, someone who abandoned his humanity and became a monster in his quest for power and immortality... Would someone who spent hundreds of years resurrecting himself be defeated so...=这家伙是死灵术士，是追求不老不死的人堕入魔道而成的怪物... 过了几百年之后还能复活的他，就这么简单的...
Chapter 22    The Ruler of Demons=第 22 章  魔物的统治者
Chapter 23=第 23 章
————————————【主线】第二十二话及【NOVEL】阿奎雷奇的补魔结束——————————————

————————————————————————————【3D】二十二话-堕落的双翼开始————————————————————————————————
How unsightly... God's messengers are just a pack of bitches...=真是难看...神的使者也不过如此，只是一群婊子...
A...ah... Ri...cca...=啊哈....哈啊...Ricca...
Gha... Ugh...=啊...呃...
Hahahaha, women like you are no match for me... Hmm...? I don’t see the fairy anywhere...=哈哈哈，你这种女人可不是我的对手...嗯...? 妖精哪儿去了...
Hmph... No matter, the brat that it depends on is in my hands. Besides, there's nothing of consequence that bug could do...=嗯...没关系，那个小虫子的靠山在我手里。再说，那个小虫子也做不到什么事...
You pitiful siblings... I will complete the doorway, and head to the World of Darkness. I will complete the body transfer afterwards.=你们这对可怜的姐妹...当我完成了传送门，降临黑暗世界后。我要完成你们身体的转化。
Agh, ghaaaaaaaaaaaaa...!=啊，噶啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊...！
No... Aaaghhhhhhhhh...!=不..... 啊.....啊哈啊啊啊啊...！
Rejoice, holy knight! You will end up surrendering to me before I return from the World of Darkness.=圣骑士，开心吧！ 你能够在我还没去黑暗世界的时候就缴械投降。
I'll make you a succubus as well so that your body will adjust to the powers of darkness! Use the powers that God gave you, and prove to me that you are a worthy vessel for me!=我会把你也变成魅魔，然后你这具身体就会适应黑暗力量！用神给你的力量，向我证明你是个合格的容器吧！

AGYAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!!=噶嗷嗷啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！
The Darkfiend Dragon...swallowed Archlich...!?=黑魔龙...把阿奎雷奇吞下去了...！？
Archlich had the body of the holy knight who sealed the Darkfiend Dragon, so it's only natural that the Dragon attacked him first... Hah, serves him right!=阿奎雷奇占据着封印黑魔龙的圣骑士的身体，难怪会被黑魔龙攻击... 哈，他活该！
Looks like Archlich wasn't enough to fill his stomach... We're his next prey.=看来阿奎雷奇还不够塞牙缝呢...我们被盯上了。
If this monster...were to get through the gate and come to our world...=如果黑魔龙...从门里到了我们的世界...
If the old holy knight was able to defeat him...then I can beat him with the power I've gained, too...!=如果前代圣骑士能够打败它...那么我也能够用我获得的力量打败它...！
The magic sword drawn out of the Darkfiend Dragon's body... We might be able to use that to stop him!=从龙身上掉下来的光魔剑... 用那个应该能停下它的动作！
I got it! Iris, lend me your strength!=明白了！ Iris，助我一臂之力！
Of course...! This is our final battle!=没问题...！ 这就是我们最后的战斗了！
Upon grapple defeat by Darkfiend Dragon\r\n"Ricca's insect birth" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=被黑暗之龙击败后\n产虫的Ricca\nH场景（已经看过)
The magic sealing sword is pierced into the ground... If I send my magic into it, I might be able to stop his movements!=光魔剑插在地上...用那个施法的话，也许就能够停下它的动作了！
Iris!=Iris!
Right! Legendary holy knight... Please lend us your strength!=好嘞！传说中的圣骑士啊... 请赐予我们力量！
Aaaaaah!=啊哈啊啊啊！
Nngh... Nghaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!=嗯...哈哈哈哈！
The Darkfiend Dragon fell! Now's your chance to beat him!=黑魔龙倒下了！现在是时候输出了！
The Darkfiend Dragon's not just big, he's super resilient...=黑魔龙超大，超硬...
But your attacks are definitely working! Keep on fighting!=但你的攻击奏效了，不要停下来！ 
Weight : 58.5kg <color%3D#7F7F7F>(-0.62)</color>=体重 : 58.5公斤 <color%3D#7F7F7F>(-0.62)</color>
His tail... It can even do that!?=它的尾巴... 这种动作！？
He still hasn't collapsed!? This is getting annoying!=还能动吗！？ 真麻烦啊！
So close...! You're almost there! You can do it!=快好了...！就差，就差一点了！
It looks like it's working, but... Nnngh... The magic energy...everyone gave me is...=好像起作用了，但是...嗯嗯...大家分给我的...魔力...
Look out...! Blood...? He must be in real pain now!=小心...！ 血...？ 它一定有得好受！
One more blow... Can you pull through?=再来一次... 你还能行吗？
I'll stab that magic sword in him right at the moment he flinches!=下次它退缩的时候，我就用光魔剑钉住它！
Now's your chance, Iris!=就是现在，Iris!
You got it...!=午时已到...！
Haaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaagh!=噶啊啊啊啊啊！
He stopped moving... Did he...die...?=它不动了...它啊，死了吗？
Phew... Looks like it.=呼... 好像是的。
Finally... The sword's stuck in his wound... It looks painful...=终于... 光魔剑钉在它的伤口里... 看起来好疼...
I wonder if this dragon was manipulated by Archlich back when he fought the holy knight in the fairy tale...=不知道上次圣骑士跟它战斗的时候阿奎雷奇是不是也在操纵它...
If he was...I'm sorry I had to do that to you...=如果是那样的话... 抱歉，对你做了过分的事...
That damn Dragon scared me, though. The way it swooped down from the sky like that.=那条龙吓死我了。 它从天上那个样子直接冲下来。
It must have tremendous magic energy if it could open a gate on its own. Archlich was probably planning to come back to our world with the Dragon using that power.=它能够打开传送门，一定拥有惊人的魔力吧。 阿奎雷奇原本可能打算用它的力量返回我们的世界。
Come along, now. No use staying here any longer. The gate's magic is weakening, so we need to go through it before it closes.=快走。 再呆在这里也没用了。门的魔力正在减弱，我们要在它关上之前传过去。
Mission : Return to your original world=任务：返回原本的世界
Huh...? Where's the gate that leads to our world!? Did it close already...!?=嗯嗯...？回去的门在哪里！？难道已经关上了吗...！？
<b>Attack</b>\r\n Keyboard:X Key\r\n Keyboard:1 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Spin Attack</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:Z Key\r\n Controller:3 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Sword Throw</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:C Key\r\n Controller:2 Button=<b>攻击</b>\r\n 键盘：X键\n键盘：1按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>旋风斩</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：Z键\n手柄：3按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>掷剑</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：C键\n控制器：2按钮
I can sense light from far away... The gate must've been kicked away when the Darkfiend Dragon woke up. Let's hurry!=我看到远处有光... 一定是因为暗黑龙醒来的时候把门撞走了。 我们快点！
Okay! We'll rush at it headlong!=好！我们直冲过去！
A magic circle...? What is this magic I'm sensing...?=魔法环...？ 这魔法是...？
The Darkfiend Dragon!? D-Didn't we defeat him!?=黑魔龙！？ 我们...我们不是打败它了吗！？
The Darkfiend Dragon's still alive... Ugh, where's the magic sealing sword...?=黑魔龙还活着... 呃，光魔剑哪去了...？
We don't have time to look for it. Watch out, or you'll get eaten.=没时间找了。 小心，不然会被它吞下去的。
B-But, if we don't defeat him here, he might follow us to our world...=但，但是，如果我们不在这里打倒它，它可能会跟着我们来到我们的世界...
I have an idea. Just hurry over to the gate!=我有办法。 快到门口去！
I can see the gate now...=我已经看到大门了...
Iris, what are we going to do?=Iris，我们该怎么办？
Right before we go through the gate, I'm going to restore magic to the brooch and create a sealing sword out of it!=回去之前，我要恢复胸针的魔力，做一把封印之剑！
With the brooch left by your friends...? Okay, let's do that!=用你的朋友们留下的胸针...？好吧，我们开始吧！
You're running out of holy knight power, so your transformation will undo itself as you pass through the gate. Be prepared to come out with a few scratches and maybe a broken bone or two.=你的圣骑士之力快用完了，所以一穿过门就会解除变身。 准备好受点轻伤，也许会断一两根骨头哦。
Sure, I can handle... Wait, "broken bone"!?=好的，我好了... 等等，会骨折吗！？
Hehe, don't worry. The mage will heal you with her magic, so you won't die.=呵呵，别担心。 法师会用魔法治疗，所以你不会死的。
Huff, huff... Almost there...!=哈啊，哈啊... 就快到了...！
Ricca, I hope you live happily with the people most important to you.=Ricca，我希望你能和重要的人幸福地生活在一起。
I'm taking the brooch off! Protect your head when you go through the gate!=我要拿走胸针了！ 通过门的时候护好你的头！
Ricca...!=Ricca...!
Ugh... Ngha...=呃...噶啊...
Nngh... Urk... Nnn...=嗯...呜... 嘤...
Ah, Ricca...!=啊，Ricca...!
*Sniff* Ricca!=*抽泣* Ricca!
Miria... Claret...=Miria... Claret...
*Sniff* I'm so glad... Since you came back, it must mean you defeated Archlich...!=*抽泣* 我好高兴...你回来了，你肯定已经打败了阿奎雷奇...！
I'm...back to my normal self...=我...变回普通的我了...
Right... Iris took the brooch off of me to use it to seal the Darkfiend Dragon...=对了，Iris拿走胸针去封印黑魔龙了...
Wait... Huh...? Where's Iris...?=等等... 嗯...？ Iris在哪...?
Iris...? Are you talking about that little fairy...? I don't see her...=Iris...? 你是说那位妖精吗...？ 我没看见她...
I didn't see her come out of the gate...so I assumed she was inside you like she usually is...=我没看到她从门那里出来... 我还以为她像平常一样在你体内...
Inside me...?=我的体内...？
Iris... Iris...!=Iris... Iris...!
Is she still at the other side of the gate...!?=她还在门那边吗...！？
But the gate is...=传送门要...
Ah...! No, wait...!=啊...！不要啊，等等...！
No... Did she really...? To let me escape...?=不要... 她真的...？ 为了让我逃走...？
But...you were important to me too, Iris...=但是... 你对我来说也很重要啊，Iris...
She went...and ran ahead of me again...=她走了... 又一次，走在我的前面...
No... Heehee... I let her do that this time...=不... 嘿嘿... 这次是我让她这么做的...
Back when we'd only just met...I got angry every time she talked about her sister... I didn't think well of her for valuing something above her duty as a holy knight...=想到我们刚见面的时候... 每次她提到姐姐我都会发火... 我不喜欢她把有些事情看得比圣骑士的职责还重要...
No... Maybe it was envy... Since the day I lost him, I was no longer a "big sister"... To think I was jealous of a human... Heehee...=不.. 也许是嫉妒... 从失去他的那天起，我就不是“姐姐”了... 我居然嫉妒一个人类... 嘿嘿...
She was a lot more troublesome than my brother, but...I hope I was able to be a good sister to her...=她比我弟弟麻烦多了，不过... 我希望我能够变成她的好姐姐...
You're still going to chase me even if it opens your wounds, huh? Well, I suppose I understand... You were sealed here by the holy knight, and then another one comes back to wake you up and fight you again...=皮开肉绽的了还想追我是么？ 我懂得...你被圣骑士封印在这里后，有人过来叫醒你，并再次和你战斗...
If what she said was true, I guess you deserve some pity, too.=就像她说的那样，你也值得获得一些同情。
Sure, rest here together. It's the least I can do for my cute little sister...=好吧，一起安息吧。 这是我最后能为我那可爱的小妹妹做到的事了...

Chapter 23    The Fairy Tale Of Holy Knight Ricca=第二十三章  圣骑士Ricca的童话
The sun feels amazing. Today's weather is perfect!=阳光明媚。今天天气真好！
I finished picking herbs pretty early today. The magic of the earth must have returned to normal since the Drain Crystals disappeared.=今天很快就采完药草了。 没有导能水晶之后，大地的魔力似乎也恢复了正常。
The village is almost back to how it was, too...=村子几乎也恢复了原样...
The soldiers from the royal capital rebuilt the houses that burned down, and luckily a lot of the villagers had escaped into the mountains when the monsters attacked...=来自王都的士兵们重建了被烧毁的房子，魔物来袭的时候，有很多运气好的人逃到了山里...
*Sigh* Hey, can I talk to you about something, Polon? It's about the statue...=*叹气* 嘿，我能跟你说会儿话吗，Polon？关于那个雕像...
I'm glad that the port town people made it for our village, but Claret demanded that the statue look like me, even when I said I didn't want that...=我很高兴港口镇的人们为我们村做了这个，但是Claret要求说雕像应该看起来像我，尽管我说不要...
We were supposed to keep the fact that I was the holy knight a secret by saying that the heavenly knight just happened to descend onto this village...=我们本来要把圣骑士这件事作为秘密，只对外宣称是神明派来的圣骑士恰巧降临在了这个村庄...
Sure, I was kinda full of myself at the port town...but now all the village visitors look at me with wide eyes. It feels awkward.=啊，我在港口镇的时候是有些自鸣得意... 但是现在每个来到村里的人看到我的时候都会瞪大眼睛。 感觉好尴尬。
I know this statue is only modeled after me, but it's still weird. Although, I would be disappointed if the statue didn't look like me after those long days of posing...=我知道这尊雕像只是模仿我的样貌，但是还是感觉好奇怪。 不过我当了那么久的模特，最后雕像不像我又会让我很失望...
Couldn't they have done something about the pedestal, though? My face looks scary from this angle...and you can even see my private bits from here...=他们就不能改一改这个栏杆吗？ 从这个角度看我的脸很吓人... 而且也会看到我的隐私部位...
Ugh, this is so embarrassing... I shouldn't have agreed to be the model. But Claret was so insistent, so I couldn't say no...=呃，这太尴尬了...我不该去当模特的。 但是Claret太坚定了，我没办法拒绝...
Maybe I can move the fencing around the statue... If I spread it out a little more, people won't see underneath my skirt...=也许我应该把栏杆挪开一点... 离雕像远一些的话，就就看不到我裙子下面...
Heave-ho...! Oof, oof... Nnnmmmmgh!=嘿啊...吼...！哦，哦...嗯嗯嗯嗯！
Ugh... I can't pull it out...=呃...我拔不出来...
Huff... Huff... They're too heavy for me to lift up... If I had my holy knight powers, I could lift these up like they were nothing... Ugh...=哈啊... 哈啊... 这栏杆对我来说太重了... 如果我还有圣骑士之力的话，我明明可以轻松举起来的... 哈啊...
Oh, Ricca. Hello.=哦，Ricca。你好。
Huff... Huff... Uggh...=哈啊... 哈啊... 呃...
Woof, woof!=汪，汪！
Polon...? Oh... Hello, Donny...=Polon...？ 啊... 你好，Donny...
You're trying so hard to move the fence... Are you pointlessly trying to deny your own fame today as well? Hahahaha!=你真的很想挪动这个栅栏呢... 今天也在徒劳地否认自己的名声吗？ 哈哈哈！
Well yeah... It feels like I'm being stared at by everyone. It's embarrassing...=是耶... 感觉每个人都会盯着我看。 好尴尬...
Hahaha, I'm sure you'll get used to it after a while.=哈哈哈，我相信你会习惯的。
By the way, we received a notice from the capital that a priest from the western kingdom will be visiting next month. Apparently they'll have lots of people with them, so behave yourself, okay?=顺便一提，我们收到通知，一位来自西方王国的神父下个月要来访问。 到时候会有很多人一同前来哦，所以好好表现，好吗？
Ugh... We have more visitors coming to the village than ever. Last month, we even had a group of scholars from the royal capital visit. And the month before that, Claret's parents and a bunch of other mages came...=呃... 村里的游客络绎不绝。 上个月，这里甚至接待了一群来自王都的学者。 上上个月，Claret与她的父母以及其他法师也来了...
You know they stare at my face while I show them around the town, right?=你应该想象的到吧，我带他们四处参观的时候，他们全都盯着我的脸看呢？
*Sigh* Just thinking about it is making my face flush...=*叹气* 一想到这就让我脸红...
I do understand how you feel, but my shop's been doing great because of all of the outsiders that you and that stone statue have been attracting.=我理解你哦Ricca，不过我家的商店因为冲着你和那尊塑像而来的人们声音兴隆呢。
I'm sure my husband is really happy about it too.=我相信我的丈夫也会为此感到高兴的。
Ma'am...=阿姨...
You want Miria to be proud, right? Then do your best with dealing with the priest and his followers. I'm sure the shop'll make lots of money, so I'll lower your rent.=你想让Miria为你自豪，对吧？ 努力跟神父和他的随从打交道吧。 到时候商店一定会大赚，我会降低你的房租哦。
*Sigh* I'll do my best...=*叹气* 我会努力...
Miria, I'm home!=Miria, 我回来了！
Welcome home, Ricca.=欢迎回家，Ricca。
Heehee... The tomato salad you made was delicious.=嘿嘿... 你做的番茄沙拉很好吃。
Heehee, I'm glad.=嘿嘿，很高兴听你这么说。
Hey Ricca, I got this from a customer over at the dining hall.=Ricca，我从餐厅的食客那里得到了这个。
Ack... Another figure of me... How many of those things have you been gifted so far...?=哎呀... 我的手办... 你收了几个这种礼物啊...？
This is the 12th one now...I think? People that went into town saw them on sale there, so they brought some back.=这是第十二个吧...我想？到镇上的人们看到这些手办出售，所以他们带了一些回来。
That's like two figures every month... These must be pretty expensive, too. They're so detailed...=每个月大概收到两个呢... 这个看起来很贵啊。 细微的地方也做的很精致...
They really are well-made... They seem to be really popular in town as well. Apparently people are buying one per home, and using them as a ward against monsters.=做工真的很好... 镇上的人也很喜欢呢。 每家每户都买了一个用来当作对魔物的护身符呢。

Will you be alright...? Even if I leave...?=你会好的吧...？ 就算没有我...？
Huh... I'll be fine... It's totally fine! I've been wanting more independence for a while now!=呵呵... 我会好的... 完全没问题！我很久之前就想要更独立自主一些了！
Actually...that reminds me of someone...=啊...让我想起来有个人...
Someone...?=有个人...？
He helped me when Archlich stabbed me in the cave, and I've been to visit him a few times to show my thanks... He lives near the sea, but occasionally comes to visit the village.=他在我被阿奎雷奇捅了一剑之后帮了我，我去见过他几次表达感谢...他住在海边，不过偶尔会来村子里。

Yes... But, I'm still torn... You'll be lonely if I leave the village, right?=是的...但我还是会伤心... 我离开村子之后，你会感到很孤独吧？

I-I... I won't feel too sad. I could just visit you at the port town on my way to Claret's place...=我...我... 我不会伤心的。 我可以在去找Claret的路上顺便去看看你...
It might be a ways away...but I can still visit you whenever I want! I won't be lonely at all...! I swear!=也许要走很远的路... 但我还是随时可以来看你！ 我一点也不会孤单...！ 我向你保证！
Really...? I'll...really miss you, though... I'm still a little unsure, so you don't need to be strong for my sake, you know?=真的吗...？ 我会...很想念你的... 我还是放不下心来，你不用为了我故作坚强，你知道吗？
Maybe I would be a little lonely...=我是会有点孤独啦...
No... You've been by my side all my life. Of course I'll be sad if we live apart...=不...你一直都在我身边生活。 我们分开过当然会感到伤心...
Hehe, I thought so... Yeah... I'll be really sad too... I'll guess I'll ask him to wait for a while...=呵呵，我想也是... 是啊... 我也会很难过... 我会告诉他再等一段时间...
Ah... I can't do that... I'll have to say goodbye to him properly...=啊... 那样不行... 也许我应该好好跟他道别...

So...even if I do feel lonely, I'll be okay. Claret comes to visit and buy herbs sometimes, and helping out at the store and doing tours of the village can be hard work, but it's also fun...=所以... 即使我感到孤独也没事的。 Claret不时会来拜访并购买药草； 而且还在店里帮忙，在村子做导游都很辛苦，也很有趣...
And...I'll be happy knowing you're happy, Miria! So don't worry about me!=而且，Miria你感到幸福我也幸福！ 所以别担心我啦！
Heehee... You don't have to look after me anymore. Congratulations.=嘿嘿...恭喜你不用在照顾我了。
Zzz... Zzz... Zzz...=Zzz...Zzz...Zzz...
Nngh... Miri...a... Nngh... Hmm...=嗯...姐...姐...亚..嗯...嘤...
*Sniff* Ugh... *Sniff* Oww...=*啜泣* 呃... *啜泣* 呜...
New stage "Lost Chapter Miria" has been unlocked.=新关卡《遗失的章节 Miria》已经解锁。

Epilogue 1=尾声1

————————————————————————————————————【NOVEL】第二十三话-产虫的Ricca开始————————————————————————————————
It had been three hours since Ricca had set off for the World of Darkness.=Ricca出发去黑暗世界已经三个小时了。
We had waited at the top of the tower for Ricca and Iris to return.=我们在塔顶等待Ricca和Iris回来。
After a while, the ground had begun to shake so hard we thought the tower would collapse, so we ran back through the still monster-infested castle and hurriedly escaped.=突然，地面剧烈摇晃起来，好像塔楼也会被摇塌，我们急忙穿过挤满魔物的城堡逃了出来。
Miria had been turned back into a human by Ricca's holy knight powers and I was nearly completely out of magic, but the soldiers protected us as we fled.=Miria已经被Ricca的圣骑士之力变回了人类，我也将要耗尽自己的魔力，多亏有士兵们保护着我们逃离。
As we watch from a distance as the castle falls, a gigantic snake-like monster appears, heralded by a massive surge of magical energy.=当我们在远处看着城堡倒塌的时候，一个巨大的蛇形影子出现在废墟上空，毫不客气的展现着自己庞大的魔力量。
Ghhh... Aaah... Everyone... I'm...sorry...=噶...啊啊...大家...我...对不起...
Aah... Ricca...!=啊...Ricca...!
The Darkfiend Dragon emerges from the gate, which had appeared amidst the ruins of the castle.=黑魔龙从门中通过，出现在废墟当中。
The jet-black necromancer stands atop the Darkfiend Dragon's head, a girl with shining angel wings bound by tentacles dangling below him.=漆黑的死灵法师站在黑魔龙的头上，一个有着闪耀的天使翅膀的女孩，被触手挂在他下面的位置。
Mwahaha! If you hadn't come tumbling into the stomach of the Darkfiend Dragon, I wouldn't have been able to steal your magic and would have perished as well.=呣哇哈哈哈！要是你没有掉进黑魔龙的胃里，我就无法窃取你的力量，也会就此消亡吧。
It seems that it was worth praying from the depth of my soul that the dragon would eat the holy knight.=看来从我的灵魂深处祈祷黑魔龙吃掉圣骑士是值得的.
No... Archlich...=不... 阿奎雷奇...
Ricca...defeated...?=Ricca...失败了...？
Ghaaaah... Gggh... Uuuuuugh...=噶啊...噶...呜...
Ricca can barely breathe because of the tentacles wrapped around her neck, white foam leaking from the edges of her mouth.=Ricca的脖子上缠着触手，几乎无法呼吸，白色的泡沫从她嘴边流出来。
The holy knight's stomach... I-Is that also Archlich's doing...? She became like that because she lost...=圣骑士的肚子... 这也是阿奎雷奇的手笔吗...？ 她变成那样是因为她失去了...
Her stomach is swollen as if pregnant, and something could be seen squirming and wriggling under the skin.=她的肚子肿得像怀孕了一样，可以看到皮肤下有东西在蠕动。
I instinctively realize that she has been impregnated with some sort of monster.=我本能地意识到她怀上了某种魔物。
You really got in my way back at the tower, humans... Mwahahaha...! I have something to give you!=在塔上的时候，你真的挡了我的路，人类... 哇哈哈...！ 我有东西要给你！
I raise my staff in preparation, thinking this is an attack. However, the object falls short, landing and rolling to a stop a little in front of us.=我举起魔杖防备着，以为某种攻击会打过来。 然而，某个东西飞了一小段距离，落在地面上后滚动着停在我们面前。
We flinch as Archlich turns to face us, throwing a small, red object in our direction.=当阿奎雷奇的视线面对我们时，我们畏缩了，他向我们扔了一个红色的小东西。
What lays there is the blood-soaked corpse of a fairy... It is Iris' body, torn in two.=躺在那里的是一具被鲜血浸透的妖精尸体...那是Iris的，被撕成两半的尸体。
Eeek... Ah, aaaah...=嗝呃...啊，啊啊啊...
Aghaaa... Uuugh... I...ris... Gggh, aaah...=啊噶啊...呃...伊..丽丝...噶，啊...
Mwahahaha! Human comrades of this little girl... That's not my only present for you!=哇哈哈哈！这个小丫头的同胞... 这可不是我唯一的礼物！
Archlich spreads his arms, releasing an intense dark aura from his whole body.=阿奎雷奇张开双臂，全身释放出浓烈的黑暗气息。
Eeeeeek...!=咦呃呃呃呃呃呃...！
Gggha... Aaaaaaaaaagh...!=噶啊...啊啊啊啊啊啊啊...！
It strikes Ricca, who is bound nearby. Her expression grows more pained and her belly undulates and throbs.=那东西击中了被绑在附近的Ricca, 她的表情变得更加痛苦，她的腹部开始起伏和悸动。
Haaa... Aaaah, it's moving...inside... Nnngh... Haaah, eek, hhhgh... Aaaaah...! Hhheeek... Aaagh... My womb is being...spread open...=哈...啊，它在动...里面...呐啊...哈啊，额，哈啊...啊啊啊啊！嘿呃呃...啊啊啊...子宫...撑开...
Ricca's eyes roll backwards into her head as she releases urine and vaginal juices which rain down on us from above.=Ricca在我们上空翻着白眼，尿液和爱液像雨点一样落下。
Eeek... Aaah... ! Please stop...=唉咳...啊！停下...
Small bulges appear briefly on the skin of her round belly, like there's a baby punching and kicking inside.=她突起的肚皮上不时出现一个小小的圆丘，就像婴儿在里面拳打脚踢一样。
But the thing inside Ricca's belly is definitely no human baby.=但是Ricca肚子里的东西绝对不是人类的婴儿。
Eeeeghk... Aghaaa, my tummy... Haaaa... Eeek, nooo... Ah, aaah...! The entrance of my womb... Haaah, don't claw at it like that...!=唉咳...阿个哈，我的肚子...哈哈...哦，不...啊，啊...！我子宫口...哈，别那样抓那里...！
Ricca's urine-soaked, juice-soaked thighs are being spread open by tentacles...and between those thighs, her privates gradually spread wider, a flood of amniotic fluid gushing out.=Ricca浸满尿液和爱液的大腿被触手张开...在那双大腿中间，她的四处大大的张开，羊水正从那里喷出来。
Once her hole is spread open to about the same size as the orb on top of my staff, a black head with red, shining eyes peeks out.=当她的穴被撑的和我法杖上面的球一样大的时候，一个带着闪亮的红色眼睛的黑色脑袋冒了出来。
Ricca...! What is that...?!=Ricca...! 那是什么...？！
Nngh, haah, nooo... Please don't look... Aaaah, a hard shell is...spreading open my privates... Ghaaa... Aaaaaaagh!=呐噶，哈，不...请不要看...啊，硬壳...撑开我的穴...噶哈啊...啊啊啊！
Eeek... A h-hell beetle...!?=嗝呃...地，地狱甲虫...！？
The monster peeking out from her vagina resembles a hell beetle larva.=从从她阴道口向外窥视的东西像是地狱甲虫的幼体。
But my instincts as a mage tell me that its magic is very different... That it is an embodiment of the same dark power that Archlich uses.=但我作为女巫的直觉告诉我它可不是普通的地狱甲虫...那是阿奎雷奇所用的黑暗力量的化身。
*Squelch*...!=*安静*...！
Eeek, aaaan, stoooop... Nnngh, eeegk... I'm giving birth... I'm giving birth...to a monster...! Don't look at me... Please, don't...=呃嗝，呐啊，停...嗯，嗯...我要生了...我要生出...一个魔物...！别看我...请不要...
Ooooooh... Nnnghoooooooooooooh!=哦哦哦哦...咕呜呜呜！
Ricca lets out a load groan that contrasts starkly with her angelic appearance. The grotesque baby spreads her vagina, wet with amniotic fluids, and pokes its head out.=Ricca发出一声不像是那种天使般外表会发出来的沉重的呻吟。浸满羊水的古怪的婴儿扩开她的阴道，然后探出头来。
Ricca spasms so much that some of tentacles coiling around her come loose, and more foam spills from the edges of her mouth.=Ricca痉挛的如此厉害，缠住她的触手都被冲开了一部分，她的嘴边挂上了更多白色泡沫。
I can't believe such a huge, foul monster is being birthed by a human girl... So it was inside her stomach...?=真不敢相信这么巨大肮脏的魔物是被人类女孩生出来的... 在她肚子里的就是这个吗...？
Aaaah, eeeek, aaah... Everyone's looking at me... Eeek, haaah, eeep, aaaaaaaaah! Miria... Everyone...! Nooo! Don't look...!=啊啊，呃，啊，啊...每个人都在看着我...哎呀，哈啊，哈呃，啊啊呃啊！Miria... 大家！ 不要！ 不要看...!
Ricca... Aaah... Ricca...=Ricca... 啊啊...Ricca...
Ricca cries and foams at the mouth, her face flushed and her legs shaking. As the soldiers have said, she seems to be moaning in pleasure.=Ricca哭着，嘴边沾着白色泡沫，脸涨得通红，双腿发抖。正如士兵们所说，她好像正因为快感而呻吟。
Every time she spasms, another larva-like segment, each with small legs, emerges from her body.=随着她每次一抽搐，一节带着对足的幼虫身体就会从她身体当中挤出来。
My eyes must be playing tricks on me, because it looks like the larva's body is growing larger as it emerges from her.=我一定是眼花了，我看到幼虫的身体一边从她身上冒出来，一边长大。
*Squelch*, *squelch*...!=*安静*，*安静*...！
Ghaaaaah, nyo... I'm gonna give birth... Aaaagh, to a monster while everyone's watching... It's squirming its way out of me...=噶哈啊，呣哟...我要生了...啊哈哈，当大家都在看的时候，生一只魔物...它在从我身体里钻出来...
*Squelch*, *squelch*, *squelch*...!=*安静*，*安静*，*安静*...！
Gheeek, so big... Hhhooooooooh... Hmmmpheeeeeeeeek...!=噶哈，太大了...吼呜喔呜呜...嗯呣咦咦咦...！
Half the larva's bodyis  now visible, and each segment emerges increasingly faster.=幼虫的身体已经能看见一半了，每一段出现的速度也越来越快。
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaagh!=啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！
Ricca screams and the rest of the larva's body flies out, drenched in amniotic fluid.=Ricca尖叫着，剩下来的幼虫沾满羊水的身体飞了出来。
*Snap...*=*啪哒*...
It looks like the umbilical cord-like tube connecting it to Ricca has snapped under the larva's own weight.=长得像脐带一样的连着Ricca的管子因为幼虫的重量被扯断了。
The larva hangs from Ricca's vagina for several seconds, before falling to the ground, the Darkfiend Dragon's jaw cushioning it on the way down.=幼虫在Ricca的阴道上挂了几秒钟，在掉到地上之前，黑魔龙的下巴为它做了缓冲。
Scree...! Screeeeeeeee!=*尖锐*...！*尖叫*！
Aa... Aah...=啊...啊啊...
Ah... Miria...!=啊...Miria...!
The monster lets out a shrill cry, and Ricca's sister collapses on the ground weakly.=魔物发出一声尖叫，Ricca的姐姐虚弱的倒在地上。
Seeing her precious sister give birth to a disgusting worm must have been too much for her mind to take.=目睹她宝贵的妹妹生出一条恶心的虫子一定让她受不了了吧。
It's not like I can remain calm either. My hands and feet are shaking, and my face is distorted in fear.=我也无法保持冷静。我的手脚都在颤抖，我的脸因为恐惧而扭曲。
Haaaaah... Aaah... My baby... It feels so good... Nyooo...=哈哈哈...啊啊...我的孩子...感觉真好...不哟...
The disgusting worm's mother twitches and shakes, continuing to exposing her gaping birth canal to us.=恶心的虫子的母亲抽搐着，颤抖着，向我们展示着张开的产道。
It seems like giving birth stimulates Ricca's cervical orifice, which had been made more sensitive by succubus poison, making her orgasm. Her tongue hangs from her mouth, a lewd expression plastered on her face.=生产刺激了Ricca那被魅魔毒变得非常敏感的子宫颈，让她高潮了。 她的舌头挂在嘴边，脸上露出一副淫靡的表情。
She turns to us, her eyes still aware, her face twitching loosely.=她扭头看向我们，她的眼神依旧清醒，她的脸表情松弛，肌肉颤抖。
Scree, screeee!=*尖叫*，*尖叫*！
Huff... Huff... Aaah... My baby... No... Ir...is...=哼嗯...哼恩...啊啊...我的孩子...不.. 伊丽...丝...
Huh...? Ah, aaaaaah...!=哼嗯...？啊，啊啊啊...！
While the soldiers and I have been standing frozen in shock at the sight of the monster's birth, the larva has come near us and is now gnawing on Iris' corpse.=在我和士兵们震惊到愣愣得看着怪物的诞生的时候，幼虫已经靠近了我们，正在啃咬Iris的尸体。
Ah, aaaagh... Fire...ball...=啊，啊啊...火...球...
Hearing the sadness in Ricca's voice, I instinctively cast the spell, concentrating magic into my staff.=听到Ricca悲伤的声音，我下意识地咏唱魔咒，在魔杖上面集中法力。
I would release a magical ball of fire and burn the larva eating Iris to a crisp...=我会用一发火球术把正在吃Iris实体的幼虫烤成焦炭...
...That's what should happen, but instead the magic light gathering at the tip of my staff sputters out, the fireball magic never activating.=...本来应该如此，但是，魔力的光芒集中在我的法杖前端四散开来，火球术并没有生效。
Huh...? Huff, huff... Ah, aaah...!? My magic! It's...=嗯...？哈哈，哈夫...啊，啊啊...！？我的魔法！是...
I had given Ricca all my magic using the crystal ball, and I'd used up the little bit that I'd recovered since fighting monsters as we escaped the castle.=我已经把所有的魔力用水晶球转交给了Ricca，之后在逃出城堡的时候用掉了我随后恢复的一点魔力。
Heeeh... Heeeh... Stop, baby larva... Huff, huff, huff... Don't... Don't eat Iris...!=嘿...嘿...停下，小幼虫...哈呼，哈呼，哈呼...不要...不要吃掉Iris...!
Ah, aaagh... Nnngh... M-Maybe I could attack it directly...with my cane...=啊，啊啊...嗯呜...也，也许我可以直接攻击它...用我的法杖...
Everyone! Let's help out the holy knight...!=大家，一起去帮助圣骑士...!
I am just about to go hit the larva with my staff when soldiers appear at my sides, wielding swords and spears.=我正要用棍子供给幼虫，士兵们挥舞着剑和长矛来到我身边。
I know that they can't possibly defeat Archlich or the Darkfiend Dragon, and that they're probably already extremely exhausted from helping me break through Archlich's forces to give Ricca my magic. However, seeing these men step forward so bravely helps ease my fear a little.=我知道他们不可能打败阿奎雷奇或者暗黑龙，而且他们也为了帮助我突破阿奎雷奇的军队给Ricca送去魔力而累坏了。然而，看到这些人勇敢的向前迈步，我的恐惧减轻了一点。
However, their valiant advance comes to a halt all too soon.=然而，他们英勇的进军很快就停止了。

————————游戏内说明内容
<b>IrisSummon</b>\r\n Keyboard:V Key＋↑ Key\r\n Controller:4 Button＋2- Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\nSummons Iris.<line-height%3D100%>\r\nIris will attack nearby enemies and heal Ricca when her health is low\r\nor cure her when she's affected by a bad status effect.\r\nThe number of times you can be healed will increase based on how many\r\nSilver Magic Stones you've collected.\r\nSummoning her multiple times in a short time will consume MP.=<b>Iris 召唤</b>\r\n 键盘：V 键+↑ 键\n摇杆：4 按钮＋2 轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n召唤 伊莉丝<line-height%3D100%>\r\n伊莉丝会攻击附近的敌人，并在生命值较低时治愈 莉卡\n或者在她受到异常状态影响时治愈她。\n你可以被治愈的次数会根据你收集的银色魔法石增加\n在短时间内多次召唤她将消耗MP。

From the middle =中途开始

No directional input: Spin Attack=长按（不附加方向键): 高速旋转袭击

Increases the number of Magic Stones dropped by slain enemies.=增加被杀死的敌人投掷魔石的数量。
When you succeed at a Perfect Guard, pressing the attack button will initiate a counter attack.\r\nThe multiplier of the power of the counter attack to the received attack increases according to the level.=当你成功完美格挡时，按下攻击按钮将发起反击。\n反击的力量与收到的攻击的相乘倍数会根据等级而增加。

When you succeed at a Perfect Guard, pressing the attack button will initiate a counter attack.The multiplier of the power of the counter attack to the received attack increases according to the level.=当你成功完美格挡时，按下攻击按钮将发起反击。\n反击的力量与收到的攻击的相乘倍数会根据等级而增加。
You don't have enough Magic Stones to learn this skill.=你的魔法石不足以学习这个技能。
Increases the number of swords thrown with Sword Throw, at the cost of increased MP use. =增加“掷剑”的MP消耗，增加剑的数量。 
Press & hold the special attack button + the down directional button to deploy orbs of ice around you. Costs MP. \r\nOn activation, temporarily infuses your weapon with the power of ice.=按下、按住特殊攻击按钮+向下方向键，在你周围部署冰球。消耗MP。\n激活后，将你的武器暂时注入冰的力量。

Increases the number of swords thrown with Sword Throw, at the cost of increased MP use. \r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.1=增加掷剑次数。 但增加MP消耗。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.1/最大Lv.1
Increases the speed at which the struggle gauge increases when captured by an enemy, proportionate to skill level.=增加被敌人俘获时挣扎标尺的增加速度，与技能等级成比例。
