Increases the speed at which the struggle gauge increases when captured by an enemy, proportionate to skill level.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.5/Max Lv.5=提高被敌人俘获时挣扎标尺的增速，与技能等级成比例。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.5/最大Lv.5
Jumps can be used to cancel immobility before and after attacks.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.1=跳跃可以取消攻击前后的僵直状态。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.1/最大Lv.1
When taking damage, grants a chance to retaliate by emitting a burst of magic in a small area. Costs MP. =受伤时，有机会小范围内施放魔法给予报复。消耗MP。
When taking damage, grants a chance to retaliate by emitting a burst of magic in a small area. Costs MP. \r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Not yet learned=受伤时，有机会小范围内施放魔法给予报复。消耗MP。 \r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：尚未学习
When taking heavy damage, reduces damage taken to a set threshold. Damage lowers proportionate to skill level.=当受到严重伤害时，将受到的伤害降低到设定的阈值。\n伤害降低与技能等级成比例。
You are able to jump once more while airborne.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.1=你可以在空中再次跳跃。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.1/最大Lv.1
Reduces cooldown time after using special attacks, proportionate to skill level.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Not yet learned=减少使用特殊攻击后的冷却时间，与技能等级成比例。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：尚未学习
Use right click / C Key / {{A}} Button to toggle the skill ON/OFF.=点击右键 / C键 / {{A}} 按钮来切换技能 开/关。
Obtained Silver Magic Stone=获得银色魔石

Press the jump button + down directional button to perform a sliding kick that attacks while moving in a low posture.=跳跃+下键执行滑踢，以低姿态移动攻击。

When you fall into a hole or lava, you will automatically escape on magical wings.\r\nThe higher the level, the lower the HP cost.=掉进深渊或岩浆时，你能借助魔法翅膀自动逃脱。\n等级越高，消耗的HP越低。

=========================================================
The skill "Sword Throw" is required to progress to this stage.\r\nYou can proceed to the skill menu by clicking the "Skill Strengthening" button.=需要技能“掷剑”来进行本关。\n你可以点击“技能强化”按钮进入技能菜单。
Adjusts the display size of the skill tree.=调整技能树的显示大小。
This skill is not yet unlocked.\r\nYou can unlock it by investigating a certain sword stuck in the ground in-game.=这项技能尚未解锁。\n你可以调查游戏中卡在地上的剑符号来解锁它。
You can expend Magic Stones to strengthen your holy knight abilities.\r\nIn order to progress to the next stage, let's first learn "MP UP".=你可以使用魔法石来增强你的力量。\n为了进入下一关，让我们先学习“MP提升”。
You don't have the required skills to learn this skill.=你没有学习这技能需要的前置技能。
Obtained special attack "Sword Throw".\r\nCosts MP on use.=已获得特殊攻击“掷剑”。\n使用时消耗MP。
Obtained special attack "Lightning Rush".\r\nCosts MP on use and cannot be activated again for a short time.=已获得特殊攻击“闪电突袭”。\r\n使用时消耗MP，短时间内不能再次激活。
Obtained special attack "Blaze Charge".\r\nCosts MP on use and cannot be activated again for a short time.=已获得特殊攻击“火焰冲锋”。\r\n使用时消耗MP，短时间内不能再次激活。
Obtained special attack "Holy Geyser".\r\nCosts MP on use and cannot be activated again for a short time.=已获得特殊攻击“神圣喷泉”。\r\n使用时消耗MP，短时间内不能再次激活。
====================================================

Press & hold the special attack button + the left or right movement buttons to unleash a charging attack cloaked in flames. Costs MP. \r\nOn activation, temporarily infuses your weapon with the power of fire.=按住特殊攻击按钮与左右，在火焰中发动一次冲锋攻击。消耗MP。\n激活后，你的武器将暂时注入火魔力。
Press & hold the special attack button + the up directional button to pour holy magic into the earth \r\nbefore projecting it in a wide area. On activation, cures bad status effects.=按住特殊攻击按钮+向上方向按钮，将神圣魔法注入地球\n然后在大范围内投射。激活后，治疗不良状态影响。
Press & hold the special attack button while standing still to unleash consecutive attacks accompanied by lightning. On activation, temporarily infuses your weapon with the power of lightning.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.3=站立时按住“特殊攻击”按钮，可连续发动闪电攻击。激活后，将你的武器暂时注入闪电的力量。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级: 当前Lv.1/最大Lv.3

Pressing the attack button after running for a moment will unleash a dash attack. \r\nMaximum number of consecutive hits increases proportionate to skill level.=跑步片刻后按下攻击按钮将发起短跑攻击。\n最大连续命中次数随技能等级成比例增加。
Pressing the attack button during a strong attack will allow you to perform consecutive attacks. Maximum number of consecutive hits increases proportionate to skill level.=在强攻击期间按下攻击按钮将允许您执行连续攻击。\n最大连续命中次数随技能等级成比例增加。

Maximum number of consecutive hits increases proportionate to skill level.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.2/Max Lv.3=在强攻击期间按下攻击按钮将允许您执行连续攻击。最大连续命中次数随技能等级成比例增加。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.2/最大Lv.3
Pressing the attack button during a strong attack will allow you to perform consecutive attacks. Maximum number of consecutive hits increases proportionate to skill level.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.3/Max Lv.3=在强攻击期间按下攻击按钮将允许您执行连续攻击。最大连续命中次数随技能等级成比例增加。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.3/最大Lv.3
Pressing the attack button during a weak aerial attack will allow you to perform consecutive attacks. (Not possible when using Kick)=弱空击的时候，按攻击键将允许你连续攻击。（使用踢击时不可)

Pressing the attack button during a weak attack will allow you to perform consecutive attacks.=在轻击期间按下攻击按钮将允许你连续攻击。
Restores MP when hitting an enemy with an attack. Amount of MP restored increases proportionate to skill skill level.=在攻击敌人时恢复MP。MP恢复量与技能等级成比例。
Right click / C Key / 2 Button to toggle the skill ON/OFF.=右键单击 / C 键/ 2 按钮以切换技能的打开/关闭。
Tap the special attack button to throw a magical sword. Costs MP. \r\nSwords stuck to walls can be used as platforms. Level up to reduce the MP cost.=按“特殊攻击”按钮，投掷魔法剑。耗魔。\n刺入墙的剑可以落脚。升级以降低魔力消耗。
When performing a strong attack, hits that deal damage below a set threshold will no longer stagger you. Increases damage threshold proportionate to skill level and will also prevent stagger to low damage hits outside of strong attacks.\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\nSkill level: Current Lv.1/Max Lv.3=当你进行强力攻击时，在设定的阈值以下造成伤害的命中将不再让你感到震惊。伤害阈值与技能等级成比例，也将减少踉跄减少多种伤害。\r\n<line-height%3D50%>\r\n技能等级：当前Lv.1/最大Lv.3

26. 后日谈2 

In order to heal herself, Ricca had overcome the trials given by Claret,\r\nbut remained tormented by the trauma of her battles. She decides to take another shot at the trials.=为了治疗而接受并通过了柯蕾露的试炼的莉卡，\n现在却依然在被战争的后遗症折磨。莉卡决定再次挑战试炼。
"Raped by the black-winged holy knight" Viewed=“被淫翼圣骑士强奸”已阅
Skipped "Raped by the black-winged holy knight"=跳过了“被淫翼圣骑士强奸”
27. 

Wahahahaha! We've been waiting for you, perverted female knight!\r\nWitness our power!=呼哈哈哈哈！可算见到你了你这痴女骑士啊！见识见识我们的力量吧！
----章节介绍部分----【结束】

Crystal\r\nConversion=水晶兑换
Currently owned=目前拥有
Items can be used by opening the pause screen from the action game screen.=从动作游戏屏幕打开暂停屏幕即可使用物品。
----------------------------------------
Consumable items=消耗品
---------------------------------------
Fire Sword Crystal=炎剑的魔石
A crystal containing condensed, burning fire magic. Unlike crystals found while exploring, crystals obtained from converting Magic Stones are stable and can be safely carried on your person. \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>Using this item will temporarily infuse your weapon with flame magic.</color> Scorching flame magic will ignite enemies without fire resistance and deal lethal damage to undead as well as enemies that have a low body temperature.=一种含有浓缩燃烧火焰魔法的水晶。\n不同于探索到的天然结晶，由魔法石转化而来的水晶很稳定，可安全随身携带。 \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>使用此物品会暂时为你的武器注入火焰魔法。</color> 灼热的火焰魔法会点燃没有耐火能力的敌人，对不死生物和体温较低的敌人造成致命伤害。
Thunder Sword Crystal=雷剑的魔石
A crystal containing condensed, surging lightning magic. Unlike crystals found while exploring, crystals obtained from converting Magic Stones are stable and can be safely carried on your person. \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>Using this item will temporarily infuse your weapon with lightning magic.</color> Roaring lightning magic will shock enemies without lightning resistance and deal lethal damage to aquatic monsters, insects and birds.=一种含有浓缩的、汹涌的闪电魔法的水晶。\n不同于探索到的天然结晶，由魔法石转化而来的水晶很稳定，可安全随身携带。 \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>使用此物品会暂时为你的武器注入闪电魔法。</color> 咆哮的闪电魔法会在没有闪电抗性的情况下震惊敌人，并对水生魔物、昆虫和鸟类造成致命伤害。
Ice Sword Crystal=冰剑的魔石
A crystal containing condensed, chilling ice magic. Unlike crystals found while exploring, crystals obtained from converting Magic Stones are stable and can be safely carried on your person. \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>Using this item will temporarily infuse your weapon with ice magic.</color> Biting ice magic will freeze enemies without ice resistance and deal lethal damage to dragons as well as enemies with a high body temperature.=一种含有浓缩的、冰冷的冰魔法的水晶。\n不同于探索到的天然结晶，由魔法石转化而来的水晶很稳定，可安全随身携带。 \r\n<color%3D#FFFFBF>使用此物品会暂时为你的武器注入冰魔法。</color> 刺痛的冰魔法可以冻结没有冰抗性的敌人，对龙和体温高的敌人造成致命伤害。
Life Crystal=生命结晶
A crystal containing condensed life magic. Unlike crystals found while exploring, crystals obtained from converting Magic Stones are stable and can be safely carried on your person. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will recover HP.</color>=一种含有浓缩生命魔法的水晶。\n不同于探索到的天然结晶，由魔法石转化而来的水晶很稳定，可安全随身携带。 \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品将恢复HP（血量)。</color>
Mana Crystal=魔力结晶
A crystal containing pure, condensed magic. Unlike crystals found while exploring, crystals obtained from converting Magic Stones are stable and can be safely carried on your person. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will recover MP.</color>=一种含有纯净、浓缩魔法的水晶。\n不同于探索到的天然结晶，由魔法石转化而来的水晶很稳定，可安全随身携带。 \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品将恢复MP（魔力)。</color>
Purification Crystal=净化结晶
A crystal containing condensed holy energy. Contains power of the same nature as that which the sun god bestowed upon Ricca. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will heal bad status effects such as burning and frozen.</color>=一种含有浓缩神圣能量的水晶。蕴含着阳神赋予莉卡的同性质力量。\r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品可治疗燃烧、冻结等不良状态。</color>
Damage Crystal=自伤结晶
A crystal made of concentrated unstable magic. Releasing the magic will harm the nearest person.\r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>Using it will cause your strength to halve. Won't kill you.</color>=由不稳定的魔法制成的水晶。释放魔法会伤害最近的人。\r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>使用它会减半你的血量。不会杀了你的。</color>
Armor Repair Crystal=铠甲修复魔石
A crystal containing condensed defense magic. \r\nThe holy knight's armor and clothing are protected by a holy blessing, reducing the damage of all manner of physical and magic attacks. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will repair your armor and clothing, and restore one level of durability.</color>=含有浓缩格挡魔法的水晶。\n神圣骑士的盔甲和衣服受到神圣祝福的保护，减少各种物理和魔法攻击的伤害。 \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品将修复你的盔甲和衣服，并恢复一级耐久性。</color>
Armor Destruction Crystal=铠甲破坏魔石
A crystal containing condensed destruction magic. \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>Using this item will reduce your armor durability by 1 level.</color> Can't be used immediately after armor or clothing is broken.=含有浓缩魔法的水晶。 \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>使用此物品将使你的护甲耐久性降低1级。\n</color>盔甲或衣物破损后不能立即使用。
Sun Crystal=太阳之辉石
A crystal containing powerful, condensed holy energy. \r\nIn the region where Ricca lives, many believe in the legend of the sun god who was said to have once driven the monsters rampaging on the surface away, into another world. The rays of the sun are said to be the manifestation of the sun god's power and are believed to be god's blessing to mankind. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will temporarily make you immune to damage from all sources except grapples and instant-kill attacks.</color>=一种含有强大、浓缩的神圣能量的水晶。\n在莉卡生活的地区，许多人知晓太阳神的传说，据说太阳神曾把在地表上横冲直撞的魔物驱赶到另一个世界。太阳光据说是太阳神力量的体现，被认为是阳神对人类的祝福。 \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品将暂时使你免疫除格斗和瞬杀攻击之外的所有来源的伤害。</color>
Wings Crystal=翼之辉石
A crystal containing condensed, levitation magic.\r\nThe same kind of magic that Iris and the other fairies use to fly in the sky resides in them.\r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will grow wings of magical power and fly for a small amount of time, making it temporarily immune to all damage except grapples and instant-kill attacks.</color>=一种含有浓缩悬浮魔法的水晶。\n蕴含着和伊莉丝等妖精们一样的在天空中飞翔的魔法。\r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品会长出魔法之翼并飞行一小段时间，暂时免疫除格斗和瞬杀攻击之外的所有伤害。</color>

-----------------------------
Passive effect items\r\n<size%3D75%>It can be disposed of by use</size>=被动效果物品\r\n<size%3D75%>使用掉可以清除效果</size>
----------------------------
Pink Crystal=淡红色的辉石
A naturally occurring combination of a life crystal and a Magic Stone. While rare, its bewitching red color gave rise to a superstition associating it with female demons, and as such its popularity as a jewel is limited. \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Using this item will recover HP. When held, this item will also recover HP when the wearer is close to death.</color> As the amount of HP recovered is very low, this item is ineffective against consecutive attacks.=生命结晶和魔法石的自然组合。虽然罕见，但它迷人的红色却引发了一种迷信，认为它与魅魔有关，因此它作为珠宝的受欢迎程度有限。 \r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>使用此物品将恢复HP。持有时，当佩戴者接近死亡时，该物品也会恢复生命。</color> \n由于恢复的HP值很低，此物品对连续的攻击无效。
Fairy's Blessing=强化妖精的秘石
A crystal emanating holy magic. Its soothing waves are of the same kind as those created by the power of god, which protects fairies.\r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>Iris' magic is strengthened for every one in your possession.</color> Use to obtain a small number of Magic Stones.=散发神圣魔力的水晶。它舒缓的波长与保护妖精的阳神的力量创造的波长一样。\r\n<color%3D#BFFFBF>伊莉丝的魔法会加强每一个人。</color> \n使用（废除)它会产生少量魔法石。
Skull Crystal=骷髅咒石
A crystal used to amplify the effects of spells. Liches will often use these to suppress the life energy within a creature's body and control them as an undead. \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>Carrying this item will increase the damage you deal, but also increase the damage you receive.</color> Using it will give a small number of Magic Stones.=用来放大咒语效果的水晶。巫妖经常使用这些来压制生物体内的生命能量，并将其控制为不死生物。 \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>携带此物品会增加你的攻击，但也会增加你受到的伤害。</color> \n使用（废除)它会产生少量魔法石。
Black Skull Crystal=暗色骷髅咒石
A defective Skull Crystal. Doesn't function properly as a necromancy catalyst. \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>Carrying this item will cause your armor to deteriorate drastically.</color> Using it will give a small number of Magic Stones.=有缺陷的骷髅咒石。不能正常发挥巫术催化剂的作用。 \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>携带此物品会使你的护甲急剧退化。</color> \n使用（废除)它会产生少量魔法石。
Red Skull Crystal=血色骷髅咒石
A defective Skull Crystal. Doesn't function properly as a necromancy catalyst. \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>Carrying this item will cause you to die immediately upon taking damage.</color> Using it will give a small number of Magic Stones.=有缺陷的骷髅咒石。不能正常发挥巫术催化剂的作用。 \r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>携带此物品会导致你在受到伤害后立即死亡。</color> \n使用（废除)它会产生少量魔法石。
Fairy's Bane=封印妖精的咒石
A crystal emanating dark magic. Its evil waves inhibit the abilities of fairies, who are highly sensitive to magic.\r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>When it is in your possession, Iris is unable to use magic.</color> Use to obtain a small number of Magic Stones.=散发着黑暗魔法的水晶。它的邪恶波长抑制了妖精的能力，妖精对魔力高度敏感。\r\n<color%3D#FFBFBF>携带它时，伊莉丝无法使用魔法。</color> \n使用（废除)它会产生少量魔法石。

----水晶兑换界面部分----【结束】

You are able to jump once more while airborne.=你可以在空中再次跳跃。
Please select a file.=请选择一个文件。
A difficulty aimed towards skilled players.=针对熟练玩家的难度。
The game's normal difficulty.=本游戏的正常难度。
Fewer Magic Stones dropped by enemies.\r\nSome skills unlocked from the start.=敌人掉落的魔法石更少。\r\n有些技能从一开始就解锁了。
A difficulty for people who just want to have fun.=本难度适合那些只想愉快玩耍的玩家。
Please select the difficulty.=请选择难度。
More Magic Stones dropped by enemies.\r\nNo option to auto-clear stages on the Game Over screen.=敌人掉落更多魔法石。\n游戏失败时没有自动跳过关卡的选项。
Difficulty can be changed at any time in-game from the settings menu.=难度可以在游戏设置菜单中随时改变。

-------------速度-----------------------

Move Spd. : Medium=移动速度：中等
Move Spd. : Quite slow=移动速度：稍慢
Move Spd. : Slow=移动速度：慢
Move Spd. : Very slow=移动速度：非常慢
Move Spd. : Super slow=移动速度：超级慢

-----攻速------------------

Attack Spd. : Very fast=攻击速度：非常快

Attack Spd. : Slow=攻击速度：慢

Attack : Highest=攻击 : 最高
Attack : Very high=攻击 : 非常高
Attack : High=攻击 : 高

Attack : Low=攻击 : 低
Attack : Very low=攻击 : 非常低
Attack : Lowest=攻击 : 最低

<b>Pleasure Gauge</b>\r\n When struck by certain attacks, a pink gauge in the top-left of the screen will appear.\r\n While the gauge is on the screen, you won't be able to use special attacks,\r\n and your attack and defense will be lowered.=<b>愉悦累计表</b>\r\n 当被某些攻击击中时，屏幕左上角会出现一个粉红色的累计表。\n当累计表显示在屏幕上时，你将无法使用特殊攻击，\n你的攻击和格挡将会削弱。

=====================水晶提示区=放在一起以便统一============
<b>Thunder Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a thunder sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of lightning for a short time.\r\n You can shock weak enemies to stop them in their tracks\r\n and deal massive damage to\r\n aquatic monsters, insects, birds or enemies who wear armor.=<b>雷剑的魔石</b>\r\n 收集雷剑的魔石\n 将短时间内给你的武器注入雷的威力。\n 可以电击弱小的敌人，阻止他们前进\n 并对水生魔物、昆虫、鸟类或穿盔甲的敌人\n 造成巨大伤害。
<b>Fire Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a fire sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of fire for a short time.\r\n You can deal periodic burn damage to weak enemies\r\n and deal massive damage to undead\r\n and other enemies with a low body temperature.=<b>炎剑的魔石</b>\r\n 收集炎剑的魔石\n 将在短时间内给你的武器注火的威力。\n 可以对弱小的敌人造成周期性的燃烧伤害\n 对不死生物等低体温的敌人\n 造成巨大伤害。
Your weapon has been infused with Lightning magic=你的武器被注入了雷电魔力
<b>Ice Sword Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting an ice sword crystal\r\n will infuse your weapon with the power of ice for a short time.\r\n You can freeze weak enemies to slow them down\r\n and deal massive damage to dragons\r\n and other enemies with a high body temperature.=<b>冰剑的魔石</b>\r\n 收集冰剑的魔石\r\n 将在短时间内给你的武器注冰的威力。\r\n 可以冻结弱小敌人以减缓它们\r\n 并对龙和其他体温高的敌人\r\n 造成巨大的伤害。

————————买东西—开始———

Goblin=哥布林
--------------------------------------
H Scene Mode & Album Mode=H场景和相册模式

<color%3D#FF4F2F>Fire/Heat</color>:Very High  <color%3D#FFFF7F>Ltng./Acid</color>:Quite Low  <color%3D#AFFFFF>Ice/Water</color>:Very High=<color%3D#FF4F2F>火/热</color>：非常高  <color%3D#FFFF7F>雷/酸</color>：相当低  <color%3D#AFFFFF>冰/水</color>：非常高
<color%3D#FF4F2F>Fire/Heat</color>:Quite Low  <color%3D#FFFF7F>Ltng./Acid</color>:Quite Low  <color%3D#AFFFFF>Ice/Water</color>:Ineffective=<color%3D#FF4F2F>火/热</color>：相当低  <color%3D#FFFF7F>雷/酸</color>：相当低  <color%3D#AFFFFF>冰/水</color>：无效




【以下内容分离自 回想CG界面、图鉴文本.txt 基于日翻图鉴文本 【人名英文化】来自可爱的黑丸.txt 进行文本替换】正在校对
A girl who lives in a mountain village. While her lifestyle may not be extravagant, she and her older sister, Miria, live together happily with the help of their fellow villagers. She usually either works as a clerk at her village's general store or gathers herbs in the mountains. She often argues with her older sister who still treats her like a child, but deep down she really loves her. \r\nTravelers often come in search of food or lodging from a large mountain road that runs near the village. The village youngsters tend to listen closely to the words of travelers and long for the world outside the village, but Ricca is generally uninterested and prefers to take things at her own pace.=在山村中居住的少女。虽并不富裕，但在村民们的帮助下和姐姐Miria二人幸福地生活着。平常会帮助村里的杂货店看店、在山上采摘草药。虽然对蜜莉雅总把自己当作小孩子看待表现出不满情绪，但心里却最喜欢了。\r\n翻过村子附近的山后就是街道，在那里有旅行者前来吃住。村里的年轻人听着从他们那里传来的城市状况而对外面的世界心生憧憬，但有自己想法的莉卡却对这些并没什么兴趣。
The most beautiful girl in the village and Ricca's gentle older sister. She is {{A}} years older than Ricca and usually works in the cafeteria. After losing their parents to an epidemic, she did everything in her power to raise Ricca, who was still a child. She has since mellowed out, but she used to be very emotional, shy and had a very strong sense of duty. \r\nLegends of a fallen kingdom have been passed down by refugees for hundreds of years. A rundown church from that time still stands within the village. The church is still used to this day. Miria currently cleans and manages it in place of the elderly village mayor and his wife.=村里最漂亮的温柔美人，是莉卡的姐姐。比Ricca大十岁，平常在食堂工作。由于父母都死于流行病所以拼命地养大了幼小的莉卡。是个虽然现在冷静下来了但曾表现出的强大责任感让村里人尽皆知的少女。\r\n村子里有着几百年前灭亡的王国的残党兴建并传承下来，现在作为遗迹的教堂残留着。教堂现在仍在使用着，年迈的村长夫妻拜托蜜莉雅代替他们打扫和管理着。
The form taken by Ricca after transforming using the power of the brooch given to her by "God." \r\nThrough divine magical protection, Ricca's soft, light body now contains strength on par with a muscular adult male. Her endurance and recovery capabilities have also improved drastically. \r\nRicca's sun-shaped brooch is enchanted with a variety of spells. It enhances Ricca's abilities by absorbing magic, allowing her to fight against monsters on a more equal footing.=只是个村姑的莉卡用从『神明大人』那里授予的宝石的力量变身之后的姿态。\r\n由于神圣魔力的加护，可以让少女那轻盈柔软的身体像久经锻炼的成年男性一样强大，和变身前相比耐久力和恢复力都大幅提升了。\r\n太阳形状的宝石可以释放多种法术，吸收了魔力之后能力也会壮大，和魔物战斗时就能占据上风。

The form taken by Ricca after fully drawing out the latent holy knight energy contained within her brooch by combining the magic of humans, monsters and darkness. Due to the tremendous magic expenditure of this form, it may be difficult for the newly-transformed Ricca to handle, but if she were to obtain complete control over it, her power could exceed even that of a god.=从柯蕾露的水晶球中获得的人类的魔力、在大门那里吸收到的暗之魔力，以全身的咒印为媒介从魔石中吸收的魔物的魔力集合，将胸针中圣骑士的力量最大化的莉卡的姿态。魔力的消耗十分激烈，刚变身的莉卡无法处理这股力量，如果能完全驾驭这般强大的力量的话怕是会比肩神明。
A fairy who traveled from the high mountains in search of the one chosen to be the holy knight. A mystic who uses restorative and illusion magic to aid her allies in combat. \r\nBecause she was still relatively young amongst fairy kind, whose lifespans far exceed those of humans, it was believed she would be capable of adapting to the world of humans. Thus she was given the mission of providing support for the holy knight by "God". \r\nDespite being a kind girl who cares for her friends at heart, the importance of her mission weighs heavily on her shoulders, often causing her expression to grow stern.=从高山地带来寻找被选中的圣骑士的妖精。拥有可以恢复、幻惑以及战斗辅助用的神秘力量。\r\n在比人类寿命长的多的妖精一族中她是很年轻的一员，期待拥有能适应人类世界的温柔，从『神明大人』那里接受了协助圣骑士的使命。\r\n这个原本在同族中公认的温柔的女性。在认识到自己肩负的神明大人授予的使命的重要性时她的表情中危机感多了起来。
A mage girl who saved Ricca when she was being attacked by orcs. Polite and diligent. In order to focus on her magic research she currently lives in isolation, away from villages and towns. She feels lonely because she doesn't have any friends. Her parents are both renowned mages - her father specializing in restorative magic and her mother in attack magic. Claret herself received special education from a young age and is able to use a wide variety of magic. Her parents were summoned to the capital in an effort to deal with the monster problem, so Claret currently lives alone, protecting her isolated home while eliminating nearby monsters.=救助了被兽人袭击的莉卡的魔法师少女。严肃且有礼貌。为了研究魔法而在远离城市和村庄的土地上生活着，但没有朋友在还是会让她感到寂寞。父母是因为回复魔法和攻击魔法而闻名于世的魔法师。柯蕾露自己也在很小的时候接受了精英教育，各种魔法都可以使用。父母因对抗魔物而被王都召集走了，柯蕾露就在这不毛之地一人守护着家，退治着魔物。
A sheepdog that was raised in Ricca's village. Because herding was handled by his brothers and due to the increasing number of monsters around the village, he was allowed to roam free, acting as a guard dog. \r\nClever, and friendly to humans, he has been Ricca's closest playmate ever since the blacksmith's daughter, Olivia, left the village.=莉卡村里养着的牧羊犬。但牧羊的话用它的兄弟们就够了，村子周边的魔物多起来之后就把它作为宠物狗养着了。\r\n它聪明又友善，在锻造店的女儿Olivia结婚并离开村子后，它就是莉卡最好的玩伴了。
A servant created by an evil necromancer who fitted a puppet made of soil and stone with a core crystal containing the soul of an unknown entity. Is loyal to its master's will and possesses immensely powerful arms. \r\nEven for a holy knight whose body is stronger than that of a normal human, escaping from its sturdy arms would prove difficult. Those taken captive would find escape difficult; their vain struggles would only exhaust them and ultimately hasten their conveyance to the golem's master. Even so, if the captured prey insisted on maintaining its resistance, then...=邪恶的死灵法师用岩石和泥土作成的人偶，用某人的精神注入之后嵌以魔石制成的使魔。对主人的命令忠诚，有着不可阻挡的力量。\r\n即使是比常人更强的圣骑士的肉体，被它强壮的双手抓住后也很难挣脱，待其苦苦挣扎到无力后就会被送往主人所在的地方吧。如果即便这样手里的猎物还是不放弃继续抵抗的话...
The form taken by the goblin captain of the forest fortress after being empowered by the evil magic emitted from the black crystal ball. Highly intelligent for a goblin and a formerly loyal subject of Archlich, but deemed to be of no further use after luring Ricca to the fortress. \r\nHaving become part-undead through dark magic, he's bigger and stronger than a normal goblin, but weaker to flames. He possesses a powerful spinning attack, but if you make use of the chains hanging in the fortress, it should be easy to avoid.=在森林的城堡里驻扎的哥布林们的队长，用从黑色水晶球中释放的邪恶魔力强化之后的样子。在哥布林中智力卓越，是阿奎雷奇忠实的仆人，想着在莉卡被引到城堡里的时候埋伏她。\r\n被黑暗力量变成了半不死族，比一般的哥布林要强得多，但相应的对火焰的抗性变弱了。转圈攻击十分强力，利用好城堡内部悬挂着的锁链的话应该可以很容易规避掉。
An undead born from the fusion of a drain crystal's magic and human enmity. The spitting image of what humans regard to be a "grim reaper". Possesses no physical form since its body is composed of magic. \r\nA holy knight's weapon has the special ability to deal with enemies without losing its holy energy. Enemies hit by its blade will have their wounds filled with holy energy and take fatal damage, but because this monster doesn't possess a physical form, even a holy knight's weapon won't be able to deal any effective damage.=用人类的怨恨和导能水晶输送的魔力结合而成的不死族。它的样子就像人类想象中的「死神」一样，由于身体完全是由魔力构成的所以没有实体。\r\n圣骑士的武器有着直接传递神圣力量的属性。被攻击到的魔物会在伤口处被注入神圣的气息并受到致命伤害，对于无法直接伤害到的这个魔物即使是圣骑士的武器也无法有效对其造成伤害。
A female Demon who feeds on the semen of humans and demi-humans. In order to capture the holy knight girl, Miria's body was modified by Archlich's spells. She's been given a lightning attack that can pierce through holy protection as well as a magic eye that can seduce its target regardless of gender. Miria's sense of right and wrong have been overwritten to suit her monstrous form. With the desires she had kept hidden deep inside her amplified, the kind personality Miria used to have has been warped beyond recognition.=以人类和亚人的精液为食的女恶魔。阿奎雷奇用法术改造的蜜莉雅，为了能让她抓到圣骑士少女，阿奎雷奇还给予了她能贯穿神圣防御加护的雷电、不论异性还是同性都能魅惑的魔眼这两种特殊能力。精神上也染上了魔物的价值观，并且蜜莉雅内心深处沉睡的欲望也被强化了，过去善良的人格也被强行扭曲了。
A half-beast, half-Demon who possesses both a limitless supply of magic and an intellect high enough to understand human language. The beast that appeared in front of Ricca's party was one that had made a connection with a mage girl {{A}} years ago. From that experience, it began to hunt monsters and soon came to be worshipped as a guardian by humans in the surrounding lands. After its mind was polluted by evil energy, it began to shut itself away in its lair. It now protects the drain crystal that absorbs the overflowing earth magic from in the valley.=能听懂人话，拥有极高的智慧与魔法，储备着无尽魔力的半兽半魔物的生物。莉卡她们面前的这个个体，在６０年以前曾与魔法师少女心灵相通过，狩猎了周围的魔物，从而被周边地区的人类尊崇地称为「守护者」。受到邪恶的魔力后思想变得狂躁后盘踞在住处里，在山谷中吸收着大地的魔力并守护着导能水晶。
An undead that was revived when Archlich poured his magic energy into the corpse of an elite guard. Possesses intelligence on par with what it had before revival. Because it is controlled through magic rather than its own heavy muscles, the attacks its old bones makes are more precise than they were in life. \r\nDifficult to deal with because it wields a spear with a long reach, but if you can avoid the spear's tip, you may find an opportunity to strike. \r\nHaving lost its meat rod and means of release after becoming a skeleton, its pent-up desires have become deviously twisted.=阿奎雷奇用自己的魔力注入精锐士兵的尸体之后苏醒过来的不死族。拥有着活着时候的知性，代替原本强壮的肌肉的是用魔力驱动的骨骼，反而能使出比生前更加干净利落的战技。\r\n装备着盾牌和长枪，是非常麻烦的对手，击碎枪尖的话就能找到破绽了。\r\n因为变成白骨了自己的肉枪没有了不能导了，积攒的欲望扭曲成了阴湿。
A survivor of the giant beings once worshipped as gods of the sea. Having lost devotees due to the ascendancy of the sun god, it was driven from its home, and has since lived quietly in a cave at the bottom of the ocean. Despite gradually being forgotten, by performing good deeds such as freeing ships stuck in coral reefs in the nearby seas, it continued to try to live an existence beneficial to humans. However, after being exposed to the effects of evil magic, it turned into a monster and became Archlich's servant. Since becoming a monster, it has guarded the cave that leads to the castle. \r\nIn order to maintain its massive body, it uses an external magical core that it has taken into its body. This core was once given as an offering by believers, but...=过去被当作神一样敬仰的，曾掌管海洋的巨人族的残留。由于掌管太阳的神的实力上升，对它们的信仰消失后它们被赶到了海底的洞穴里静静地生活着。即使被遗忘了还是会帮助附近海域里触礁的船只，在人类中仍然是善良的存在。受到邪恶的魔力影响而变成了魔物，变成了阿奎雷奇的下仆。变成魔物之后在通往城里的道路的洞穴中守卫着。\r\n利用从外部获取的「魔力炉」来维持巨大的身体。那似乎是过去的信众们献上的东西...
A golem that was created using steel rather than soil and rocks. \r\nDespite possessing an impenetrable defense against fire, lightning, ice and the holy knight's weapon attacks, its magical core remains its weak point.=用钢铁材料代替泥土和岩石制成的魔像。\r\n它的身体被注入了炎、雷、冰的力量，用圣骑士的武器攻击是一样的，注入魔力的魔像的弱点并没有变。
A Demonic beast created by a lich by patching various parts of monsters and animals together. Possesses the ability to use its tentacle-shaped tail to stab and inject enemies that invade its territory with cursed, petrifying poison. \r\nThanks to holy energy, the holy knight possesses a high resistance to physical maladies. However, if enough petrifying poison to exceed said resistance were injected at once, there would be no stopping their body from turning to stone.=巫妖将动物和魔物的身体拼接之后做成的魔兽。对于侵入自己领地的生物会用触手状的尾巴突刺，并注入附有石化诅咒的毒液。\r\n圣骑士因为神圣之力的关系拥有着很高的异常状态抗性。然而如果被注入了大量的石化毒液的话，身体还是会因为抵抗力撑不住而被石化。
The leader of the arachne tribe that inhabits the northern lands. Because of a high magic affinity and therefore resistance, it isn't affected by the evil magic infecting the lands. However, to protect the northern lands for its comrades, it willingly became a subordinate of the Archlich. \r\nPossesses a large, powerful body which has adapted to better maintain its body heat in harsh environments. Despite having lost its ability to shoot webs, it can instead control ice magic to freeze and capture its prey.=在寒冷地带栖息着的阿拉库涅族的长老。拥有着很高的魔力和抵抗力，没有受到邪恶魔力的影响，但为了北地居住着的同族，自愿当了阿奎雷奇的部下。\r\n为了在严酷的环境中维持体温，大型化的身体很强韧，发射丝线的能力因此退化，但相应的拥有着操纵冰的魔法，可以利用冰魔法冻结并捕获猎物。
A ghoul created by a lich by pouring his evil magic into the corpse of an orc. With empowered endurance and regenerative abilities, any damage taken from a half-hearted attack will be instantly restored. Because its body size and weight have increased, each step it takes causes small tremors in its vicinity. It wields a war hammer infused with lightning magic, but unlike the succubus', this magic doesn't have any special properties.=巫妖给兽人的尸体注入邪恶魔力后产生的僵尸。耐久力和再生能力都得到了强化，受到半吊子的攻击会立马恢复。身体变大的同时体重也增加了，在地面上跺脚都会在周围引起地震。装备着附魔了雷电之力的铁锤，那雷是和魅魔的雷电不一样的没有特殊能力的雷。
A subspecies of wyvern born from a sudden mutation caused by waves that traveled through a gate from the world of darkness. \r\nIt can use magic to spew lava, but because its intelligence is so low, it will most likely hit both its prey and itself. The blood it sprays from its mouth contains a curse that decreases the defense of its target.=通过大门后由于黑暗世界的波动而引发突然变异产生的飞龙亚种。\r\n可以喷出熔岩、使用魔法，但由于智力很低会同时对猎物和自己造成伤害。可以从嘴里吐出血飞沫，附带有能降低对手防御力的诅咒。
Leader of the liches and the one responsible for placing the drain crystals across the lands. The principle force behind the monsters' increased aggressiveness. Dark energy consistently emanates from his body, and he can use a limitless amount of high level magic. \r\nDespite being a spellcaster, he is equipped with a sword and armor, allowing him to adequately engage in close combat as well.=死灵术士的首席，在各地设置导能水晶使得魔物凶暴化的幕后黑手。在它的身体里常有黑暗魔力涌出，可以使用无限的高级魔法。\r\n装备着与魔法师不相称的厚重甲胄和剑，看来即使是近战也没有什么问题。
The form taken by the court magician who was once in an illicit relationship with the queen of the island castle, after taking over and modifying the body of one of the queen's royal guards. \r\nHe planned to usurp the throne in an attempt to prove his worthiness to the woman he loved, but as far as the queen was concerned he was merely one of her many lovers. His ambitions grew beyond his stature, and after sullying his hands with illegal necromancy, he was soon reported to the authorities and dragged to the execution grounds. In the moment of his death, he completed a spell to steal the lives of all the residents on the island, and was reborn as an undead. He used monsters to rule the surrounding regions but was unable to obtain his revenge against the queen. \r\nIn order to fulfill his ambitions and find the queen, he continued to expand his territories before being eliminated by a female knight wielding the power of the sun.=与岛上城邦的王妃有着禁断关系的宫廷魔法师，夺取了王妃的近卫骑士的身体并进行改造之后的样子。\r\n男人为了让自己配得上心爱的女人，尽可能地夺取着王位，但是对于王妃来说，他就只是众多男人当中的一个，于是疏远了他。最终他因为自己的野心和接触了禁忌的死灵术被告发后被送往刑场。在被处死的时候，夺取岛内全部住民的死灵术完成，他也作为不死族复活了。他驱使魔物支配了周边地区但还是没有向王妃复仇成功。\r\n为了实现野心和搜索王妃继续扩大着领域，最后被使用太阳之力的女骑士成功讨伐。
The descendent of a primal dragon that the previous holy knight sealed away in another world. The injuries from its previous battle still haven't healed so there are open wounds covering its body. Despite possessing a large body and enormous magical power, its intelligence is lacking, which is why it only attempts to devour whatever lies before it. However, its gluttony knows no bounds, it is capable of eradicating all creatures inhabiting an entire continents within a few weeks. \r\nLong ago, the being known as "God" amongst humans and fairies used sunlight to banish the dragon tribe that lives in darkness from the land's surface. The power of the holy knight, which unleashes the same dazzling sunlight, is a power meant to seal away monsters just like this.=被前代圣骑士封印在异世界的原始的龙的末裔。上次战斗造成的伤口还没有愈合，身上还有着被撕开的伤口。与巨大的身体和庞大的魔力相比它的智力并没有那么发达，只想着将眼前的东西全部当作自己的食物吃掉。但是它的食欲没有尽头，只需数周就可以吃绝一个大陆的生物。\r\n在遥远的过去，被人类和妖精叫做『神明大人』的存在用阳光将住在暗中的龙之一族从地上赶走了。如果是有着与阳光同样光辉的圣骑士的力量的话，一定有能封印这个魔物的力量。
An illusion created in a dream by Archlich in order to take over Ricca's body. Archlich attempted to engrave a crippling weakness to sexual desire into Ricca's heart and exhaust her mentally, before stealing control of her body. The after-effects of battle that flare up nearly every night for Ricca are by and large due to Archlich's interference. Archlich had originally planned to steal Ricca's body, research the dredges of holy energy within it and use his findings to formulate a plan to deal with the next holy knight that appeared.=阿奎雷奇为了占据莉卡的身体而在梦中制造出的幻影。\r\n阿奎雷奇在战胜不了淫欲的弱小莉卡的心中通过复现来消耗莉卡的精神从而夺取肉体的主导权。每晚发作的战争后遗症也都是阿奎雷奇干涉放大的，计划在成功夺取莉卡的身体之后再研究残留的神圣之力，等到下一个圣骑士出现的时候就有对抗手段了。

==========穷举数字信息===现在基本可以弄！==============

注意：
配置文件的
TemplateAllNumberAway=False改为True
使得数字表达式启用。
新获取到的文本中的任何数字都将被双层半角大括号中夹杂大写字母取代
已经写了定值数字的行不会受影响，不会重新抓到。
必要性：有些值会不停地变（几千个值)，如果不这样做，文本会一直抽搐！！！

==================穷举完毕=============





——————————————————————————————————————【断章】蜜莉雅 开始——————————————————————————————
Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nLost Chapter Miria?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n遗失的章节 蜜莉雅?
(<indent%3D0.4em>There's...a light...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>有...光...？)
(Ah...)=（啊...)
Ah...icca... Uh... Aah... Kah... Aah...=啊...li卡...唔...啊...卡...啊...
(<indent%3D0.4em>But still... Why...does it...hurt...?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>可…为…么...痛？)
(<indent%3D0.4em>It hurts... I can't breathe... But I was stabbed through the chest...so I guess that's normal...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>好疼...喘不了气...不过我的胸腔被捅穿了...所以会这么痛啊...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>I...was stabbed...by Archlich... I should be dead...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我被…阿奎雷奇捅了…应该…死了…)

Z Key / 1 Button=Z键/1按钮

2 Button=2 按钮
C Key=C键
1 Button=1 按钮
Z Key=Z键
11 Button=11 按钮
LeftControl Key=左Ctrl键
12 Button=12 按钮
↑ Key=↑ 键
2- Axis=2- 轴
↓ Key=↓ 键
2+ Axis=2+ 轴
← Key=← 键
1- Axis=1- 轴
→ Key=→ 键
1+ Axis=1+ 轴
Attack=袭击
Jump=跳
Move left=向左移动
Special attack=特殊攻击
Walk/Guard=移动/防御
Zキー / JoypadButton1=Z键 / 1 按钮
Hits=击打
Controls=控制
Elapsed time=经过的时间
R-15モード=R-15模式
Hシーン=H场景

<b>Move left</b>\r\n Keyboard: ← Key\r\n Controller: 1- Axis <line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Move right</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard: → Key\r\n Controller: 1+ Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Attack</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard: X Key\r\n Controller: 1 Button=<b>左右移动</b>\n 键盘： ←→ 键\r\n 手柄：1-1+轴 <line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>攻击</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：X键\n手柄：1按钮
<align%3Dleft><b>Move left</b>\r\n Keyboard: ← Key    Controller: 1- Axis <line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Move right</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard: → Key    Controller: 1+ Axis<line-height%3D150%>=<align%3Dleft><b>向左移动</b>\r\n 键盘：← 键    手柄：1-轴 <line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>向右移动</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：→ 键    手柄：1+轴<line-height%3D150%>
<b>Ascend ladders/Grab in mid-air</b>\r\n Keyboard:↑ Key\r\n Controller:2- Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Descend ladders</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:↓ Key\r\n Controller:2+ Axis<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>Let go of ladders</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n Keyboard:Z Key\r\n Controller:3 Button=<b>攀登梯子/半空抓梯</b>\r\n 键盘：↑ 键/手柄：2-轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>爬下梯子</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：↓ 键/手柄：2+轴<line-height%3D150%>\r\n<b>爬下梯子</b><line-height%3D100%>\r\n 键盘：Z键/手柄：3按钮

——武器
Skeleton Warrior Spear=骷髅战士矛
Perfect Guard Window Increase=完美格挡机遇增加
Skeleton Warrior Spear／A spear favored by skeleton warriors. It has powerful thrusts, but only the tip is strong.\r\nWhen equipped, Perfect Guards become easier to execute.=骷髅战士矛／骷髅兵喜欢用的矛。它有强大的推力，但只有尖端强大。\n装备时更容易完美格挡。
Holy Knight Greatsword=圣骑士巨剑
Holy Knight Greatsword／A greatsword given to the holy knight by the sun god.\r\nBoasts a good balance of weight and attack power. Decreases the cooldown time of special attacks when equipped.=圣骑士巨剑／太阳神送给圣骑士的一把巨剑。\n拥有良好的平衡的重量和攻击力。装备后减少特殊攻击的冷却时间。
Elemental Sword=元素剑
Elemental Sword／A blade blessed by spirits governing the elements of fire, lightning and ice.\r\nAn extremely light blade with a high attack speed. Raises resistance to all 3 elements when equipped.=元素之剑／由掌管火、闪电和冰元素的妖精祝福的剑。\n极轻的刀刃，攻击速度很快。装备后提高对所有3种元素的抗性。
Black Sun Greatsword=黑太阳巨剑
Black Sun Greatsword／A long, heavy greatsword, unwieldable by the average warrior. \r\nIncreases damage of the 4th consecutive hit for weak and strong attacks, and the 3rd consecutive hit for weak aerial attacks.=黑太阳巨剑／一把又长又重的巨剑，一般战士难以驾驭。\n对于弱攻击和强攻击，增加第四次连击的伤害；对于弱空攻击，增加第三次连击的伤害。
White-Winged Holy Knight Greatsword=白翼的圣骑士巨剑
White-Winged Holy Knight Greatsword／The new form of the Holy Knight Greatsword which evolved in response to its wielders increase in power.\r\nWhen equipped, increases defense and reduces the cooldown time of special attacks.=白翼的圣骑士巨剑／新形态的圣骑士巨剑，它的进化是为了回应持用者力量的增加。\n装备后增加防御并减少特殊攻击的冷却时间。
Heavenly Ōdachi=天神大太刀
Heavenly Ōdachi／A blade offered in worship by people of the far east.\r\nConsecutive hits increase the blade's attack and knockback capabilities.=天神大太刀／东方地区的人们用来祭拜的一把刀。\n连击时增加武器的攻击力和击退能力。
Spear of Retaliation=复仇之矛
Spear of Retaliation／A short spear engraved with magical runes. Capable of powerful thrusts, but only the tip is strong.\r\nDoes increased damage to enemies when they are struck mid-attack.=复仇之矛／刻有魔法符文的短矛。有强大的击退能力，但只有尖端强大。\n当敌人在攻击中被击中时，对他们造成更大的伤害。
Sunblaze Lance=沐浴日光之矛
Sunblaze Lance／A knight's lance emblazoned with markings representing the rays of the sun.\r\nCapable of powerful thrusts, but only the tip is strong. Strengthens the [Blaze Charge] special attack.=沐浴日光之矛／一种骑士的长矛，上面有代表太阳光线的标记。\n有强大的击退能力，但只有尖端强大。强化[火焰冲锋]特殊攻击。
Skeleton Warrior's Long Spear=骷髅战士长矛
Skeleton Warrior's Long Spear／A long spear, the weapon of a skeleton warrior.\r\nCapable of powerful thrusts, but only the tip is strong. Equip it to make it easier to perfect guards.=骷髅战士的长矛／长矛，骷髅战士的武器。\n有强大的击退能力，但只有尖端强大。装备它后能更容易完美格挡。
Grim Reaper Great-Scythe=死神大镰刀
Grim Reaper Great-Scythe／A large scythe belonging to the embodiment of death. Difficult to use due to its long blade that gets easily caught on terrain.\r\nWhen hitting a low HP enemy, it exceeds the scythe's base attack to finish them off.=死神大镰刀／属于死亡化身的大镰刀。很难使用，因为它的长刀片很容易被地形卡住。\n当打击一个低血量的敌人时，会基于镰刀的基础攻击力造成斩杀效果。
All attacks\r\nbecome finishers=所有攻击\n成为终结者
Orcish Club=兽人棍棒
Orcish Club／A giant club beloved of orcs. \r\nPounding attacks cause spikes to erupt from the ground.=兽人棍棒／兽人喜爱的大型棍棒。\n下落攻击会让尖刺从地面上爆发出来。
Warhammer of Tremors=震颤战锤
Warhammer of Tremors／A massive, heavy iron warhammer.\r\nWhen equipped, increases the wielder's defense. Pounding attacks cause small tremors.=震颤战锤／一种巨大、沉重的铁制战锤。\n装备后增加持用者的防御。下落攻击会引起轻微的震动。
Mage Staff=法师杖
Mage Staff／A staff once used by a mage as a catalyst for casting spells.\r\nLengthens the duration of enchantments and greatly increases attack power for the duration.=法师杖／曾被法师用作加速施法的杖。\n延长附魔的持续时间，并在持续时间内显著增加攻击强度。
Necromancer Staff=亡灵法师杖
Necromancer Staff／A staff once used by a necromancer as a catalyst for casting spells.\r\nLengthens the duration of enchantments and greatly increases attack power for the duration.=亡灵巫师杖／曾被亡灵巫师用作施法催化剂的杖。\n延长附魔的持续时间，并在持续时间内显著增加攻击强度。
Follow eyeline=视线追踪
Succubus=魅魔
POV=主观
Roper=套索触手

This game is a work of fiction.\r\nAny people, groups, place names or scenarios contained within are entirely fictitious\r\nand have no relation to real or existing things.\r\n\r\nThis game contains material of a sexual and violent nature.\r\nThis game does not justify or endorse any of the acts depicted in this game.\r\nAny attempts to perform any of the crimes depicted in this game will be punishable by law.\r\nDo not attempt to re-enact or recreate any action shown in this game.\r\n\r\n\r\n\r\n=您正在使用RiccaSinicization项目团队的<size%3D75%>官方本地化英文版再译为中文而本质上还是日译中的</size>汉化！！\r\n此游戏中的人、团体、地名、场景等纯属虚构。\r\n含有性和暴力内容刻画！！虽有伪R15模式，但未成年人游玩后果自负。\n当然，现实中任何犯罪者都将被依法处置！<size%3D75%>相信大家有分辨游戏和现实的能力。</size>\r\n随缘更新的公测Github网址：github.com/RiccaSinicization/RICCA-Chinese-file-public-version\r\n<color%3D#7FFF7F>本项目不收取任何费用！不提倡盗版，玩家若想补票，指路→Dlsite购买。</color>\r\n<color%3D#ffdab9>所有使用者均视为已成年且完全同意我方立场。传播、盗用、售卖等侵权行为与我方无关。</color>\n<color%3D#DEB887>致谢：来自五湖四海的无偿贡献者们（含Github项目组、日文源汉化者B站@可爱的黑丸）      \n日版英版存档互通，并不冲突哦！</color>\nGithub公测支持字形：规范汉字（包括简化字和未被简化的传承字）、港澳台通行字体\n而游戏自带异体字形：日文汉字（字形洁癖者可以跑内存替换游戏字库）\n<size%3D125%>鉴于英文版原字符串更长，可供汉化的余地更足，希望能稍微提升剧情体验吧。</size>

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 2 The Kidnapped Maiden?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 2 章  被拐走的少女?
Burning Village=燃烧的村庄
Is there anyone left alive in the village...? Where's Miria...?=村里... 还活着的人... 姐姐在哪呢...
Gheck!? A woman with weird armor came out of the church!=咕嘎！？里面出来了个奇怪装扮的女人！
That's the woman we saw running away earlier... Khehehe... That soft-looking body... No doubt about it! What happened to the guys who went to the church!?=那家伙，是刚刚逃走的女人啊... 嘿嘿嘿... 这柔软的身体，不会错的...！\n去里面调查的那些家伙们哪去了！？
Gheck!? That big sword... Did you kill our men...?=咳嘎！？那个大剑... 难道说我们的同伴已经被打倒了...？
So many goblins...! But in this form... With this power, I can...!=有这么多的哥布林...！？但是，这副姿态的话... 有这个力量的话...！
I'm going to avenge the villagers... You're going to pay for what you did!=叔叔他们的仇... 不可原谅！
Haa... Haa... Wait up...!=哈啊...哈啊...... 等等...！
Ah! Miss Fairy...=啊！妖精小姐...
Haa... Haa... Geez... Where are you going in such a hurry!?=哈啊...哈啊... 真是的... 这么慌张，你是要去哪啊！？
But...there are so many monsters... I have to save the villagers and my sister Miria...!=可是...有这么多魔物... 不快点救村民和姐姐的话...！
Villagers...? Ah, I see... Then I'll follow you. Hold still for a second.=村...？啊啊... 这么回事啊...... 那我也要跟着去。你稍等下。
Phew... Alright, you can move.=呼... 已经可以动了哦。
Huh...? Eep! I can hear a voice from my chest!=哇... 呀啊！胸口里传出了声音！？
I used too much energy, so I'll be inside your body while we travel.=可是给我累坏了。移动的时候我就暂时进入你的身体里了啊...
I-Inside my body...!? Are you... You aren't actually a monster trying to take over my body, are you...? I-Is that why you gave me...=我，我的身体里...！？妖精小姐... 难道是恶魔什么的想要占据我的身体吗... \n所，所以才给我这样的力量...
Of course not! This is just one of my magic powers. Trust me, alright? You know how much I've done for you already. Besides, you want to save humans, right?=才不是啦...！这是魔法的一种。我这么辛苦来找你，你就不能给我点信任嘛。\n而且，你不是还要救人吗？
Y-Yeah... I need to hurry and save the villagers and my sister...=嗯，嗯... 我，要快去把村民和姐姐......
Then I'll begin sensing for life signs and tell you where they are.=那样的话，我来探知生命力的信息告诉你吧。
You can find the people who are still alive...?=能把活着的人... 找到吗...？
Yup. I can detect the magic of monsters, too... I don't sense any living humans in this vicinity.=嗯，也能感知到魔物的魔力... 看来，这附近是没有还活着的人类了呢。
Oh, okay... But if we move to a different spot, we might find someone, right?=这样啊...... 那，去别的地方的话，说不定能找到人...？
I can't say for sure, but if we have a chance to save someone, we better get going.=那种事情我怎么知道啊。但你要救人的话快点比较好哦？
Okay... Let's head to the entrance of the village!=知道了... 我这就往村口的方向走！
While I'm with you, I'll telepathically send you traces of the monsters I detect around us via images.=在我和你一起的这段时间，我可以把周围魔物的气息以图像形式传给你。
Signs...? Oh, you mean the faint things appearing in the bottom-right?=图像...？啊，是右下角模糊出现的东西吗...？
Yes. If you don't want to be caught off-guard by the monsters, you'd better pay attention to it.=嗯，为了不被魔物偷袭还是能看得见更好吧。
A big...dog...!? It's coming this way!=好大的...狗... ...朝这边跑来了！？
That's a hell hound... It's a demonized stray dog. It must've been attracted by the smell of human corpses...=地狱猎犬... 是魔物化的野狗呢... 是被人类的尸臭吸引过来了吧...
Watch out. These things are quick and ferocious. They'll get close to you in no time, even when you're far away from them. They're terrifying monsters with powerful claw attacks, too.=...这些家伙既凶暴速度也很快要小心一点。能在短时间内从远处拉近距离。\n是会用锐利的爪子进行强力攻击的可怕魔物哦！
I-I got it...!=嗯，嗯...！
If they're demonized stray dogs...does that mean they used to live in the mountains?=是变成魔物的野狗吗... 这些孩子们，原来是住在山里的吗...
That so sad... But...if they're monsters...if they're going to get in our way, I have no choice...!=这种事...好可怜啊...... 变成...魔物了呢... 但碍事的话...！
I feel the presence of human life a little farther down from here.=再前面一点能感觉到人类的生命力。
What, really...? Miria...!=欸，真的吗...？姐姐...！
<b>Guard</b>\r\n Keyboard: V Key\r\n Controller: 4 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nTime your guard well and you will take no damage.<line-height%3D100%>=<b>格挡</b>\r\n 键盘：V键/手柄：4按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n 好好把握格挡时间，你就不会受到伤害。<line-height%3D100%>
That person over there... It's the merchant's wife!=在那里的是... 阿姨！
Looks like she's being attacked by monsters.=看起来是被魔物袭击了呢。
I have to save her...!=我得救她...！
Ugh... It hurts...=呜呜... 好疼...
Are you okay, ma'am?=阿姨，您没事吧？
Ow.... I'm okay...=疼疼疼... 没事...
Is... Is that you, Ricca!?=你，你是...... 莉卡酱...！？
Yes, it's me!=是，我是莉卡！
Ricca... Ggh... Th-That sword... Why are you dressed like that...?=莉卡酱... 啊... 这，这个剑... 这副打扮是怎么回事...
Ah... This... It would take too long to explain...=啊... 这个嘛...说来话长了...
I see... Ugh... My husband...=这样啊... 呃唔... 我丈夫...
He... He... The goblins...=叔叔... 叔叔他... 被哥布林们给......
......I see......=......这样啊......
I can sense human life near the entrance to the village.=村子出口的附近，能感觉到人类的生命力哦。
Ma'am, I'm sorry... I have to help the others... Please, find somewhere to hide!=阿姨，对不起了... 我，还要去救其他人... 阿姨您先躲到别的地方去吧...！
Y-Yes, of course... I'll go hide in the outer storeroom...=欸，嗯... 我知道了... 我会去远处的仓咳躲着的...
Oh, that's right... Ricca, your...=啊，对了... 莉卡酱，你的...
I'll be back soon! Please, stay hidden and don't move!=我马上就回来了！在那之前请一直躲好！
Who that's fallen over there...?=倒在那里的是...
Ugh...=呃呜...
Donny! Are you alright!?=多尼，请振作起来！
U-Ugh... Outside the village...=呜，呜呜...... 村子...外面......
Rock...monster... Coming towards...village...=岩石...... 怪...物... 往...村子这边...
Donny...!?=多尼...！？
He fainted...=...晕过去了呢。
I have to get him somewhere safe...=哪里... 转移到安全的地方......
He was saying something about a monster outside of the village. I sense strong magic energy, too... We should check it out.=村外有几个魔物在聊些什么。确实能感觉到强大的魔力... 先去那边看看吧！
Okay... Let's go.=嗯... 我知道了。
Gheck! I thought something was off. Those guys who went to capture the woman haven't reported back... Are you the one who killed my subordinates!?=咕嘿！还想着那几个去抓女人家伙怎么一直没来报告... 杀掉我的部下们的就是你吗！？
That goblin... He's the one who was standing in front of my house and commanding the others...=那个哥布林... 是之前在我家门口命令其他哥布林的那个吧...
Maybe he's the leader of the goblins.=那家伙就是哥布林们的首领吗？
Huh...? That hair, those eyes, that gem on your brooch...! You're the woman Master Archlich was looking for!=呣... 这头发，这眼睛，胸前的宝石...！你就是阿奎雷奇大人要找的女人吗！
Ark-Rich...? Looking for...? What are you talking about...?=阿奎...雷奇...？要找的... 什么东西...？
But never mind that. Where's my sister...?=比起这个，你们把姐姐......
Eeep...! What...!? What's this rumble from the ground...!?=呀... 怎么了...这个...地震...！？
Hmph! You finally came back! My wonderful familiar, gifted by Master Archlich himself!=呼，终于来了吗！阿奎雷奇大人派来的使魔啊！

It's a golem... A rock monster brought to life by magic...=这家伙是傀儡呢... 是被用魔法注入命令后的岩石怪物...
Golem! We've been told to capture her alive! Kehehehe! When you catch her, use your giant arms to break her joints so she can't escape!=傀儡啊，我命令你把这家伙活抓起来！咳嘎嘎嘎，为了不让她逃跑，你就用你的大手，\n把这女人的关节捏碎吧！
Huh...? Break my joints... N-No, you can't...=欸... 捏碎关节...... 这，这种事情...
Hmph, he's all bark no bite. You don't need to fret over what he says!=呼，只是放狠话而已啊。你没必要把这些家伙说的话当真！
Khehehehe! So strong-willed, for a pipsqueak... A fairy, huh? Golem! Crush her like a fly!=咳嘎嘎嘎嘎，气势不错的小女人... 是妖精吗！喂，傀儡，把那家伙像蚊子一样拍死就行！
Blockheads like you...don't stand a chance against the holy knight of God!=就你们这群乌合之众做的木偶娃娃... 也想打败作为神的下仆的圣骑士吗！
Ghehehe! I like feisty women like you...but your puny body wouldn't make a satisfying toy! You wouldn't even fill me up for breakfast!=咕嘎嘎嘎！虽然我很喜欢你这种强势的女人... 但你这么大点的身体别说安慰了，\n连当早饭都不够啊...
Hey, golem! Go catch the bigger woman and take her to our hideout! Even if she's not the woman Master Archlich wants, we can definitely use her body!=喂，傀儡！把那个大个的女人抓回据点去！不管她是不是阿奎雷奇大人找的女人，\n这个身体我们都能用得上！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Use my body...? D-Does he mean he's going to pin me down and rape me again like I was in the church...? Soil me...and hurt me...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>用得上...？这，这指的是像教会那时候那样，靠近我侵犯我... 弄脏我... 弄疼我...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>N-No, don't... Don't think about that right now...! I have to save the village and find Miria!)=(<indent%3D0.4em>不，不要，那种事情...现在不能去回想...！不赶快救村子，找姐姐的话可不行)
Ghehehe! I gotta report this to Master Archlich... See ya, little gnat!=咕嘿嘿！要去给阿奎雷奇大人报告了啊... 再见了，小臭虫！
Wha... Wh-Who are you calling a gnat!? Ugh... You think I'm just going to take that!? I'll show you...!=欸... 臭，臭虫是在叫我！？咳... 亏我还忍着听下去... 我，不会原谅你了！
Ah... Where are you going!? Where's my sister...!?=啊... 要去哪！？我的姐姐在哪啊...
Don't get distracted! Watch out!=别看多余的东西了！要来了！
Upon grapple defeat by Stone Golem\r\n"The joint-crushing golem" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=被石傀儡捏晕\n“粉碎关节石傀儡”\nH场景（已经看过)
Upon grapple defeat by Stone Golem\r\n"??????????" \r\nH scene=被石傀儡捏晕\r\n"??????????" \r\nH场景
A big...rock monster...!?=好大的...岩石魔物...！？
Golems are puppets made from rocks and stones by wizards. So why does a goblin have control over it...?=傀儡，是魔法师用石头或岩石做出来的人偶哦。不过，为什么哥布林会...？

Ugh... I've been slashing at it over and over, and it still won't fall!=呃... 我不停地砍它，它还是不倒下！
It is a rock monster, after all... That crystal on its chest is the source of the magic manipulating it.=毕竟这是一个岩石魔物... 它胸前的水晶是操纵它的魔法之源。

The lady from the dining hall... Miria told me about how chatty she was...=食堂的阿姨...... 姐姐说过她总是高谈阔论的...
Ugh... The face is... These clothes... It's the mayor...=呜...... 脸被... 这衣服...村长...
When I was little...he taught me so many things...at church...=我小时候...在教堂... 跟他学了好多东西......
Ngh... It's the blacksmith...and his wife...=啊... 铁匠铺的叔叔和...阿姨......
They were looking forward...to selling their swords...and using the money to visit Olivia at the capital...=用作为商品的剑...和阿姨一起被... 之前，明明马上就要去王都见奥莉薇娅酱，\n很期待的样子...
The kids...from the family across from my place... Aagh... The old ladies... No... I can't believe...=对门的...啊...孩子们...... 啊啊啊...阿姨们也...怎么会...不要...
They were so fun and full of energy every day... I used to play with them all the time... This is...awful... Why...? Why did this... Ugh... *Sob*... Waaaaaah...=每天，都那么活泼... 经常还在一起玩的... 好过...分... 为什么... 会这样...... 呜... 噫咕... \n啊啊啊啊啊......
Are you done looking through the corpses? Did you find the person you were looking for? Your sister, right? Was she there?=安葬尸体已经结束了吗？找到的这些人里... 像你姐姐那样的人... 没有找到哦？
Huh...? Miss Fairy...=欸... 妖精小姐...
I went around the village again, but other than the two we found earlier, I didn't find any humans alive.=我又一次，在村子里找了一圈，除了那两个人以外，没有其他还活着的人类了哦。
I couldn't...find Miria... Where did she...?=姐姐... 哪里都没有... 到底去哪了...
Maybe she was out of the village when the goblins attacked, just like me... Yeah, that has to be it...=难道说，像我一样早早出村了吗... 是啊... 肯定是这样吧...
U-Um... Ricca...?=那，那个... 莉卡酱...？
Oh... Ma'am...=啊... 阿姨......
You're hurt... Are you okay?=您的伤... 已经没事了吗...？
Yes... It isn't too bad. Don't worry.=欸欸... 不是什么大问题。没事的啦...
Looks like all the monsters are gone from the village.=...看起来村子里已经没有魔物了。
Donny... Should you even be moving...?=多尼... ...已经可以活动了吗...？
Hahaha... Well, I don't think I have a choice. I'm fine.=哈哈哈... 这点程度的话... 没事啦...
...and then the next thing I knew, I was enveloped in white light at the church, and I transformed into this form...=然后... 在教堂，被白色的光芒包裹后就这个样子......
I can't believe it... It's just like a fairy tale...=简直就像传说那样难以置信啊，不过...
But I guess I have to believe you after seeing that fairy...=看到这个妖精，也不得不相信了啊...
I saw them... I saw the goblins take away a girl with chestnut-colored hair from the direction of the church...=我，看到了哦...... 在教堂那边被哥布林它们强行带走的栗色头发的那孩子...
Wha...!? Ma'am, is that true!?=啊...！？阿姨，您说的，是真的吗！？
Y-Yes... Those clothes... That hair... It had to be Miria...!=欸，是啊... 那衣服... 那发色... 肯定是蜜莉雅酱没错啊...！
That's right... Miria said she was going to clean the church in the afternoon... B-But what would the goblins want from her...?=说起来... 姐姐下午要打扫教堂来着... 但，但是，为什么姐姐要被哥布林...
I'm sorry... I wasn't sure about it at the time, and I was too shocked to bring it up until now...=对不起了呢... 我也不是很确定，想给你打打气所以就说出来了......
That goblin leader was trying to capture you, too. I don't know what their taste in girls is...but if your sister's a young woman, it wouldn't be strange of them to kidnap her.=那个哥布林的首领，不是也要抓你吗。虽然我不知道它们的喜好啦，嘛... \n你姐姐也是年轻的女性所以倒也不奇怪就是了。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Young woman... Are they going to assault Miria...just like they assaulted me in the church...? No...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>年轻的女性... 也就是说也会像我在教堂被哥布林们做的那样... \n姐姐也会被做那么过分的事情...？怎么这样......)
Ricca... Please... Please save Miria from the goblins...!=莉卡酱...... 拜托你... 去救蜜莉雅酱吧...！
I think you should go looking for her too. You defeated that rock monster by the village entrance, right? If you were able to take him on, I'm sure you can save Miria.=...啊啊，说的是啊。你刚刚在外面打倒了那个岩石怪物吧？有那么强的话，\n一定能救的了蜜莉雅哦。
Those goblins came from the foot of the mountain. They must be the same group that attacked the settlement there, too. You might be able to get some information from the settlers.=那些哥布林是从山麓角落那边来的。和不久前袭击山麓集落的哥布林应该是同一伙... \n去找集落的人肯定能打听到情报吧。
The settlement...at the foot of the mountain... O-Okay...=山麓的...集落...... 我...知道了...
Um... Are you two going to stay in the village...? There might still be monsters around here...=那个... 你们两人就还留在村里吗...？说不定还有魔物在附近呢...
...I think I saw some people flee into the mountains, so we're going to look for them and join them.=...我之前，看见有些人往山里逃去了我也打算加入他们去。
I'm not as strong as you...but I can take on a goblin or two by myself.=我虽然没莉卡酱那么厉害... 但一两匹哥布林的话还是能应对的。
Go on, Ricca... Find Miria and save her.=撒，莉卡酱... 快去救蜜莉雅酱去吧。
But... I can't leave you two alone... And what'll happen to the village and the bodies of the people who died...?=可是...... 就靠你们两人... 而且村子和那些死掉的人们就这么放着不管了吗...
Ricca, listen to what your elders tell you. The good little Ricca I know always listens to grown ups.=莉卡酱，大人说的话你就老实听着。你可不像平时的莉卡酱了哦？
I'm sorry... I'm... I'm going to go look for Miria... *Sniff* I'm sorry...=对不起...... 我...去救姐姐去了... 咕嘶... 对不起...
It's okay, Ricca. Miria's your precious sister, isn't she?=...没事的啦，莉卡酱。蜜莉雅酱是你最喜欢的姐姐对吧？
I know how often she prayed at church. God must have transformed you into that form so you could save her.=蜜莉雅小姐经常在教堂里献上祈祷的。\n肯定是神明大人为了救蜜莉雅小姐所以才赐予你这副样子的。
Yes, ma'am...=是哦...
(<indent%3D0.4em>A note and the keys to the house... I'll leave these here in case Miria and I just missed each other and she comes home later...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>纸条和家里的钥匙... 万一... 迷路了的姐姐回来的话，也能找到这里的吧...)
Chapter 2    The Kidnapped Maiden=第 2 章  被拐走的少女
Its movements are slow...but be careful. It's far more durable than other monsters you've fought. Even as a holy knight, you'll suffer a lot of damage if its large arms destroy your armor.=虽然它的动作很慢...但要小心点。它的耐久力跟别的魔物完全不一样。\n而且，如果被那个大手的攻击打碎铠甲的话，就算是圣骑士也会受到很大的伤害。
Okay... I got it!=嗯...... 我知道了...！
It's rolling this way!? It's fast! You're going to get run over!=变成球滚动着！？好快，要被碾到了！
Calm down and cool your head. Watch its moves closely!=冷静点... 冷静下来。仔细观察它的动作！
R-Right... If I let this monster in the village, it's going to wreck everyone's homes!=嗯，嗯... 这种东西进了村里的话大家的房子都会变得破破烂烂的呢！
.........=.........
Eeeeek! That hurts... Let me go!=呀啊啊啊！好难受...放开！

Oww...! At this rate...my joints are really going to get crushed...! Noooo!=好疼... 真的要...捏碎关节了... 不要啊！

Oof... The goblin wearing armor told the golem to break my joints so I don't escape... He was trying to follow his orders, but he couldn't crush me with his hands... Can it be he intends to break me from the inside...?=呜呜... 说不定真的会像穿着铠甲的哥布林说的那样，会遵从命令， \n防止我逃走而捏碎我的关节... 既然捏不坏的话，就从身体内部......
No! D-Don't! You'll kill me! You'll kill me if you do that! Please! I won't struggle anymore... I'll obey, so please, I'm begging you... Stoooop!=不要，不，不要... 那样会死的，会死人的啊！求你了，我不会乱动的... 我会老实的所以...  \n原谅我吧... 不要啊！

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 3 Red Stone?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 3 章  红色石头？
Mountain Valley Trail=山谷小径
A monster...! But they usually don't come out in daylight...!=魔物...！怎么大白天就有这么多......
I feel an evil presence from this direction... Maybe the goblin leader who escaped sent them this way.=在这前面能感觉到邪恶的波动... 是逃走的哥布林首领叫出来的吧？
That direction is the same as the path that leads to the foot of the mountain. Maybe those goblins did attack the settlement there too...=这前面是通往山麓的道路，果然这些哥布林和之前袭击集落的哥布林是同一拨...
If we go to where there are more monsters, we might be able to catch up to the goblins who attacked your village.=朝着魔物多的地方前进的话，应该能追击到袭击你村子的哥布林们。
I want to save Miria as soon as possible, but there are still people in the village... I better defeat as many monsters as I can along the way.=虽然想赶紧去救姐姐但阿姨她们还在村里呢... 尽量多打倒些魔物吧...
Huh...? Polon...!?=欸... 泼隆...！？

*Whine*...=咕ー......

Woof... Woof...!=汪... 汪...！
Woof... Grrrr...!=汪... 呜噜噜噜噜...！
U-Um... Miss Fairy... Thank you.=那，那个... 妖精小姐... 谢谢你。
For what?=谢我什么？
You know... For saving me from the goblins...and helping me look for my sister...=那个... 在我被哥布林袭击的时候救了我... 还帮我找姐姐...
The goblins...? My head was fuzzy when I gave you your powers, so I don't remember it well...=被哥布林...？在传授你力量的时候我的意识很朦胧的，不太记得了...
But God sent me to deliver the brooch to the holy knight and help her carry out her duty. I'm just fulfilling my mission.=我是收到神明大人的命令把胸针送到被选为圣骑士的人的手里的，只是为了达成使命才帮助你而已哦。
I see... That reminds me, I have something I wanted to ask you...=这样啊... 我，还想再问问妖精小姐...
What is this transformation...? And what do you mean, "duty"...? I look like a knight out of a fairy tale...=这个样子到底是... 而是使命是... 这个样子，简直像是故事里提到的传说的骑士大人一样...
That's exactly what you are.=就是这样哦。
I said this to you at the church, but you were chosen by God to become the legendary holy knight to defeat monsters and save this world.=在教堂的时候也说过了，你是为了打倒魔物拯救世界，被神明大人选中并授予力量的传说的骑士哦。
Wha...? Huh...!? Are you serious...? No, you have to be joking...=哈...？欸欸...！？真的吗...？...开玩笑的吧？
I don't like joking around.=我，讨厌玩笑哦？
S-Sorry... But... Why me...?=对，对不起... 可是，为什么是我...？
I'm just a normal village girl! I've never even touched a big sword like this before!=我，就只是农家的村里的女孩子哦！？这样的大剑，以前完全没摸过哦...！？
Don't ask me. I don't know either.=...撒？我也不知道啊。
But you look exactly like what God described, and you did receive his powers and became a knight, so there should be no problem.=嘛，我看你就和神明大人描述的特征一样，而且实际上你也能收到骑士的力量所以肯定没错啦。
Yup.=是啊。
But me...? I'm supposed to fight monsters and save people...? I can't...=把我当成那样的... 和魔物战斗拯救人类的... 那样的角色...
True, you do look like any other human girl...but if God chose you, things should go just fine.=虽然你看起来确实只是个人类女孩而已... 但被神明大人选中后一定会逐渐熟练起来的啦。
<b>Beware of chasms!</b>\r\n If you fall into any of the various holes scattering the land,\r\n your HP will be reduced to 0.\r\n Be sure to jump over them.=<b>当心裂缝！</b>\r\n 如果你掉进遍布在地面的裂缝，\n 你的HP将减少到零。\n 一定要跳过它们。
God chose me...? Why me...?=被神明大人选中... 为什么，是我...？
Eep! A giant caterpillar!? Ugh, it's squirming...=呀，好大的毛毛虫！？呜哇，扭来扭去的...
It's a hell beetle. They're insects that've turned into monsters. Their larvae spit out threads, and the fully grown ones attack from the air, so be careful.=地狱甲虫，是魔物化的昆虫哦。幼虫会吐出丝线，成虫会从空中突进下来，要注意哦。
O-Okay, I'll watch out... You said they turned into monsters, right? So these bugs used to be normal caterpillars like the kind I see in the mountains...=嗯，嗯... 我知道啦... 魔物化也就是说... 这些孩子们，也就是平常在山里能看到的毛毛虫吧...

Upon defeat\r\n"Kidnapped by highwaymen" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=战败后\n“被强盗绑架”\nH场景（已经看过)
Upon defeat\r\n"??????????" \r\nH scene=战败后\r\n"??????????" \r\nH场景

All the plants have withered... The atmosphere is so eerie... This place wasn't like this the last time I came this way...=植物都枯萎了... 这反常的气氛... 之前来这边的时候可不是这样的啊...
A big red gem...! It looks like a Magic Stone, but...=好大的红色石头...！？虽然有点像魔法石...
It's shiny and pretty, but something feels off about it... I didn't see anything like this when I passed by this place a while ago...=这个光，虽然漂亮但让人不舒服... 而且之前来这边的时候从来没有这样的东西啊...
That's a Drain Crystal. It's a magic tool that accumulates and transfers magic energy. I suspected there was one nearby...=这是导能水晶。是用来收集并转移魔力的魔法道具。果然和我想的一样这附近有这东西呢...
This crystal is absorbing the magic of this land and transferring it somewhere else. On top of that, it's transforming some of the magic into a wave of evil energy that attracts and empowers monsters.=这个水晶，会吸取大地的魔力并把它转移到别的地方。除此之外，收集到的魔力的一部分\n还会转换为邪恶的波动，拥有着召唤魔物并提高它们活性的机能。
So that's why the monsters have been restless lately... And the plants around here are withered because the crystal took their energy...=也就是说，最近，魔物变的活跃的原因... 而且，这周围的植物枯萎的原因也是...
Exactly; this is the root cause. If we don't get rid of this, the whole mountain will become withered and overrun by monsters.=就是这个水晶的原因吧。放着不管的话这周围会全部变成枯山，魔物也会变得非常多吧。
No... That's awful... Who would put this here...?=怎么这样... 好残忍... 是谁把这种东西...
It's probably the work of Archlich. I'm sure the absorbed magic is sent to him, too.=应该是，阿奎雷奇干的吧。聚集并传输魔力就像是那家伙能干出来的事呢。
Ark-Rich...? The goblins said something about him, too...=阿奎...雷奇...？刚才的哥布林们也提到过... 他是...
I'll explain more later. Let's just break the Drain Crystal first. Then the monsters will gradually disappear and the mountain will return to its original state.=过会再告诉你。总之现在先把导能水晶破坏掉比较好。这样的话，之后魔物应该会减少，\n植物也会恢复哦。
Okay, I got it.=...嗯，我明白了。
There might be more Drain Crystals along the way. Let's break any that we come across.=导能水晶在别的地方应该也会有的。下次再见到，直接扬了就行。
Crystals that attract monsters... Who would do such a thing...?=能召唤出魔物的导能水晶... 这种东西，是谁放到这的...？
This is the work of Archlich, the wicked necromancer.=阿奎雷奇，是这邪恶的死灵术士干的好事。
Archlich...?=阿奎雷奇...？
He's an evil wizard who once manipulated monsters to ravage the world. The legendary holy knight was the one who defeated him.=那家伙是操纵魔物，在世界上到处搞事的魔法师。曾经退治了那个魔法师的\n就是传说的圣骑士了。
I think I remember a fairy tale about that... But that wizard was defeated, right? So why...?=说起来故事里好像也这么说过来着... 但是，那个魔法师不是被骑士大人给打倒了吗？
It seems that he has resurrected. Necromancy is magic that came from researching ways to obtain immortality, so he must have used that power.=看来是复活了呢。死灵术本身就是研究不老不死的方法而诞生的东西，\n就是用了这种力量吧。
God needed someone to defeat the evil wizard, and chose to bestow you with the power, and the duty.=所以，为了打倒那个死灵术士...那个邪恶的魔法师，\n从神明大人那里接受力量和使命的人就是你哦。
God...chose me...? Why...?=神明大人... 为什么...选我...？
Like I said, I don't know either. But you want to defeat monsters and save mankind, right?=...刚刚也说过了，这种事我也不知道啊。不过，你也是想打败魔物拯救人类的吧？
(<indent%3D0.4em>Save mankind...? Right, I'm going to save everyone... Including Miria...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>拯救人类...？是啊，我...要救大家... 要救姐姐啊...)
What's wrong? Let's get going.=...怎么了，赶紧前进吧？
Um... Uh... Miss Fairy... What's your name...? I-If I may ask...=欸多... 那个... 妖精小姐... 妖精小姐叫啥名... 怎，怎么称呼呢...？
Name...? Well, God gave me the name "Iris" when I became his servant...=名字...？在成为神明大人下仆的时候，我被赋予了伊莉丝（希腊语，意为彩虹）这个名字...
You don't have to be uptight around me. I don't want to see you get all awkward.=你直接问我不就行了... 扭扭捏捏的好难受啊。
Th-Thank you very... I mean, okay. Then I'll be calling you Iris from now on. Teehee...=这，这样啊...是这样啊。那，从今往后我就叫你伊莉丝了呢。欸嘿嘿...
Hmph... Whatever...=哼... 嘛，倒是也行...
Heehee, you can call me Ricca, too...=欸嘿嘿，那，从今往后也叫我莉卡...
Huh...? Miss Fairy...? Iris...?=啊嘞...？妖精小姐...... 伊莉丝...？
I can sense waves of evil from that direction. It must be a Drain Crystal.=...那个方向能感觉到邪恶的波动哦。这个感觉，恐怕是导能水晶呢。
I think that's where the valley is... That's the shortest path to the foot of the mountain.=那边我记得是山谷吧... 是去山麓最近的路呢。
So the goblins who kidnapped Miria are the same as the ones who attacked the settlement... Let's hurry!=果然带走姐姐的那些哥布林，和袭击过山麓集落的魔物是同一拨呢... 快走吧...！
Chapter 3    Red Stone=第 3 章  红色石头
The bridge is broken... That's too bad. Crossing this valley was the closest path to the foot of the mountain.=桥坏掉了呢... 要去山麓的话穿过这个山谷是最近的呢...
It's a little too high to get over... It'll take us a bit more time, but let's find a path where the terrain is lower.=这个高度，要跳上去的话有点太高了呢... 还是绕道找个稍微低点的地方吧。
Hold on. You have the power to climb this cliff now.=...等等。现在的你的话其实是上的去这种山崖的哦。
What do you mean?=怎么回事呢？
You got a lot of Magic Stones from defeating the golem and destroying the Drain Crystal, right? You can use them here.=打倒傀儡的时候以及破坏导能水晶的时候，你不是收集到了很多魔法石嘛。就用那个吧。
Magic Stones...? What am I supposed to do with those things...? If I don't hurry, the goblins might hurt Miria...=魔法石... 那种东西要怎么用...？不赶紧前进的话哥布林们要把姐姐...
Just listen to what I have to say. It'll help us get to her faster.=可以不用绕道哦？我现在给你说明，你先给我老实听着。
Alright... I'll listen.=嗯... 知道啦...
First, put your hand on the ornament on your chest... The red stone shaped like the sun on your brooch.=首先，你胸口的首饰... 你把手放在这个太阳形胸针上的红色石头上。
Like this?=是这样吗？
Exactly. Now don't move.=嗯。保持这样别动哦。
Hah!=哈啊！
Make sure to obtain or power up skills before proceeding.\r\nYou can gain skills via Skill Strengthening at Stage Select.=选择关卡时，记得强化已经获得的技能。\n你可以通过选关界面的“技能加强”学习新技能。

——————————————————【3D】第三话-被强盗绑架开始————————————————————

<b>Mana Crystal</b>\r\n Collecting a blue crystal will recover\r\n MP which is used for special attacks.=<b>魔力结晶</b>\r\n 收集蓝色水晶将回复MP，\r\n 特殊攻击消耗MP。
<b>Continue Crystal</b>\r\n If you possess a yellow crystal\r\n then when your HP reaches 0,\r\n you can restart from where you picked it up.=<b>继续水晶</b>\r\n 如果你拥有黄色水晶\r\n 当你的HP达到0时，\r\n 您可以从拾取它的位置重新开始。
<b>Chests</b>\r\n Pressing the attack button while standing in\r\n front of a chest will allow you to open it.\r\n Chests contain Magic Stones and items\r\n used to strengthen Ricca.=<b>箱子</b>\r\n 站立在它前面\r\n 按攻击按钮打开。\r\n 箱子含有魔法石和物品\r\n 用于加强莉卡。

Yes, when you throw your magic sword, it can lodge into a vertical cliff and act as a foothold.=嗯，投掷出的魔法剑，可以刺入附近垂直的墙体当跳台使用。
Be careful with how much you use it, though. You can also throw it to attack faraway enemies, but it's not very powerful, and it consumes magic every time you use it.=掷剑虽然也能用来打倒远处的敌人，但是威力并不高，使用的时候会消耗魔力的，要注意点哦。
Oh...? This feeling...=啊啦... 这个感觉是...
Talk=讲话
<b>Special attack「Sword Throw」</b>\r\n Keyboard:C Key\r\n Controller:2 Button<line-height%3D150%>\r\nThrown magic swords will stick into cliffs or walls.<line-height%3D100%>\r\nYou can use stuck swords as  platforms.<line-height%3D150%>\r\nUsing special attacks will drain the blue gauge in the top left of the screen.=<b>特殊攻击「掷剑」</b>\r\n 键盘：C键/控制器：2按钮<line-height%3D150%>\r\n 投掷的魔法剑会嵌入悬崖或墙壁。<line-height%3D100%>\r\n 用卡住的剑作为平台。<line-height%3D150%>使用特殊攻击将消耗屏幕左上角的蓝色MP。
There's a human under the ruins of that bridge.=那边的断桥，有人类在哦...
He's dressed just like Donny... Um, excuse me, mister soldier. Are you alright...?=他穿着很像多尼... 嗯，那个，士兵先生。你还好吗...？

Male Soldier=男士兵
Um... I'm from the village west of here... I'm on my way to the settlement at the foot of the mountain...=那个... 我是在这西边的村子的村民来着... 现在在去山麓集落的路上...
The village west of here...? Then you know that young guy, Donny, right? He was sent from the royal capital... Is he... Is your village safe...?=西边村子...？那样的话那个年轻人，从王都派遣过去的多尼你认识吗？\n那家伙...村子没事吧...？
Donny was injured a little, but he's safe. But the village was ravaged by monsters...=多尼的话虽然受了点伤但是没什么事。但是村子完全被魔物毁坏了...
I see... So those monsters attacked your village...=这样啊... 果然魔物们把村子...
Mister, you know about the monsters...?=士兵，袭击我村子的那些魔物，您知道吗...？
I do... I was on my way to your village with a message for Donny, but a horde of monsters came from the direction I was heading...=是啊... 为了和多尼联络我才要去村子，但村子的方向却有一大群魔物...
I knew I didn't stand a chance fighting against them alone, so I was hiding here until it was safe... Before I knew it, it was the dead of night.=是我一个人，完全应付不了的敌人数量... 所以我就在这里躲着想等个夜里的时机...
I see... Um... D-Did you see anyone captured by the monsters?=这样啊... 那个... 魔，魔物们是不是还抓了个人啊？
No, I didn't... I was too focused on hiding from the monsters, I didn't notice any women...=啊这... 我躲魔物就很费劲了啦... 抓没抓女人什么的...
A-Actually... I think I heard a woman's scream faintly among the voices of the goblins.=说... 说起来我好像听到哥布林的声音里，还夹杂着微弱的女性悲鸣来着......
Scream!? Mister, do you know where she... Do you know which direction those monsters went!?=悲鸣！？士兵... 那个女人... 那些魔物往哪个方向走了您知道吗！？
They were going down the mountain in that direction... Are you looking for that woman...?=往这前面下山的方向走了... 难道说，你要去找那个人吗...？
I am... That woman was probably my sister...=是的... 那大概是我的家人...
Is that so... But a girl like you shouldn't be out here alone...=这样啊... 但是，女孩子一个人去那种地方什么的...
Um... I-I'll be fine... I defeated all the monsters left in my village, too.=那个... 我，我的话没事的... 村里剩下的魔物全是我扬了的...
You don't say? I can't tell from your appearance, but you must be very strong...=那还真是人不可貌相啊...
I'm sorry. I'm certain I heard a scream... If only I was strong like you, I could have saved her...=对不起，虽然我当时听到了悲鸣... 如果我有你这么强的话就能伸出援手了...
No, it's not your fault...=不... 这不是士兵的错...
I'm so sorry... *Sniff* Damn it... Why couldn't I... I couldn't move my feet, and... Urk...=对不起... 呜呜，可恶... 我为什么在那个时候⋯，脚都站不稳... 呜呜......
What a pathetic man. You're wasting your time talking to this human. Let's move on.=没出息的男人... 和这人说话也是浪费时间，赶紧前进吧。
Huh? I heard a voice coming from my body... Oh, it's Iris... Okay, we can go, but...=欸，体内的声音... 啊... 是伊莉丝啊... 嗯，我知道了啦...
Uh... Um, mister, I have something I want to ask of you...=那... 那个，我有事要拜托士兵您...
Could you go to my village? I defeated the monsters on my way here, so there shouldn't be any left...=我刚从村子那边来这哦？一路上的魔物我应该都给消灭了...
I think the village is safe now, but Donny was hurt, and there might be a few monsters around the village...=我寻思应该已经安全了... 多尼还受着伤，说不定村子周围还会有魔物在...
I want you to help the people there...!=我想请士兵，救救我村子里的人们...！
Can you...do that for me...?=那个... 不行吗...？
Alright, I'll go to your village... I was on my way there to contact Donny, anyway. I might as well fulfill my duty...=明白了，我会去村子的... 本来我也是来和多尼联络的来着... 这是我分内之事...
Thank you so much... Please be careful!=太谢谢您了... 请万分小心！
The plants here are withered, too? But slimes were the only monsters I saw in this area before...=这边的植物也枯萎了... 在有这些魔物之前这边可是连个史莱姆都没有呢...
I sense a Drain Crystal ahead of us. Let's find it and destroy it.=在这前面能感觉到导能水晶的波动。找出来破坏掉它吧。
Be careful when you're close to walls or when you're in narrow places like between pillars. Sometimes your sword will get stuck.=墙壁的附近和柱子周围空间很狭小，剑有可能会被挡的，注意点啊。
I think this weapon is too big for me. It's kinda hard to wield... I wish God had given me a smaller, cuter weapon...=这个剑，感觉对我来说还是太大了挥着不方便啊... 神明大人也是，给个小点的可爱点的武器就好了...
That might be enough for defeating slimes and goblins, but you'll need a sword this large to fight against big, strong monsters like golems.=史莱姆哥布林这种程度的先不论，为了和傀儡那种大的强韧的魔物战斗，这样的大剑是必要的哦。
You want to make a wound you can use to transfer holy power into them with your blade. If you attack the inside of the body directly like that, you can destroy any monster.=斩击能造成大伤口并能从刀身注入神圣的力量。能直接攻击到体内，不管是什么魔物都能消灭哦。
Huh... That's pretty...brutal...=呼ー... 总感觉，有点野蛮呢......
Um... Iris... Why do you think the goblins kidnapped my sister?=那个... 伊莉丝... 为什么哥布林它们要抓姐姐呢？

We both have the same hair and eye color, but she braids her hair in the back... And she ties it with the same kind of ribbon as me - the blue one Polon picked up earlier.=眼睛的颜色和我一样，头发也一样，只是背后梳着三辫子... 就用这个泼隆捡到的蓝缎带绑着。
Do you two have similar faces and figures?=...外貌和身材也和你相似吗？
I guess you could say so... But Miria is taller and bustier. The men around her are always staring at her breasts...=说像倒也算是像吧... 但是，姐姐比我长得更高气质也更好哦。男人们总是一直盯着姐姐的胸部看...
Does she wear any accessories?=身上有什么首饰之类的东西么？

If you break Drain Crystals like this, it should reduce the number of monsters, too.=像这样，把导能水晶破坏掉的话，魔物的数量应该也会逐渐减少的哦。

I lifted the transformation.=是我让你变回来的哦。
Ngh... Haa... Why...?=唔... 哈啊... 为什么...
You know you've been running around and fighting in your holy knight form since we lift the village, right?=你啊，在从村里出来到现在一直在用圣骑士的样子战斗和奔跑着吧？
Haa... Haa... I know... So what...?=哈啊...哈啊... 是...这样没错...
This magic item I gave you... The holy knight's brooch uses the wearer's magic to draw out holy power from the earth and sky.=我给你的这个魔导具... 圣骑士的胸针会消耗使用者的魔力，从大地和大气中\n提取出神圣之力。
In other words, this brooch is the source of the holy power used to defeat demons. It's a very precious item, so handle it with care, okay?=也就是说这个胸针是打倒魔物所必须的神圣之力的源头。是非常贵重的东西... \n让你搁这可劲造呢？
O-Okay... Huff... Haa... So... What then...?=呜，呜... 这... 哈啊... ...所以...呢...？
The brooch uses the magic within you to fuel holy knight powers. To put it another way, every time you wield the holy knight's power, it chips away at your own magic.=胸针是以你自身的魔力为燃料产生圣骑士的力量的。反过来说你只要用了圣骑士的力量，\n就会消耗你的魔力。
When you run out of magic energy, you lose your holy knight abilities. I don't expect that you will exhaust your magic, as long as you don't use it recklessly or over a long period of time.=魔力消耗殆尽的话就不能维持圣骑士的能力了。嘛，如果不是你这样长时间\n高强度的运动的话，也不会消耗成那样就是了...
Okay... I see... Thanks...for telling me that...=好的... 我明白了... 谢谢你... 告诉我...
You seem to have as much magic as any regular human... It's clear to me that you're running low on both magic and stamina from your unsteady feet.=你的魔力量和普通的人类没什么不同... 现在你的魔力和体力都耗尽了，\n没见你都轻飘飘的了吗。
That's why you should rest in your normal form and restore your magic.=所以你先变回原样休息会，回复些魔力更好哦。
But... I have to get to my sister...=但是... 不快去救姐姐......
Do you really want to barge into a horde of monsters in that form? We don't even know what kinds of monsters are waiting for us ahead.=就你现在的样子去冲进怪物堆里？你知道在这前面还有什么样的魔物等着你吗？
But... The goblins took my sister... They could be doing awful things to her as we speak...!=可是...姐姐被抓走了... 说不定要被哥布林它们做很过分的事情了...！
I understand that you're worried, but if they're intending to rape her, she probably won't be killed. Besides...=我晓得你担心，但它们要是以凌辱为目的的话，也不会马上就杀死吧。而且...
R-Rape...!? My sister...!? No, I can't let that happen...!=凌，凌辱什么的... 要这么对姐姐... 绝对不行啊...！
Let me finish! I think those goblins kidnapped your sister for a different purpose.=听人把话说完啊。我是觉得那群哥布林抓你姐姐，应该是有其他的目的。
Think about it. They even brought a golem to attack the village. If they just wanted to kidnap a random human, it would have been easier to ambush one on the road.=你看它们袭击个村子甚至都搬出傀儡来了吧？如果只是抓人类的话，还不如\n在街上埋伏着效率高呢。
Then why did they take away Miria...? My sister is... She's good at cooking and is a bit of a worrywart, but she's just a normal girl...=那，为什么姐姐会被抓走呢...？我的姐姐她... 就只是个擅长做饭的爱操心的\n普通姐姐而已哦...？
Your sister's a real beauty, right? Maybe they're going to give her to Archlich as a gift...=你的姐姐，不是很漂亮吗？说不定是被作为献给阿奎雷奇的东西了呢...
Whatever the reason, you need to rest now so you have the energy to catch up to them and find out.=嘛，就算是为了追到它们得知理由，现在的休息也是必要的。
Miria...=姐姐......
Okay... I'll rest a little...=我明白了... 稍微，歇会吧...
Good. You really need the break.=嗯。那么，就休息会吧。
Well then... Heehee... If that's settled, we'd better prepare.=接下来... 呼呼呼... 既然决定了，那就该做休息的准备了哦。
First, go collect some branches we can use for firewood. By the time you're done with that, you should have recovered some magic. Then transform again, beat a slime and hell beetle, and bring them over here.=首先是收集些看起来能点着的树枝。找到之后，应该就稍微回复了些魔力了，到时候\n你再变身打倒些史莱姆和地狱甲虫并且搬过来吧。

Oh, but don't use your sword. The holy powers will immediately turn the corpse into Magic Stones, so punch them and knock them out instead. Hehe... Once you're done with all that, you can go to sleep.=啊啊，如果用剑砍死的话会因为神圣之力的关系，尸体会很快变成魔法石的\n所以你把它们打昏就行了哦。\n......唔呼呼，那个也做完的话，就去稍微睡会吧。

When you transform into a different outfit for the first time, you'll have to consume a lot of magic to make the outfit from scratch. Just like strengthening your abilities, you'll need to collect a lot of Magic Stones to do this.=...在第一次变身成其他衣装的时候，衣服从零开始构成需要消耗大量的魔力。\n和强化能力一样需要很多魔法石才行哦。

When you're traveling a long distance or dealing with a fast monster, you might want to change into your lightweight form.=在长距离移动以及对付速度快的魔物的场合时，说不定换成更轻的衣装要更好呢。

<b>Continues</b>\r\n Upon using a continue, you'll lose some of your Magic Stones\r\n and the state of any skills obtained through holy knight memories\r\n will be reset to how they were before passing through the last checkpoint.=<b>继续</b>\r\n 使用检查点继续时，你会失去一些魔法石\r\n 通过圣骑士记忆获得的技能\r\n 将被重置为最后一个检查点时刻的状态。

The settlement that was attacked by monsters a while ago should be in this forest...=这个森林里，应该有之前遭受魔物攻击过的集落...

Yeah. It's amazing how easily the holy knight weapon can blow them away.=嗯。这么简单就能把魔物击飞，圣骑士的武器真厉害啊。
If the monster blown away hits another monster and defeats them as well, their magic will fuse together and they'll drop double the Magic Stones.=被击飞的魔物如果把其它魔物撞死，会融合那个魔物的魔力从而使得获得的魔法石数量翻倍哦。
Wow, really?=欸，这样啊？
You can use the same trick with the rocks that goblins throw, too. If you hit it back at the goblin, they'll drop more Magic Stones. It's a little tricky, but you should try it out when you can afford to.=弹回哥布林丢的石头的时候，也会增加魔物掉落的魔法石数量哦。有空的时候可以试试看哦。

I think you can push and pull this big box in your holy knight form.=这个大箱子... 我看如果你变成圣骑士是推得动的。
Investigate=侦查
If you stand to either side of a wooden box you find on the ground,\r\nyou can push or pull it in either direction.=这种大箱子，你在圣骑士状态的话，应该可以拉动或者推动它哦。

I don't. I can't feel any human presence here.=没。这附近感觉不到人类的反应哦。

So there's no one here...? But we needed people to tell us where the monsters dwell...=没人住在这了吗...？那样的话，不就打听不到魔物的住所了吗...

That's right. Drain Crystals absorb the magic from the earth and transfer it elsewhere while emitting waves of evil, attracting monsters and driving them wild.=对啊。导能水晶在吸收着大地的魔力，往某个地方传输过去并释放着邪恶的波动，\n还会吸引魔物并让它们狂暴化。

It doesn't look that deep, but the mud will get caught on your legs and slow your movements. It'll make it harder to dodge enemy attacks, so try to walk on land when possible.=倒也不用太深入，不过陷进沼泽里的泥的话动作会变慢的哦。会很难躲避敌人的攻击的，\n所以尽可能在陆地上战斗哦。
