I'm guessing it got stuck in the swamp and died, then the Drain Crystal's magic reanimated its corpse.=大概是陷进沼泽之后死掉后，被导能水晶的魔力复活了吧。
It looks like it can't move from that spot, but watch out.=貌似他就离不开那个地方了，但要小心。
That monster has acidic vomit made of gastric acid and spoiled food in its stomach. If it barfs on you, your armor and clothes are going to melt away.=在那个泥怪物的肚子里，应该都是些胃酸和腐败变酸的食物。\n被那家伙的呕吐物击中的话铠甲和衣服会被溶解的哦。
Melt away...!? Ugh, that's disgusting! I'm not letting that get on me!=衣服会被溶解...！？呜呜，好恶心啊，我绝对要避免呐！
Some monsters are weak to elements like fire and ice. Hell beetles and monsters that live in water tend to be vulnerable to lightning.=魔物中有着对火或冰这种属性的抗性很弱的家伙。\n地狱甲虫和水生的魔物这些对电击的抗性都偏弱呢。
By the way, your holy knight armor and gauntlet are weak to lightning, too.=顺便圣骑士铠甲和护手对电击的抗性也弱哦。
I see... So that's why my demon sister's lightning magic hurt so much...=这样啊... 所以变成恶魔的姐姐的雷电的魔法，那么疼啊...
Your armor's divine protection reduces damage, though, so it should save you from fatal wounds. What I'm worried about is you exaggerating the pain and getting caught while you're busy whining...=...嘛，因为有着神圣防御的加护，应该会给你把伤害减轻到不致命的程度的。\n然而，你却因为剧烈的疼痛简单地就被抓住了...
Are you sure about divine protection? Miria's purple lightning hurt so much, I couldn't move my body.=真的有防御的加护吗？姐姐的紫色雷电，非常非常疼，疼到我身体完全动不了哦？
Don't talk like that - you're a holy knight! Gosh, you really need to learn to persevere... Your big sister Miria spoiled you rotten, didn't she?=圣骑士就别在那抱怨了。真是的，就是你忍耐力不够嘛... 反正，你也是被那个女人... 被『姐姐』娇生惯养长大的吧？
You don't have to say it like that... Ugh... That's not...true...=你这说法... 呜呜... 那种事情...才没有呢...
Hell beetles... They're dangerous on land, but I especially don't want to deal with them around these swamps...=地狱甲虫... 明明在陆地上的时候就很危险了这种沼泽地就别出来了啊...
If you can't avoid their attacks in the mud, you can strike them right as they come at you.=陷进沼泽里的话就躲不开它的突刺了，找到合适的时机迎击比较好哦。
Eww... My whole body's covered in mud...=呼... 全身，都沾满泥了...
My hands and feet are a mess, too... It feels so gross... Ugh... I smell like mud...=脚和手都黏黏的...好恶心啊... 呜呜... 一股泥臭味...
Heehee... But I just need to switch back to my normal form...=欸嘿嘿... 但是，这些污渍在变回原样之后...
...and immediately transform again, and I'll be clean!=...再变身的话就会变得干干净净了呢！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Yup... All clean and pure... If I keep repeating the transformation, the inside of my stomach should become clean... I can get rid of all the filth the goblins put in me...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>这样...脏东西就全部消失了...... 如果，反复变身再变回来的话，被哥布林注入的... \n我肚子里面也一定会变干净的吧...)
Heehee... Heeheehee...! God gave me such wonderful powers! So convenient!=欸嘿嘿... 嘿嘿嘿... 神明大人的力量真便利，便利...♪
Hey, every time you transform into a holy knight, you consume magic. I know you want to be clean, but you've been transforming way too much lately. Can't you put up with a bit of dirt?=...变身骑士的时候是会消耗魔力的。我知道你想变干净，但最近的你，变身太频繁了哦。\n稍微有点脏就忍耐一下啊。
Huh... H-Have I...? Alright...=欸... 这，这样啊... 我知道啦......
I can feel the magic from a Drain Crystal in that direction. Let's go.=那边的角落能感觉到导能水晶的魔力。走吧。
Okay... Ah, wait up, Iris...!=嗯... 啊，等等，等等我啊伊莉丝...！
On the way through the swamp to break another Drain Crystal...=为了破坏其它的导能水晶，在沼泽地前进的途中... 
(<indent%3D0.4em>*Sigh*)=(<indent%3D0.4em>哈啊...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>It's been about a week since we left the goblin fortress, but she's still in a bad mood... I guess it only makes sense. I'm always making her angry...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>从哥布林塔出来明明已经过了一周了，还是关系不好... 虽然是因为我的关系，\n一直生我的气是理所当然的...吧...)
(<indent%3D0.4em>She only talks to me to reseal my curse, even when we're walking together... She hasn't found out about the goblins raping me...or what I do while she's asleep...has she?)=(<indent%3D0.4em>走在路上的时候也是，就只在封印诅咒的时候才会和我说话... 被哥布林侵犯的事情... \n我趁伊莉丝睡觉自慰的事情... 没有暴露吧？)
(<indent%3D0.4em>But... Ugh... This is so awkward... I don't want it to be like this forever... I wanna get along with her...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>但是...... 呜呜... 这个气氛... 一直这样的话不要啊... 可以的话我想打好关系...)
U-Um... Iris...?=那，那个... 伊莉丝...？
What is it?=...是什么呢？
Umm, you're God's servant... I mean, God's messenger, right?=欸多，伊莉丝是神明大人的下仆... 是神明大人的使者对吧？
What about it?=是这样所以？
What kind of person is God...? Oh, I guess he isn't a person, heehee... You've talked to him directly, right?=神明大人，是什么样的人呢...？啊，不是人类呢，欸嘿嘿... \n伊莉丝之前有直接和神明大人交谈过吧...？
Why do you want to know?=你问这个干嘛？
Huh...? Why...? Well... Um, I'm just surprised that God really exists...and I wanted to know more about you...=欸... 就算你问我要干什么... 欸多，神明大人原来是真的存在的啊，我是这么想的... 而且，\n我也想更详细地了解一下伊莉丝的事情...
Hmph... Fine. I suppose you have the right to know. This is going to take a while to explain...=哼... 嘛，你也有知道这个的权力。那就说来话长了哦...？
Okay... Heehee...=...嗯，欸嘿嘿...
My fellow fairies and I live in a forest in the mountains far northeast of here.=...我和同族的妖精们，是在这里的东北方向很远的山地的森林里生活着的哦。
Mountains far northeast... Aren't those mountains super tall...?=东北的山地... 我记得有个特别高的山...？
Yes, they are. My ancestors lived quietly in that forest surround by mountains. It was a peaceful land very few approached.=是啊。...我们的祖先，在被山环绕的森林里平静地生活着。而且，\n那里是人迹罕至的安宁平和的土地。
Yet suddenly, ferocious monsters began to appear... Just like this area.=但是，有一天凶暴的魔物出现了... 就像这附近发生的事情一样。
So our ancestors climbed the mountain and prayed. Then God came down from the heavens before them...=所以，祖先大人们集合登上山巅祈祷。在那之后，神明大人在祖先们面前的天空上降临了...
...and drove away the monsters with a dazzling light, shining like the sun.=然后周围的魔物都被太阳般眩目的光芒驱散了。
Well, that's the folklore that's been passed down in our village through the ages, but God really does periodically come to the forest to put up barriers and drive away foreign invaders with magic.=...嘛，虽然到此为止都还是村里的传说故事，但实际上神明大人确实是会定期来到森林里维护守护着妖精之村的结界，帮我们用魔法击退外敌哦。
Huh... To be honest, it didn't really hit me even after I was chosen to be a holy knight, but... I guess God really does exist.=呼ー... 说老实话，就算我被选为圣骑士了但还是没有什么实感... 神明大人真的是存在的啊。
Yes, but unlike what you humans believe, God isn't actually all-powerful...=嗯。不过实际上神明大人没有像你们信仰的那样，有着创造万物的力量就是了...
Our God is probably more like a high-ranking spirit or something close to a wraith... No, I shouldn't think like that - it's disrespectful...=那位大人肯定只是高位精灵或者幽灵那样的存在... 不，这样想的话是不敬呢...
In any case, God uses holy light magic to keep the balance between living creatures and protect us, just like the myth says.=不管怎么说，她就像神话那样，使用着神圣的光之魔法维持着生物之间的平衡，\n同时还是守护着我们的存在这点是不会变的啊。
God wants peace for this world and its inhabitants, and we fairies help our God by collecting information from various places, sometimes becoming God's hands and feet. That's how we return the favor for God protecting us.=神明大人希望世界上的所有生物都得到安宁。为了帮助她我们游走着各地收集着情报，\n有时也会全力以赴地报恩的。
I see... So what kind of person... What kind of God is he?=这样啊... 那么，神明大人是什么样的人... 是什么样的神呢？
I don't mean to toot my own horn, but I was one of the most outstanding among the young fairies of my village. I wasn't just made God's servant, I was given a name.=虽然由我自己说出来很羞耻但我是村子里的年轻人中最优秀的，\n所以就将我定作了下仆并给我起了名字...
God always takes the form of a woman when she appears in our village. She looks dignified, but she's also very kind.=神明大人，降临在村里的时候一直都是用的女性的形象呢。虽然威风凛凛的，\n但却是个非常温柔的神呢。
Oh? So she was a Goddess... W-Wait, does that mean the holy sisters at church aren't God's wives, then...?=欸... 原来是女神大人吗... 那，那么都会的教堂里住着的修女们不是神明大人的老婆吗...
She may often appear as female, but she's able to take many different forms, so I don't know if that's her true form.=...话是这么说，但神明大人似乎可以变化为各种姿态，我也不知道她真正的样子是什么。
*Chuckle* She can be mischievous, too. One time, she surprised me by transforming herself to look like me...=呼呼，意外的爱开玩笑，变成和我一样的样子吓唬我的事情也是有的呢...
Wow... Really...?=哇！真的嘛...？
One day, God told us that the world would soon be filled with evil power and that monsters would run rampant. She even told us that the seal the previous holy knight put on the Darkfiend Dragon is on the verge of being broken...=...之前，神明大人告诫过我们，世界正被邪恶的力量及众多的魔物侵蚀着。总有一天，\n前代圣骑士讨伐过的邪龙的封印会被解除的...
That's why she gave me the duty to look for the new savior - the one chosen to become a holy knight - and deliver the brooch to her, and accompany her in her quest to fight evil.=所以，为了讨伐邪恶之物，神明大人给予我将胸针送往被选中为圣骑士的人，\n并作为一起与魔物战斗的同伴的使命。
I see... So that's why you came to me...=这样啊... 所以伊莉丝才会来我们这的啊...
If I can accomplish my duty, God will continue to protect my village.=如果我能完成我的使命的话，神明大人也一定会更珍视我们村子吧。
I want to protect my friends and family from wild animals, monsters...and humans...=我想保护同族们不受动物和魔物... 以及人类们的伤害...
Protect them...from humans...? What does that... Oh... The fairies in the freak shows at the capital...=...同族，被人类...？那是，怎么回事... 啊... 有妖精在王都的观赏屋里...
Tsk... It's not just that...=呜... 远不止如此...
We fairies are small and weak...and not all fairies are good at magic like me.=我们太弱小了... 同族的大家，并不都像我这样擅长魔法。
It's only natural for other species to target us for magic and food. It's survival of the fittest, after all...=所以，被渴求魔力和食物的外敌盯上，或许也是自然的法则吧。
I hate them for it...but I understand why humans capture fairies to make a show out of them... But I don't get why humans and demi-humans...=虽然无法原谅... 但人类是为了把我们当观赏物抓走的... 这理由我知道了... 但是，\n为什么人类和亚人们...
Why do they break our limbs, strip us of our wings, and stab us with tree branches? How can they treat us like toys...?=为什么要把我们的手脚折断，翅膀剪掉，还要用脚踩我们，甚至被用树枝刺... \n简直像是被当成玩具一样对待...？
I don't get it... Do they enjoy doing that? What have we ever done to your kind!?=真是的...做这种事情到底有什么好玩的啊？我们在你们眼中究竟是什么东西啊！？
I... I don't...=这... 这是... 呜...
I know a fairy who had her stomach ripped by fingers from the inside... And another one who got ejaculated into so much she burst! Why can't they just simply kill us!? Why do they use us and then throw us away!?=也有被手指强行塞入肚子剖腹的孩子... 也有被注入脏东西到身体快要裂开一样的孩子啊！？与其被做了这种事情后再被丢掉不管，还不如直接杀了呢！
What... Ejaculated...? That's...just cruel...=居然...... 把脏东西... 这种事...太残忍了...
Cruel...? Of course it's cruel! All my brother did was go to his usual spot to pick some nuts...! To gather...what I asked him to get for me the day before...=残忍...？可不是嘛！？我弟弟，明明就只是去平常的地方摘果子而已...！\n连着我...在前一天拜托他摘的那份一起...
...Iris... I didn't know...=...呜，伊莉丝...... 居然有这种事......
Hmph... And you're on the side of those cruel humans...aren't you?=哼... 你也是，那些人类的同伴...对吧？
I-I am not! *Sniff* I'm sure...only evil people do such cruel things... They're evil!=我，我，才不是...！咕嘶... 肯定... 做那么过分的事情的... 都是坏人哦。只有坏人才那样哦！
Evil? So are you saying all the humans that approach my village are evil?=坏人？那么，靠近我们村子的那些人类都是坏人咯？
Hick... I am... *Sniff*...ngh... The people of my village...would never do something so cruel...=噫咕... 肯定啊... 咕嘶...呜... 我村里的人们...都绝对不会做这种事情的...呜...
Are you sure? The other fairies have told me that among those cruel humans they've seen children much younger than you.=是这样吗？可我的同族遭遇到的那些人类，好像也有比你还要小得多的孩子哦？
Ngh... No... I... No one... They don't want to be cruel... Those children...probably didn't know what they were doing...=...呜，才不是...... 我，大家也... 这种残忍的事情... 肯定，那孩子也...\n只是不知道做了坏事而已...
Hick... They aren't... Hick... ugh...hick... They're not all... Hick...=噫咕...才不是... 噫咕...呜呜...噫咕... ...才不是呢...噫咕...
*Sniff*... Oww... Hick... *Sniff*... I'm not... Hick... *Sniff*... *Sniff* Waaaaaah...=咕嘶...呜呜... 噫咕... 咕嘶... 才不是...噫咕... 咕嘶... 咕嘶，呜欸欸～呜...
I know... I know you're not like those humans. You're a special human who was chosen to be a holy knight...=...我知道了啦。因为你是能被选为圣骑士的人类，是跟其他人不一样的特别的人类...
Hick... Oww... *Hick... Y-Yeah... *Sniff*...hick...=噫咕...呜呜... 噫咕... 呜，嗯... 咕嘶... 噫咕......
It seems that a different village in the north does trade with humans, and God insisted that only some humans are evil... Not that I'm ready to believe that...=似乎还在和北方的村子进行着交易，神明大人也告诫过我们人类里坏人只有一部分。\n......虽然我不怎么相信就是了...
Ugh... Hick...=...呜呜... 噫咕...
Hmph... I'm sorry I yelled at you... Forget what I said...=哼... 对你生气也是我的不对... 忘了它吧...
Chapter 9    Writhing Sludge=第 9 章  蠕动污泥
For years, I've been training in the magical arts to get strong enough to avenge my comrades and get back at the humans who did terrible things to them... But you humans have short lives. If we leave you alone, you'll eventually die, anyway...=我在多年的魔术修行后变强，就想着有朝一日能找到那些残忍对待我同族的人并复仇... \n但是，你们的寿命太短了，即使放着不管的话反正也...
To tell you the truth, I don't care what happens to humans. They're unjust, filthy creatures. I don't understand why God lends her power to your kind...=...说实话，对我来说人类什么的怎么样都好。反正这些残忍肮脏的存在，\n是无法受到神明大人力量的眷顾的...
Still, this is the decision of the God who protects my village. I'll fulfill the duty she assigned me no matter what.=即便如此，因为是一直守护者村子的神明大人的决定，所以我绝对要完成这赋予我的使命。
Monsters are another matter, of course, and we fairies are too small and weak to fight. Your kind prays to God as well, so it makes sense that she chose a human to save the world. It doesn't sit right with me personally, though...=且不说魔物，因为我们太弱小了，所以倒是也能理解给同样信仰着神明大人的人类\n赋予力量这件事。虽然感情上不能原谅人类...
That's the reason I'm helping your kind.=...这就是，我帮助你们的理由哦。
I see...=这样啊...
I know that you're not the same as the humans who attacked my comrades... You must be a virtuous and pure person. Still, if you're going to fulfill your destiny as a holy knight, I need you to become stronger.=我知道你和那些袭击我同族的人类们不一样啦... 你就是内心善良没有污秽的人类对吧。\n但是，为了达成使命你不变的更强也不行呢。
(<indent%3D0.4em>Pure...huh...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>...没有...污秽...)
Judging by the way you speak, you must have grown up without struggle or hardship. You mentioned your parents are dead, so is it because of that female?=从目前为止的经历来看，你在成长的过程中应该都没怎么吃过苦吧。\n你之前还说过父母都去世了，所以都是托那个女人的福咯？
Don't call her that... It's true that Miria took care of me, but I've had struggles in my life, too...=那个女人... 确实姐姐她，一直都在悉心照料着我，但我也是吃过不少苦的哦...
Like...?=比如呢？
Well... Um... I had to walk on dangerous mountain paths and risk tripping, and tending the general store can get boring... And I'm poor, so I only get hand-me-down clothes, and Miria wouldn't make tomato soup like I asked her to...=比如说...欸多... 在山路上差点摔倒很危险啦，在店里当店员很无聊啦... \n因为没钱所以衣服一直不太好，姐姐也总不把我不爱吃的生西红柿做成汤啦...
Stop. I've heard enough. *Sigh* Looks like I have to be even stricter with you. Good grief, why did God have to pick you?=别说下去了。哈啊... 看来从今往后不对你更严厉点可不行了呢。真是的，\n为什么神明大人会...
You always run blindly ahead without listening to me. That's how you got stuck with that curse... You can't even appreciate the cooking I do for you...=基本上，你就总是不听别人的话就跑出去，而且还因此中了诅咒... \n就算给你做了饭你也是一脸不满的样子...
I get that you're not used to fighting, but I still see hesitation in your sword swings. And yet, when I try to help you practice, you immediately get tired...=不习惯战斗倒是没办法的事情，但我从你斩杀魔物的剑上能看到迷茫... \n而且让你练习你也没一会就喊累...
(<indent%3D0.4em>Urk... I just wanted to get along with Iris, but I only made her mad at me... I shouldn't have talked to her...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>呜呜... 明明想着要和伊莉丝打好关系，反而还惹她生气了... 还是不要搭话了吧...)
I've taught you how to purify crystals before, but you still can only make simple things, right?=之前我教过你怎么精炼水晶，但你现在还是只能做些简单的东西吧？
We can go over it again, so try to review what you learned yourself.=我再仔细地教你一遍，你自己也做做看复习一下吧。
O-Okay...=嗯，嗯...
————————————【主线】第九话剧情结束————————

————————————【H-CG】第九话-泥兽人同化开始——————————
Grrrrwwwwooooh... Bweheehee, human woman...=咕咳哦啊啊啊啊... 噗嘿嘿，人类女人...
Huff... My hands and legs... They're stuck in his mud body! I can't get out!=咳呜... 手脚都... 身体陷入污泥中拔不出来了啊...！
Why you...! *Blop*... *Bloop*...=呣咕咕呜～！呜噗噗... 咳噗......！
(<indent%3D0.4em>Iris...! She dived headfirst into the mud orc's body to save me...and now she's stuck! I have to save her soon or she'll suffocate...!)=(<indent%3D0.4em>伊莉丝... 为了救我用力钻进去了... 头陷进污泥兽人的身体里了... \n不快救她的话她会窒息的...！)
Bhehe... Human... Female... Gwhaaaaa...!=噗嘿... 人类... 雌性... 咳哦啊啊啊...！
Huh...? Eeeek... The mud around my hands and legs is moving... What are you up to...!?=欸... 呀啊啊啊... 手脚周围的泥动起来了... 是想要做什么啊...！？

I know that after I get raped here, he's going to take me to his den and use me as a tool for producing children until I die.=在这里被侵犯后，我肯定会被带到它的住处，然后直到死为止都会被它当生孩子机器用吧。
After I give birth to dozens of children, I'm going to break, and then he's going to kill me.=然后，在生下几十匹孩子后，没过多久就坏掉然后被杀掉。
(<indent%3D0.4em>No... I don't want to...die...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>不要啊... 我... 不想死啊...)
I'm filled with unbearable fear towards the monster in front of me.=眼前的魔物实在是太可怕了。
When I was wandering through the grasslands, I didn't care what happened to me, but now I'm clinging to life.=明明之前在草原上彷徨的时候，还觉得自己的生命怎么样都无所谓了，\n现在想珍惜也没机会了。
(<indent%3D0.4em>I'm scared... Help me...Miria... Iris...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>好可怕... 救命啊... 姐姐......... 伊莉丝......)
Maybe I don't care whether I die or not...?=我真的，觉得不用珍惜自己的生命吗...？
No.=不对。
I do care. I do want to live.=自己的生命无所谓什么的，我完全没想过。
I've been raped by goblins, I've crushed monster babies and killed humans, I learned Miria's secret and then saw her get killed by Archlich...then I betrayed God and Iris... I've been through so many terrible experiences.=被哥布林侵犯，虐杀魔物的婴儿，杀人，得知姐姐的秘密，被可怕的阿奎雷奇杀害，\n背叛神明大人和伊莉丝... 全都是些讨厌的事情。
That's why I pretended to be a character from a tragic fairy tale. I wanted someone to praise me for going through it all, even though I knew there was no one to comfort me.=所以，我想被安慰一下但却一个人都看不到，\n搞的好像就只是一直在扮演着悲剧故事中的人物而已。
Alright, time to fuck the hell out of this virgin pussy and impregnate it! Bwehehe... After I knock you up with two or three kids, I'll lend you to my bro, so you better not die on me!=接下来，就该突进这处女小穴让你怀孕了啊！噗嘿嘿... 给老子生上个２，３匹之后，\n老子还要借给大哥用呢，你可别直接死掉哦！
N-Nooo... Help me...!=呀啊，不要... 救命啊...！
If I return to the village, the people there will honor me as the hero who defeated these monsters.=回到村里的话，会被阿姨她们当作打倒了魔物的英雄而被赞赏。
I'm supposed to the poor girl who lost her dear sister. The surviving villagers and Polon are going to console and comfort me.=还能在幸存的村民们和的泼隆安慰下，作为一个失去了最喜欢的姐姐的可怜女孩子生活着。
That's why I never truly wished to die.=所以，我其实一点也不想死啊。
Aaagh... Someone, please...=啊啊，谁来......
But that was such a foolish thought. What am I doing, wandering around at night when the monsters are out?=不过，在这种魔物横行的夜晚徘徊，我多么愚蠢啊。
Bwehehehe! Do you really think there are any humans here!?=噗嘿嘿嘿，在这种地方哪来的人类啊！！！
Eek... Help me...=噫咿... 救命啊...
Someone... Help meeeeeeeeeeeeeee!=谁来... 救救我啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊啊！！！！

Proceed to stage<line-height%3D125%>\r\nChapter 16 The Temple of Spiders?=游玩关卡<line-height%3D125%>\r\n第 16 章  蜘蛛寺院?

Abandoned Temple=废弃神庙
A few hours' walk from Claret's house, in the peaceful port town...=自柯蕾露酱的家，步行几个小时，来到和平的港口城市...
Port Town Man=港口城市男子
A knight that's been raiding monsters' territories and rampaging about, huh?=欸，深入魔物的据点一通乱杀的骑士大人吗？
Port Lady=港口女子
Apparently, she's going around destroying the big red crystals inside monsters' territories. I heard a rumor that the red crystals attract monsters and make them violent.=好像是为了去破坏魔物据点里的大水晶呢。据说红水晶会吸引魔物并让它们凶暴化。
I wonder if the reason we can't take our boats out to sea is due to those crystals?=那现在船不能出海，也是受到那个水晶的影响吗？
I don't know. But surprisingly, that knight is said to be a messenger of God and is a young girl.=不知道啊。震惊，据说那个骑士是阳神大人的使者，还是个小姑娘呢。
A messenger of God... Sounds like a fairy tale.=阳神大人的使者... 简直像故事里一样啊。
A fairy tale...? Ahh, you're right, there was a story like that. Where they fight against evil mages and big dragons, right?=故事里...？嗷，对，是有个... 那个对抗邪恶法师和巨龙的故事。
I wonder if the knight is a cute girl... I want to meet her...=说起来，那个骑士居然是可爱的女孩子吗...？好想见见啊...
Haha! According to rumor, the knight swings around a weapon that's as big as she is and fights monsters. She's probably built like an orc.=哈哈，传说里的骑士大人可是挥动着和她身体一样大的武器，和魔物战斗的呢，\n所以肯定是个和兽人一样的女孩吧。
An orc... I-I guess... Hey you... Don't destroy my hopes and dreams...=兽人... 嗯呃... 喂你...不要破坏我的希望和幻想啊...
Ricca, let's buy some clothes at that store next. My clothes look a little tight on you...=莉卡小姐，接下来去那个店里买衣服吧。穿着我的衣服总是会有点难受的吧...
Too tight...!? That's not... Well, it's a little true... But I can transform with my holy powers...and I'm fine with my sister's hand-me-downs...=难受...！？呜呜... 好吧，是有点...但我可以用神圣力量变身... 姐姐给我的旧衣服还挺好的...
Oh... I'm sorry... You're embarrassed by all the patchwork, right? I understand if you don't want to be seen walking with me.=哦...不好意思哈... 你是否会因为我穿带补丁的衣服而尴尬呢？\n你要是不想被人看到和我在一起走的话，我能理解。
That's not true... But you're a young lady, Ricca. Don't you want to dress up and look pretty?=怎么可能...但莉卡小姐你是个少女。试试看各种各样的打扮比较好哦？
Do I...? I mean, I have to fight monsters, and I'm pretty busy training with Iris these days. I don't have the time to dress up...=唔，是这样吗...？呃，我必须和魔物战斗，而且这些天忙于和伊莉丝训练。没有时间打扮...
You can't be working all the time. Let's go for a little breather.=偶尔休息一下也很有必要哦。来，走吧。
What do you think of this outfit, Ricca? I think it's cute!=莉卡小姐，你觉得这套衣服怎么样？好可爱的！
Huh? Wow... That skirt is so short... I can't wear that...=嗯？哇！这裙子太短了... 我，才不穿呢...
What, really? I didn't think you'd say that...=什么，是这样吗？没想到你会这么说...
My sister told me that men who are attracted to flashy girls aren't any good, so... I'm a little reluctant to wear anything sexy...=我姐姐告诉我，被穿着花哨的女孩吸引的男人都不是什么好人，所以...\n我有点不愿意穿性感的衣服...
Your sister said so...? I see... But your holy knight form usually has a skirt much shorter than this.=你姐姐这么说啊...？不过...\n莉卡小姐变成圣骑士的样子时，基本都是穿着比这还要短的裙子吧。
H-Hey...! Claret! Don't talk about me being the holy knight out in the public! There are already rumors going around...=哇哇...！柯蕾露酱！说了让你别说我是圣骑士的事情吧！？本来就到处都是传闻了...
Oh... I'm sorry. But still... Your knight form skirt is very short. You know you flash your underwear every time you jump, right?=嗷... 很抱歉。但是，骑士装的莉卡小姐... 裙子也更短，跳起来的时候内裤都能看光哦？
Wha...? Oww...=欸...？哦呜呜...
How do I say this... I feel like I'm someone else when I'm transformed, like my body moves on its own...so I haven't really thought about it before... Is it really that noticeable?=可变身的期间... 我感觉就像是另一个人，我的身体自己在动... 所以也不是那么在意来着... \n不过居然能被看光吗？
Yes! You're constantly flashing your panties left and right... I've been wondering why you didn't seem bothered.=是啊。那时候的你，可是大大方方地随便露呢... 我还想着是不是你完全不在意这些呢。
Oh... I see... Ugh... I'm so embarrassed now...=呜呜... 是这样啊... 呃... 我突然，害羞起来了...
It's gotten dark. Let's stay at an inn tonight.=天色也很晚了。我们要不今晚去客栈吧。
Sure. Today was so much fun... Do you come to this town often, Claret?=嗯。今天好开心啊... 柯蕾露酱你经常来这个镇吗?
Yes, about once or twice a month. I come here to buy groceries as well as ingredients for magic potions.=是啊，每月来一两回，买生活必需品和做魔法药剂要用的材料。
Really? It's quite far from your place, though. We left in the morning, and it was already noon by the time we arrived. I thought I was used to walking in the mountains, but it must be tough walking over here every time.=是吗？这离你住的地方，挺远的，好辛苦啊。早上动身，到达时差不多要中午了。\n虽然我对走山路的体力还是很有自信的。
Compared to all the training, monster fighting, and Drain Crystal hunting you do, this trip is nothing.=参加伊莉丝小姐的修行，退治魔物，找着导能水晶，每天都更辛苦的吧？
Heehee... I guess I have been working hard lately, but I've gotten used to it. So where's the inn?=欸嘿嘿... 最近基本都习惯了啦。客栈在哪啊？
The one I often go to should be close by. The two-person room only has one double-sized bed, but we can share it...=我经常去的那家就在附近。但二人间只有双人床，不过既然都是女孩子...
Hey, sorry to interrupt, but...=呐，不好意思打扰下你们...
Iris?=伊莉丝?
Quiet down a little... The town soldiers look like they're panicking. Something must've happened.=安静点儿... 城里的士兵们好像躁动着。应该是出什么事了。
Port Town Soldier A=港口城镇士兵 A
Hey, did you hear?=喂，你听说了没有？
Port Town Soldier B=港口城镇士兵 B
The tailor's daughter was attacked by an arachne on her way back from the capital. And then her boyfriend Paul...=裁缝的女儿在从王都回来的路上，被一只阿拉克尼抓走了。然后她的男朋友保罗...
Port Town Captain=港口城市队长
You lot, what are you doing? Go back to your stations.=你们俩，在干什么？回到岗位上去。
Captain...! Is it true that Paul went to the arachne's nest to save that girl?!=队长...！保罗真的去阿拉克尼的老巢救女孩了吗？！
Then we should go help...!=那我们应该去帮忙...！
No. The monsters around the town have become more active than usual. Our job is to protect this town and the harbor. We can't leave.=不行。镇上的魔物比平常更活跃了。我们的任务是保护这个城镇和港口。\n我们不能离开。
B-But... That means we're leaving Paul and the girl to die...=但，但是... 这不是要让我们眼睁睁看着保罗和那个女孩去死吗...
I've sent word to the capital that the arachne have become more active. I've asked them to provide backup as soon as possible, but we can't do anything until they arrive.=我已经向王都报告了阿拉克尼更加活跃的消息。请求他们赶紧派增援，\n但支援到来之前，我们无能为力。
......I understand...=......理解了...
If only the rumored knight was around...=如果传说中的骑士在场...
Ah... Isn't there anything we can do...?=啊...我们能帮上忙吗...？
The arachne... They are using an old temple as their nest. They never did anything so violent before...=阿拉克尼... 把古寺占作巢穴了吗。我记得以前它们也不会做出这么凶暴的事情啊...
Zzz... Zzz... Mmmngh...=呼... 呼... 呣呣嗯...

I'm sorry, Claret... I still think fighting monsters is too dangerous for a girl like you...=对不起了呢，柯蕾露酱... 我也觉得像柯蕾露酱这样的女孩子和魔物战斗太危险了...
Heeheeee... I'm not...scared of any monsters... I'm...following your rules...=呢嘿嘿... 魔物什么的...才不可怕呢... 我会好好...遵守...约定的啦...
Your parents... They're sure to be worried about you...=你父母...肯定会担心你吧...
Do you think she'll be mad at us when she realizes we left while she was asleep?=趁她睡着走掉了，柯蕾露酱果然还是会生气的吧？
Not like we can do anything about it. You know she would have whined and followed us if she was awake.=我们没招啊。那个女孩，要是起来的话绝对会闹着要跟过来的啦。

You don't want to put her in danger, right? We left her a note, so I'm sure she'll forgive us when we get back and apologize.=你也不想把她卷入危险不是吗？也留了字条了，回来之后好好道歉的话估计就原谅你了吧。

They're spider-women monsters. They use spider webs to trap their pray so they can't move.=阿拉克尼是蜘蛛女魔物。会喷出蜘蛛丝让猎物动弹不得呢。

You know so much, Iris. It's a big help. ...Thanks♪=伊莉丝你懂的好多。能帮上大忙... 历来谢谢啊♪

The upper body of a girl and the lower body of a spider... So that's what arachnes look like...=蜘蛛的下半身和女孩子的上半身，这魔物就是阿拉克尼...
They've gone mad from the Drain Crystal's evil magic. They may look cute, but they're quite ferocious.=被导能水晶的邪恶魔力影响变狂暴了，和可爱的样子相反，感觉非常凶暴呢。

Soldier Paul=士兵保罗

Woah...! Woaaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!=哇啊...！哇啊啊啊啊啊！！！
Sailor=水手
Ahhh... Ahh... Huff, huff... You surprised me...!=啊... 啊... 呼，呼... 你惊艳到我了...！
Y-You're the knight of God, right...? The one who saved the town from monsters...?=你，你是阳神的骑士，对吧...？就是那个从魔物群里救了这个镇子的那位...？
Y-Yes...?=是，是我...？
Hmm... Your appearance, and that weapon... No doubt about it, you really are the knight from back then...!=嗯... 你的长相和武器... 毫无疑问，你真的是当时的骑士...！
Ah, of course you wouldn't remember... Umm... At the quarry, I...=啊，难怪你不会记得... 嗯... 在采石场，我...
Oh... You're one of the bandits from that day...! Huh...? Why are you here...!?=哦... 你是那天的强盗之一...！呵...？你为什么在这儿...！？
The quarry...?=采石场...？
Eep...! P-Please don't misunderstand me! I quit being a bandit after that day...!=咿咿...！请，请不要误解我的意思！从那天起我就不当强盗了...！
Look...! I'm just a lowly dock worker now...! W-Well, I haven't had much work to do recently, but...=看看...！我现在只是个卑微的码头工人...！呃呃，我最近没有太多工作要做，但是...
Um... I... That day, I killed...your friends...=嗯... 我... 那天，我杀了...你的同伙...
Well, I didn't think you were a real knight...=呃，我当时以为你不是真正的骑士呢...
You didn't look like one at all when I saw you back at the quarry, hahaha... B-But, I wonder why...? I can believe that you're a knight now...=在采石场看到你时，你一点都不像个骑士，哈哈哈... 但，但是，我想知道怎么就...？\n我现在笃定你是骑士了...
I'm sorry I attacked you... I'm sure we both have it hard, but... Do your best...=很抱歉我攻击过你... 我晓得大家都有难处，但是... 尽你所能就好...
Oh...? Umm... Okay...=呃...？嗯... 好的...
Iris...? Did you find the entrance to the cave?=伊莉丝...? 你找到洞口了吗？
Y-Yes, I did... Did you get enough rest?=是嘞，找到了... 你休息够了？
Yup! This is my first time in the ocean! Once our battle is over, let's all have fun at the beach!=嗯呐！这是我头一次在海里戏水！战斗结束后，我们要在海滩上玩个痛快！
Haha, that sounds lovely.=哈哈，好哦。
The rocky area that marks the undersea cave is right ahead of us.=海底洞穴的岩石区域就在我们前面。
The cave is in the water, right? Claret said that if I use the ring and crystal ball she gave me, we can go through it, but I'm a little doubtful...=洞穴在水里是吧？柯蕾露说如果用她给的戒指和水晶球，就可以通过，是真的吗...
Upon grapple defeat by Hell Serpent\r\n"The drowning holy knight" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=被地狱蛟缠晕后\n“溺水的圣骑士" H场景（已经看过)
Upon grapple defeat by Hell Serpent\r\n"??????????" \r\nH scene=被地狱蛟缠晕后\r\n"??????????" \r\nH场景
......?=......?
The giant sea snakes coming out from the ocean floor are hell serpents. They're a type of dragon.=从海底冒出来的巨型海蛇是地狱蛟。也是龙的一种。
They'll shoot water bullets at you and try to drag you down even deeper into the ocean. If you ever get caught by one of them, shake it off with all your might.=他们会发射水弹，试图把你拖到更深的海里。如果被抓到，要尽全力摆脱啊。
I grew up in the mountains, so I'm not very good at swimming. I'll drown if they drag me down into the depths of the sea...=我在山里长大，不太擅长游泳。如果它把我拖到深海里，会淹死的...
This must be the entrance to the cave.=这一定是山洞的入口。
The crystal ball Claret gave me... It's amazing that I can talk to her from afar with this.=柯蕾露给了我个水晶球... 能用这个从远处和她说话，真神奇呀。
Claret, we've arrived at the cave at the bottom of the sea.=柯蕾露，我们到达海底的洞穴了。
*Sniff* *Sniff*... Huff, huff... Aaah... Ricca's bedsheets...!=*闻* *嗅*... 呼，呼... 啊... 莉卡的床单...！
Huh? What's that strange voice...? Is there something wrong with the crystal ball?=呵？什么奇怪的声音...？水晶球出了什么问题吗？
She said that the connection gets worse when we're too far apart...but I thought it would still work from this distance...=她说离得太远连接会变弱...但我觉得这个距离仍然能用啊...
Huff... *Sniff* *Sniff*... Heehee... I think I'll wrap this around my naked body... Take off my cape and belt...and my blouse...=呼... *嗅* *嗅*... 嘿嘿... 我要把它裹在我赤裸的身体上... 斗篷和腰带...还有衬衫...都脱掉...
Huh? Claret? Clareeeet!=嗯？柯蕾露？柯蕾蕾蕾露！！
Huh...? Eeep... Ricca!?=呵...？哎呀... 莉卡！？
Claret, what's wrong...? Did something happen?=柯蕾露，怎么了...？发生什么事了吗？
Ah, I can explain this...! Um... Huff, huff... I was just in the middle of changing... I haven't done anything weird!=听，听我解释...！嗯... 呼，呼... 我刚在换衣服呢... 我没有做任何奇怪的事情！
Hey, Claret. We arrived at the entrance to the cave. What should we do now?=喂，柯蕾露啊。我们到达山洞的入口了。现在该怎么办？
Oh... Um... In that case... Heehee, put the ring I gave you on your ring finger.=哦... 嗯... 那样的话... 嘿嘿，把我给你的戒指戴在无名指上。
Alright... Um, then hold still for a moment. I'm going to send you magic from here to activate the ring.=好了... 嗯，先别动。我将从这向你那边传送魔力，激活戒指。
Okay, I put it on.=好，我戴上了。
Okay, you should be able to breathe underwater now.=好了，你现在应该可以在水下呼吸了。
You can use your spells from far away too? You're so amazing, Claret!=你还可以从很远的地方施法？柯蕾露你太厉害了！
All I did was send my magic to your ring through the crystal ball to activate the spell I engraved into it beforehand. Besides, both of those tools were made by my parents...=我只是通过水晶球将我的魔力传送到戒指上，激活我事先刻在戒指上的咒语。\n此外，这两个工具都是我父母做的...
Still, I'm amazed that you knew how to use it like this.=就算这样，我还是惊讶你知道这等妙用。
Thank you... I have to warn you about a few things, though. Since this spell interferes with other magic, you won't be able to use your own magic while my spell is activated.=谢谢你... 不过我得提醒你几件事。因为这个法术和其他魔法互斥，所以当我的法术激活时，你将无法使用自己的魔法。
My own magic...?=我自己的魔法...？
Stuff like sword throwing is off limits, then.=比如掷剑之类的技能是用不了的。
You also won't be able to use crystals that add extra magic to your weapon, and your magic will be gradually consumed while you're underwater. You won't be able to breathe once you run out of magic, so please be careful.=你也不能用水晶附魔武器，你在水下时魔力会逐渐消耗。一旦魔法耗尽，将无法呼吸，\n务必小心。
Okay, I understand. Iris... You can't swim, either, right?=好吧，我明白了。伊莉丝... 你也不会游泳吧？
That's right... I'll have to stay inside your body for a while.=对啊... 我得在你体内待一会儿。
I'll send you magic through the crystal ball before you dive into the water.=在你潜入水中前，我先通过水晶球给你传输些魔力。
Wow, it feels warms... Thank you, Claret. I didn't know crystal balls could be this useful.=哇，感觉好温暖... 谢谢你，柯蕾露。我都不知道水晶球这么有用。
Phew... Sadly, the connection isn't as good as physical contact, so I can't send you magic over and over again...=呼... 可惜，这种联系不如物理接触来的好，我都不能一次又一次地给你补魔了...
Wait... Physical contact... You mean like last time...?=等等... 物理接触... 你是说像上次那样...？
I wanted to come with you, but a mage is just dead weight if she can't use her magic... I'll be waiting for you at the town inn...=我想和你一起去的，但不能用法术的法师就是个累赘... 我在城镇旅馆等你回来...
It's okay, you've been very helpful. I'll call back when I defeat the sea god.=没关系，你帮了大忙。打败海神后我再联系你。
Okay, please be safe...!=好的，请千万小心啊...！
The water resistance makes it hard to move... But it's so strange. I'm actually walking on the ocean floor!=水的阻力，确实移动艰难... 但是，在海底行走，真是不可思议呀！
Moving in water will be slower, but you will be able to jump higher. Just be careful not to overshoot.=在水中移动会比较慢，但相应可以跳得更高。慎重点别跳的太高了哦。
I don't have to take breaths thanks to Claret's spell... I think I could swim if my weapon and outfit were lighter, too...=多亏了柯蕾露的咒语，我不用呼吸空气... 不过这个武器和衣服如果能更轻一点的话就能游着去了啊...
In front of you! It's coming straight at us!=前面！有东西冲过来了哦！
Huh!? Eeeek!=呵！？呀啊！
How are you doing on magic? I know the mage told you about it already, but if you run out of magic energy, you're going to suffocate and drown.=你的魔力没事吧？我知道魔法师已经跟你说过了，没有魔力的话可是会窒息而死的哦。
Drown...!? I don't want to die in the middle of the ocean where no one would even know about it!=窒息...！在谁也不知道的情况下在海底变成藻屑什么的才不要呢！
I don't either. We can't be too hasty, but we better hurry before we become fish food.=我也不想啊。虽然不能着急但也不想变成鱼虾的饵料，尽快前进吧
Here it comes again! Watch out!=又来了！小心！
I can see a light... There must be an area with a big air pocket ahead of us.=看到光亮了... 前面估计是含空气的溶洞。
I can finally get out of the water! I've had enough of being underwater...=终于可以出水了！我已经在水下呆够了...
*Sigh* My clothes and hair are completely soaked... My mouth tastes salty, too...=*唉* 衣服和头发都湿透了... 嘴里还有咸味...
Is this place...an altar for worshiping the sea god...? It must've been made by humans long ago...=这是...祭拜海神的祭坛...？是很久以前的人类造的吧...
My body feels sticky from the saltwater... Ugh, I wanna clean myself...=湿漉漉的全是盐水... 呜呜，好想赶快变干净...
Don't purify your body until we defeat the sea god. He should be around here somewhere...=净化身体还是忍耐到打倒海神之后吧。恐怕就在这附近...
*Gasp* I sense powerful magical power...coming from the sea...!=*咕嘶* 海里...！？巨大的魔力在靠近...！
Mission : Escape from the massive tentacles=任务：逃离巨大触手
<size%3D150%>T-Tentacles!?</size>=<size%3D150%>触，触手！？</size>
What a defiled figure... So this is Poseidon...!=什么渎神的姿态啊... 这就是波塞冬...！
Eeep, they're squirming! Those tentacles have lots of suckers on them, too!=咿，它们还在蠕动！触手上有好多吸盘！
There's too many tentacles! It's too much of a risk to fight them. Let's run towards that rocky area in the far back for now!=这么多触手！直接交战的话有几条命都不够啊。总之，先往深处的石礁上逃！
Okay... Eeep, nooo! It's so groooooooss!=嗯... 咿，讨厌！好恶恶恶恶恶心啊啊！
Eeek, how far are these tentacles going to follow me!? I hate squirmy creatures like this!=呀啊，这个触手到底要追到哪才算完啊！？我，可是最不擅长对付那种扭来扭去的生物了啊！
We're halfway to the rocky area. Be careful of your footing!=到石礁还有一半距离哦，注意点别踩空了哦！
We're almost there! We can make it!=马上就到石礁了，加油！
O-Okay!=嗯，嗯！
Like I thought. Those tentacles can't reach us up here.=那个触手，再怎么说也上不了石礁上面吧
Huff, huff... I swear I've been through something like this before...=呼，呼... 以前好像也有过这种事...
That's right... That time we got chased down a hill by a golem... You left me behind back then, Iris...=没错... 在下山丘的坡上被傀儡追着跑... 那个时候，伊莉丝自己先...
(<indent%3D0.4em>But...she was by my side the whole way this time...)=(<indent%3D0.4em>伊莉丝...这次一直在我身边啊...)
I can still sense its magical power... If that thing is Poseidon, we have to find a way to fight it...=魔力还没有消失... 如果那东西就是波塞冬，咱只好想办法对付它...
What's this shaking...? I-It's the tentacles again!=这个晃动...？又，又是触手！
It's a giant...!? He's huge...=巨人...！？这也太大了...
Now I'm certain. This is Poseidon... What a sinister figure...=没错的。这就是波塞冬... 真是不祥的样貌...
His body must have morphed under the influence of the evil magic overflowing from the island.=肯定是受到了岛上溢出的邪恶魔力的影响才变成这副模样的吧。
Poseidon... He used to be a god idolized by humans...but now he's a creature who's sunk ships and taken many lives...=波塞冬... 曾是人类崇拜的海神... 但现在变成把船弄沉，夺去许多生命的怪物...
The cave ceiling is collapsing! Watch out for falling rocks!=洞穴的天花板要塌了！小心落石！
You think you can beat me with these rocks...!? I'll hit them back at you!=这种程度的石头...！？看我给它打回去！
He fell! Now is your chance! Beat him to a pulp!=他倒了！有机可乘！把一口气疯狂攻击它吧！
He's trying to trample you! Look out!=他想践踏你！小心！
The tentacles are tangled onto me... Eeeek!=被触手缠着... 咿呀！
Is he trying to swallow you whole!? No...! Break free from him!=他想把你整个吞下去吗！？不行...！快挣脱！
Huff, huff... Did I...defeat Poseidon...?=哈啊，哈啊... 打败...波塞冬了吗...？
There's still a faint trace of magic energy left... He probably withdrew into the bottom of the ocean. I'm sure he'll stay down, though.=还有一丝魔力残留... 估计是逃到了海底。不过受了那么大的伤害的话，\n应该能安稳上一阵子了吧。
So that giant... He used to be a prayed to as god around here...but the magic from the island made him ferocious, right...?=那个巨人... 原来还被这一带视作神明... 居然因为岛上流出的魔力变的那么凶暴了啊...
So if we defeat Archlich and stop the overflow of evil magic, will he turn back to normal?=那，如果去岛上把汇聚邪恶魔力的阿奎雷奇打倒的话，它能恢复原样吗？
I think so... It may take some time, though...=是啊... 假以时日的话说不定会呢...
I see... We have to defeat Archlich...=这样啊... 果然必须要打倒阿奎雷奇才行呢...
I can sense evil magic... I think this cave is directly connected to the island...=能感觉到邪恶的魔力... 这个洞窟似乎能直接通到那个岛上去...
Claret, I defeated the sea god... I didn't finish him off, but the sea should be safe for a while now.=柯蕾露，我打败了海神咯... 虽然只是重伤它了，但暂时应该不会有事了哦。
You did...!? Ricca, are you hurt at all!?=你真做到了...！？莉卡小姐，没有受伤吧！？
Nope, I'm good. I was surprised by all the big, thick tentacles he had, though.=没有。不过，他长着一堆又大又粗的触手，吓了我一跳。
Big, thick tentacles...!? Are you okay, Ricca!? He didn't wrap around you and do weird things to you, did he!?=一堆粗大的触手...！？莉卡小姐你没事吧！？没有被缠住，做奇怪的事吧！？
Huh? Weird things...? He chased me around and stuff, but not much else...=欸？奇怪的事...？他到处追我什么的，但没什么别的...
I see... That's a relief.=这样啊... 真是松了一口气。
So anyway, since we defeated the sea god, I'm thinking of heading straight to the island. The cave seems to be connected to it.=然后，打倒海神之后，我想着就这样去岛上。洞窟前面好像和岛是通着的。
What? You're going there alone...? That's too dangerous! We're almost done preparing the ship, so please, come back so we can go together!=欸？你一个人去吗...？太危险了吧！我们差不多准备好船了，所以请回来和我们一起去！
But...we have to defeat Archlich as soon as possible. Don't worry, I have Iris with me.=我意识到，不早点打败阿奎雷奇不行。伊莉丝也和我一起，没事的啦。
Ricca...=莉卡...
We don't know when he'll gather enough magic to open the gate and resurrect the Darkfiend Dragon... Archlich is the one behind the sea god's rampage, too.=它从那么多地方夺取魔力，不知道什么时候就会穿过大门复活黑暗之龙啊... \n而且，把海神变成魔物的也是阿奎雷奇。
Alright... I'll follow you to the island with the soldiers!=好吧... 我和士兵们一起跟着你去岛上吧！
But Claret... It's dangerous, and your parents...=但是柯蕾露...  这很危险，你父母也...
No, never mind... You be careful. I'll be waiting for you on the island. Tell the soldiers not to push themselves either, okay?=不，没关系... 你要小心。我在岛上等你。顺便帮我跟士兵们说不要太勉强自己好吗？
Yes... Still, I don't think it's a good idea for you and Iris to go to the island alone. You're being too rash.=好... 但是，我还是觉得，你和伊莉丝独自去岛上并非良策。操之过急。
I can afford to be rash because I know the soldiers and you will be right behind me... Heehee.=我可以当前锋，因为我了解士兵们，还有你支持着我的背后呢... 嘿嘿。
*Sigh* Okay, Ricca. We'll be right behind you. And one more thing...=*唉* 好吧莉卡。我们跟在你后面。还有一件事...
There's something I have to tell you before you go to the island...=在你去岛上之前，我得告诉你...
A soldier told me about reports from previous surveys of that island. Apparently, there's a monster that can turn people into stone there.=从士兵那里听说，岛上有能把人变成石头的魔物，是以前去调查的幸存者口中的情报。
Turn people into stone...? You mean like gazers?=把人变成石头...？是指凝视者吗？
I don't know the details, but please be careful. My magic won't reach the crystal ball once it's on the island, so all I can do I pray for your safety...=详细情况我也不清楚，但还是小心为妙。这个水晶球的魔力无法传递到岛上，\n所以在我们赶过去之前，请一定要好好的...
Thank you, Claret.=谢谢你，柯蕾露。
Chapter 18    The Demon God of the Abyss=第 18 章  深渊恶魔之神
Chapter 19=第 19 章
——————————————————————【主线】第十八话结束————————————————————————————————


—————————【3D】第十八话-溺水的圣骑士开始————
This is the hell serpent's nest...! Ugh... I'm glad it finally let go of us...but I didn't think we would be dragged this deep down...=这里是地狱蛟的巢穴...！？咳... 虽然终于是放开了... 居然被拖到了这么深的地方...
It looks like the serpent is asleep... I bet it thinks we won't resist anymore. Sure, we lost our weapon along the way, but...=地狱蛟... 在睡觉呢... 是觉得我们已经没法抵抗了吗？好在它不知道武器去哪了......
Mmmph... Mmmmmgh!=呜噗... 呜呣呜呜呜呜呜呜呜！
Mmngh... I can't...breathe... Mmgh... Fmmbbgh... Mmbghgh...!=呣咕... 呼吸...不了了... 呼呣... 呼吼吼... 呣吼吼吼吼吼...！！
Aaah, don't...! Don't exhale! Calm down...! Don't panic!=啊啊，不要...！不要吐出空气啊！...冷静下来，不要乱动！！
(<indent%3D0.4em>I can't swim in such deep water... I've only swum in shallow streams before... There's water in my throat... I can't breathe. I'm gonna drown and die...!)=(<indent%3D0.4em>我，可没法在深海里游泳啊... 明明只能在脚能着地的小河里游... 水进喉咙了... \n好难受，要淹死了...！)
Mmmgh, brrlgh... Nooo...! Ghblblbl...!=嗯，卟咕噜呃咕噜... 不要...！咕噜咕卟噜...！
I told you, don't breathe out...! If you keep panicking like that, you're really going to drown to death... Calm down! Cool your head!=别把空气呼出去，跟你说不行了啊...！你再这么乱动可真的要被淹死了啦... \n冷静下来，冷静啊！
Mmmgh... Brlrlgh... Drown...to death... Hmm... Blrghghgh...=呣咕咕... 噶吼吼... 我才噗要... 被淹始... 哈呣，呜噗噗噗噗...
No... At this rate, she's going die for real... I need to think of a way to calm her...=啊啊... 你再这样真会淹死的... 不做点什么让这孩子冷静下来的话...

Ricca drowning=溺水的莉卡

So many stone statues... They look like soldiers... Wait, are they...!?=好多石像... 如同士兵的打扮... 难道说...！？
The mage did mention something like this... That there was a monster that turns people to stone on this island...=说起来魔法师说过呢... 岛上有能石化人类的魔物在...
Hey, Iris... Is there a way we can turn these people back to normal?=呐，伊莉丝，这些人，还能变回原样吗...？
If they were alive when they were petrified, killing the monster that cursed them should undo the spell...but I didn't see any gazers on our way here.=如果是在活着的时候被石化的话，把施加诅咒的魔物打倒了应该就能变回原样了...\n不过在来的路上也没见到凝视者啊。
The petrification monster... I wonder where it is...=石化的魔物... 藏在哪了呢...
This bridge should lead us to the castle.=过了这座桥，应该就能进城堡了吧。
I'm still wondering where the petrification monster is...but I guess we have to move forward.=石化的魔物... 虽然很在意但也只能先前进了。
A silver golem...?=銀色的傀儡...？
Did that golem turn the soldiers into stone...?=是这傀儡把士兵们变成石头的吗...？
I've never heard of anyone making a golem with that kind of power...=做出拥有这种力量的傀儡的方法，没听说过啊...
What a surprise. It attacked us... I suppose it's the gatekeeper of this castle.=嘛，要打过来了呢... 是看城门的吗？
Unlike the golem we fought before, this one is made of metal... Its body is going to repel your weapon if you slash at it.=和之前战斗过的傀儡不一样，身体貌似是由金属制成的呢... \n再怎么说打金属敌人的话武器也是会被弹开的啊
But you've come this far. That golem is no match for you now!=但是，那又怎么样。就这种傀儡，对一路走到这里的你来说完全不是对手啦！
Yeah! I'll show it how strong I've become!=嗯！让它见识见识变强的我！
The gate to the castle is closed... Maybe I can climb up the wall by throwing my sword into it... Hmm... But I think I'll run out of magic before I can climb to the top...=城门紧闭着... 在墙上刺魔法剑能爬上去吗... 唔... 这个高度感觉爬一半魔力就要耗尽了啊...
You've gotten pretty strong, but even your powers aren't enough to pry this sturdy door open... What do we do...?=就算你的力量被强化过，要把这么坚固的门强行突破掉也是做不到的吧... 麻烦了呢...？
Oh, I know! Let's have the golem we just defeated on the bridge destroy this door!=...哦对了 ！让刚才在桥上打倒的傀儡来帮我们破坏它吧！
What are we going to do with it? I also think its big arms are strong enough to break it open...but we shattered the red gem on its chest. It won't move anymore.=让那个傀儡...要怎么做？如果是那个大手的话应该是能破坏掉的啦... \n可它胸中的红宝石刚刚已经被我打碎了，已经完全动不了了哦？
Heehee, I came up with the perfect idea. No wonder I'm the best magic user in my village...!=嘻嘻，居然能想到这种办法。我果然是全村第一的术士啊...！
I'll get it ready, so could you go defeat about three monsters and collect their Magic Stones?=先做些准备，打倒３匹左右的魔物，然后把掉落的魔石拿到这里来好吗？
Sure, but...I don't have a good feeling about this... You were like this when we started magic training, too...=知道了，不过... 有种不好的预感... 开始魔法的修行时好像也是这种感觉...
Phew... Alright, I got the Magic Stones!=呼... 好了，我收集来了好多魔石哦！
That was fast.=很快嘛。
Of course. We have to get to Archlich as soon as we can...and you said that the monsters' wavelengths make you feel sick when you're away from me, so I collected them in a hurry.=嗯，不快点去打倒阿奎雷奇的话... 而且伊莉丝也说过不在我身边的话，\n会因为魔物的波动而难受，我就抓紧收集来了。
Thanks, I appreciate you hurrying. Could you place the Magic Stones on top of the magic circle, then stand in the center of the circle?=这样啊，让你费心了呢。来把魔石放到这个魔法阵上面，然后再站在圆心处好吗？
Sure, but...what are you going to do?=可以是可以...要干什么？
We're going to make a new core for the golem, and we're going to transfer your spirit into the controls.=要制作新的傀儡核心，我想将操作核心的部分替换成你的精神哦。
Huh... Wait, my spirit...!? You don't mean I'm going to end up as the golem...do you!?=呵...欸，我的精神...！？难道说是要把变成傀儡那样...是这个意思吗？...！？
Ah, you guessed right. I'm glad I don't have to explain it to you. Heehee! It'll only be for a moment, but you get the rare experience of becoming a golem♪=啊啦，悟性不错嘛。省下说明的时间了呢。唔呼呼，虽然只有一会，\n也算是拥有珍贵的体验了，太好了呢♪
N-No! That sounds too dangerous! I changed my mind. Let me try throwing my sword at the wall. I think I can climb it!=不，不要！变成傀儡什么的，绝对很危险啊！还是把魔法剑插在墙上吧，一定能爬上去的！
I doubt you can. Besides, even if you were able to climb the wall, you would be depleted of magic. How would you fight the monsters that are no doubt lurking beyond the gate then?=那么高不行的啦。就算能上去墙壁那边也有一大堆魔物，你要精疲力尽和它们打吗？
If you want to stop Archlich as soon as possible, just do what I say, alright?=既然不快点阻止阿奎雷奇可不行的话，就听我的话啦♪
If a monster can make a golem core... Heehee, it should be easy as pie for me! I'm the best among my fairy friends, after all...=傀儡的核心... 呼呼呼，就像是魔物会做出来的东西呢... 不过作为妖精之中最优秀的我的话，\n肯定简简单单就能做出来...
It's my first time doing this, but I'm sure it'll go well.=虽然实际上手是第一次，但肯定能做好的啦。
"First time"? "I bet"? That only makes me more nervous... I won't end up as a golem forever, will I...?=“第一次”“肯定”什么的，这话听着好不安啊... 失败的话我不会永远变成傀儡吧...？
Don't worry. Your spirit is linked to the holy knight's brooch, so when the core crystal breaks, you'll automatically return to your own body.=没事的啦。因为圣骑士的胸针和你的精神是连接的，\n核心的水晶被破坏掉的话精神会自动回到你原来的肉体上的啦。
Are you sure...? Ugh... Okay...=真的吗...？呜呜... 知道了啦...
Heehee, just watch! They don't call me the best magic user in the village for nothing. I'm going to activate the magic circle, so you stay still there.=呼呼，这就是被神明大人认证过的村里唯一的神秘术士的手笔啊。\n我要发动魔法阵了，你老实待着别动啊。
Whoa, I'm so high up... Huh...? This is the golem's arm...! Did I really become the golem...!?=呜哇，好，好高啊... 啊嘞...？这是，傀儡的手...！我，真的变成傀儡了吗...！？
Iris...? Where are... Oh, there you are... Huh!? Is that my body!? I'm just laying there with my butt out!=伊莉丝...? 在哪... 啊，有了... 呵！？那是我的身体吗！？屁股漏光光的我倒下了！
Yup. Your spirit is in the golem now, so it's more accurate to call that your shell.=是啊。现在的你已经是傀儡啦，所以更准确的说这是你的空壳哦。
Don't talk about my body like that... I wish I'd fallen on some grass and not a dirty patch of ground like that...=空壳什么的，我又不是地狱甲虫... 既然会这么倒下去的话，至少在草地、更干净一点的地上之类的要更好吧...
We don't have much time, alright? I made you a ribbon out of the leftover Magic Stones, so cheer up.=时间紧迫也没办法啦。我还把用剩下的魔石给你做了个缎带呢，振作起来吧。
Wow, it matches the blue ribbon I always wear! Wait...this ribbon looks hard. It's not cute at all...=哇啊，跟我一直戴着的蓝色缎带一样呢！不对...这种硬硬的缎带，一点都不可爱...
Would you quit complaining? Anyway, I'm glad the golem body is working just fine.=刚才开始你话就很多哦？总之你先试着用傀儡的身体活动活动吧。
Heehee, and it was my first time making the core! I really am amazing...=呼呼，第一次做核心就能做的这么好！我果然很优秀啊...
You're absolutely sure I'll return to my body, right?=我一会真的能回去吧...？
Huh? What are you looking around for?=嗯？你在东张西望什么？
This feeling... Monsters are gathering around us. Looks like we took too long. We better destroy that gate soon.=这种感觉... 是周围的魔物在聚集了。看来稍微浪费了点时间呢。赶紧去破坏城门更好哦。
O-Okay...but...I can't leave my body laying down there! The monsters might do things to it...!=嗯，嗯... 知道了... 不过我的身体，就这么倒在那里的话，会被魔物玩弄的啊...！
Don't worry, I'll watch over it. Now hurry and destroy the castle gate before any powerful monsters get here. After you take down the gate, you can break the core yourself and return to your body.=没事啦，我给你看着。万一有厉害的魔物来了就危险了，所以你快去把城门破坏掉。\n把城门破坏掉之后，再打碎自己胸前的核心就能回到原来的身体了哦。
Ugh, okay... I'll go destroy the gate.=呜呜，知道了啦...我去破坏城门了哦。
Good. You should be able to beat any monsters that come at your way with that body.=嗯。这壮硕的身躯，有魔物来捣乱肯定也能简单地踢飞吧。
Castle Gate=城堡大门
Mission : Destroy the Castle Gate before Iris is defeated=任务：在伊莉丝战败前摧毁城堡大门
So many monsters... When did they get here...?=这么多魔物... 什么时候...？
Those monsters recognize that you and your golem body are an enemy.=那些魔物，似乎能认出变成傀儡的你是敌人呢。
I've strengthened the core crystal with magic, so it shouldn't break under those monsters' attacks. Still, you'll flinch if you take too much damage, so keep your guard up.=核心的水晶我用魔力强化过了，以那些魔物的攻击是打不坏的啦。\n不过，受到太多伤害的话就没法前进了，要注意哦。
Alright. I kinda feel sorry for them since I'm so much bigger, but...I can't show any mercy to Archlich's minions!=我明白了。这种大小落差的话感觉它们有点可怜呢，不过...\n既然是阿奎雷奇的手下，我就都给踢开了哦！
Ugh, my body feels so heavy... I can't tell how many monsters are around me without Iris. I better destroy the gate quickly so I can get back to her.=呜呜，身体好重... 没和伊莉丝在一块也不知道附近有多少魔物。赶快摧毁大门和她团聚吧。
Upon defeat\r\n"Ricca's aerial insemination" \r\nH scene (Already seen)=战败时\n“莉卡的空中产卵”\nH场景（已经看过)
Monsters are gathering here, too...=这边也有魔物过来了啊...
Iris, did you say that there are monsters near my body!? I'm coming back! I just have to break the gem on my chest, right!?=伊莉丝，我身体周围也有魔物了吗！？那我回去吧，把自己胸口的宝石破坏掉就好了是吧！？
Don't worry, I can handle these monsters and buy you some time. You focus on destroying the gate as soon as possible!=没事，这种程度的魔物我还能给你争取些时间。行啦快去把城门破坏掉！
Ugh... I may have used too much power making the golem core. I only have about half of my magic energy left... I need to make it last until the gate is broken!=咕... 是制作傀儡核心时使用太多力量了吗。\n到魔力枯竭为止只剩一半了啊... 在你破坏城门之前我会撑住的哦！
I'm at the gate! Time to destroy it so I can go back to my body!=到达城门了！赶快破坏掉后回到自己的身体里去！
Huff, huff... I'm not going to let these monsters...touch her body...=哈啊，哈啊... 这孩子的身体...我不会让她被魔物伤害到的...
The gate broke! Iris, I'm coming back! I just have to break the crystal on my chest, right?=敲碎城门了！伊莉丝，我现在回去！把胸口的宝石破坏掉就好了吧？
That's right! I strengthened the core, so you need to use something hard to crack it!=嗯！核心是被坚固地强化过的，应该得用什么坚硬的东西锤它才行！
Augh... The brooch's protection is weakening! It can't draw out the holy knight's power because her spirit is too far away... The monsters' wavelengths are... Huff, huff...=咕... 胸针的加护正在减弱！因为精神离开太远所以无法激发圣骑士的力量了吗... \n呜呜... 魔物的波动... 哈啊，哈啊...
Eeek...! Uugh... Huff, huff... I can't protect her...!=咿咿...！呜呜... 哈啊，哈啊... 已经守不住了啊...!
You have to come back...! Break the core to transfer your spirit into your body...!=拜托了，快回来...！破坏掉核心就能让精神回到肉体里了...！
Okay! I'll break the gem on my chest with my fist and...=我明白了！用拳锤打胸口...
Huh...? My arms are too long... I can't reach my chest! Wh-What do I do!? At this rate, the monsters are going to get Iris...and my body...!=啊嘞...？手臂太长了... 这样够不到胸口啊！ 怎、怎么办啊！？ 这样下去的话，\n魔物要把伊莉丝...把我的身体..！
Scree...!=噼奇...!
Uuurk... Because of the evil wavelengths... Huff... Huh...? That's the sound of a hell beetle... Where is it!?=呜呜... 这邪恶的波动... 哈啊... 欸...？地狱甲虫的翅膀声，在哪！？
Iris, what's wrong!? I want to break the gem on my chest...but my arms are too thick! I can't bend them... O-Oh no... Iris is in danger... But I still can't reach my chest...!=伊莉丝，发生什么事了！？得快点，把宝石破坏掉...手臂太粗没法弯曲啊... 不，不行... \n这么下去的话伊莉丝要... 果然手够不到啊...!
Scree...?! Screeeeeee♪=噼奇...？！噼奇咿咿咿咿咿♪
Uuugh... S-Stop it... Where are you taking her body... Ack... Huff...=呜呜... 不，不要啊... 那孩子的身体，你要带到哪里去啊... 咕... 哈啊...
Huh, my body...!? Aaah, I have to hurry and get back to my body... But my arms... They won't reach my chest... What do I do... What do I do...!?=欸，我的身体被...！？ 啊啊，不快点破坏掉宝石回到身体里的话... 但是，手... 够不到啊... 怎么办啊... 要怎么办才好啊...！？
I know, I can hit my chest on a rock somewhere... Come on... There has to be a rock big enough to crush it... What...? I can't find any!=对了，用哪里的石头把胸口撞上去的话... 呃唔... 大小正好合适的石头... 没有...？找不到啊！
Huff, huff... Ngh... I'm losing my sight because of the evil magic... Give me back...that body...=哈啊，哈啊... 咕... 因为这邪恶的魔力，视野都... 把她的身体...还，还回来啊...
Scree! Screeeeeeeee!=噼奇！噼奇咿咿咿咿咿！
Iris!? I have to go back to her in this form... But it's so heavy... I can't get back fast enough...!=伊莉丝？！这样的话就先用傀儡的身体过去... 明明要快点的... 身体太重了啊...!
Huff, huff... I finally got back here...but where's my body...!? Hey, Iris... Where did you go!?=哈啊，哈啊... 虽然总算是到了...我的身体在哪...！？ 呐，伊莉丝... 你在哪啊！？
Augh... I can't find Iris or my body... W-Were they taken away by a monster...!? No... I have to break the core crystal..=啊啊... 伊莉丝和我的身体... 哪里都没有... 难，难道说，被魔物带走了吗...！？ 不要啊... \n得赶快，把胸前的宝石破坏掉...
The debris of the castle wall... Maybe if I ram my whole body at it... Hyaaah! Huh...? Hyaaah...!=城墙的瓦砾... 把身体撞在这上面的话... 嗨呀！呵...？嗨呀...！
Why won't it break...! Ah... That's right... Iris said that she strengthened the crystal... Oh, but I need to return to my body already!=为什么，撞不破啊...！啊... 说起来... 伊莉丝好像说过，她把胸前的宝石用魔力强化过了... \n啊啊，明明不赶快回到身体里不行啊！
Ugh... I can't find my body or Iris... *Sniff*... Looking around for them brought me back to the original spot...=呜呜... 哪里都找不到我的身体和伊莉丝... *抽泣*... 到处找，都找回原地了...
It's been a while since I lost them... Oh... This rock looks hard... Maybe I can use it as a hammer and hit my chest with it...=已经过了好久了啊... 啊... 这个看起来很硬的石头... 如果把它像锤子一样锤到胸口的话...
But...will it actually take me back to my body...?=但是...真的能回到我的身体去吗...？
Ugh... I'm a little scared, but... Hyaaah!=呜呜... 虽然有点可怕， 嗨啊!
It's great to be back in my own body! I feel so much lighter.=身体好轻... 果然还是自己的身体最好啦。
So this is Archlich's castle...=这里是阿奎雷奇的城堡...
...ca...! Ri...cca...!=...卡...小姐...... 莉卡...姐...！
Oh! I think Claret is trying to contact me. We're close enough to each other for the crystal balls to connect.=啊，是柯蕾露酱发的联络吗？似乎进了水晶球能收到魔力的距离了呢。
Our ship is about the arrive on the island.=应该马上船就能到岛上了。
Please be careful, Ricca... If anything happened to you, I would...=莉卡小姐，请一定要小心啊，你万一出什么事的话，我会...
He did? Heehee, that's reassuring. I'll be going a bit further, then.=这样啊... 欸嘿嘿，好坚强啊。那，我就再往前深入些吧。
Yes, of course. Oh, by the way, the captain of the soldiers sent people to the other towns and even the royal capital to ask for reinforcements before we set sail.=嗯。对了... 士兵队长在船出发之前好像向别的城市和王都派去了人，向他们请求援军了。
I'll be fine!=不会有事的！
That's good to hear. Please be careful.=我知道了。不要勉强自己哦。
You're the ones who should be careful. I found a lot of petrified soldiers, so watch out for any dangerous monsters lurking around when you get to the island.=比起这个，注意一下岛的上空，我看到了很多被石化的士兵们哦，\n说不定在哪里还藏着危险的魔物。
The petrification...monster...=石化的...魔物...
Chapter 19    The Lord of Statues (Part 1)=第 19 章  石像之主（前篇）
Chapter 20=第 20 章
——————————————————————————————————【主线】第十九话结束————————————————————————————————


——————————————【3D】第十九话-Ricca的空中产卵开始——————————————

So hot... What is this place...?=好热... 这里是...？
Huh...!? I'm in the air...!? Eeek, I'm so high up! Wait... I wasn't able to return to my body!?=欸...！？空中...！？呀，好高！怎么会... 难道我回归身体失败了吗！？
Screeeeeee!!!=噼奇咿咿咿咿咿！！！
Eeek, is this cry...a hell beetle!? M-My body's been caught...by a hell beetle... And it's taking me away...=呀啊，这个叫声... 地狱甲虫！？我，我的身体...被地狱甲虫抓走了... 在空中...
Aaaagh... What...!? The beetle's tail... I-It's pressed against my privates...!=噫啊啊啊... 什么...！？那，那里...被地狱甲虫的尾巴压着...！
Nnngh...! It's pressing against me hard... Hold on... The end of its tail...is used to lay eggs... No! Don't do that inside me...! Noooo, let go!=噫嗯...！被用力压着... 尾巴前端... 难道要...把卵弄进我... 不要啊，那种事情不要啊...！\n不要啊啊啊，放开我！
Scree...?=噼奇咿...？
Huh... No... I'll fall into that river of flames...! D-Don't...! Aah... Don't let go of me!=欸... 啊... 要掉下去了，要掉进岩浆河里了...！不，不要啊...！啊啊啊...不要放开我！
Sreeeeeeeee!!! Screeeeeee!!!=噼奇咿咿咿咿咿！！！噼奇咿咿咿咿咿！！！
Eeek... It's mad at me...!? A-Alright, I won't struggle anymore... I won't, so please...don't loosen your grip on me...=呀...在生气...！？我，我明白了啦，不乱动了... 我不会再乱动了所以求你了...\n不要松开腿啊...
Scree, scree, screeeee...=噼奇咿，奇咿，奇咿...
Aah... Not my privates... Huff... Aaah...! I can feel the tip of its tail pushing into me! So it is trying to lay eggs in me...! D-Don't! I don't want bug eggs...!=啊啊... 在重要的地方里... 哈啊...啊啊...！尾巴的前端，插进去了！\n果然是想在里面产卵吗...！不，不要啊，虫卵什么的不要啊...！
Scree... Screeee!=噼奇咿...奇咿！
Eeeeeeeek! I'm gonna fall! Stop! I'll die if I fall! Please, don't drop meeeee!=咿呀！我要掉下去了！停下来！掉下去我会死的！求你了，别把我丢下去！
